22544.question: How To Make Pajama Pants
22544.gt: To make pajama pants, start by folding a pair of pajama pants you already own in half so that the side seams match up and the crotch is visible. Next, fold your new fabric in half, place the folded pajama pants on top, and trace around them to create a basic pattern. Then, cut the fabric out along the traced line and use it as a template to trace and cut out the second leg. Finally, sew the legs together, add an elastic waistband, and finish the cuffs to complete your project.
22544.pred: To make pajama pants, you will need fabric, elastic, and a sewing machine. First, cut the fabric into two pieces, one for the front and one for the back. Then, cut the elastic into two pieces, one for the waistband and one for the leg casing. Sew the fabric pieces together, leaving an opening for the elastic. Next, sew the elastic into the waistband and leg casing. Finally, sew the opening closed and add a drawstring or tie to the waistband.

22649.question: How To Make a Cheese Omelette
22649.gt: To make a cheese omelette, first crack 2 eggs into a mixing bowl. Then, add 2 tablespoons (30 mL) of water and a dash of salt and pepper. Adding water to the egg will make your omelette light and fluffy. Whisk everything together until the mixture is thoroughly combined. Next, heat 1 tablespoon (14 g) of butter in a pan over medium heat until it melts and coats the bottom of the pan. Then, pour in the egg mixture. After about 10 seconds, use a spatula to gently guide the egg into the middle and away from the sides. Keep doing this until the egg firms up. Now, sprinkle ⅓ cup (42 g) of grated cheese on one half of the cooked egg, and fold the other half over the cheese using the spatula. Finally, cook the omelette for 30 more seconds, or until the egg is completely cooked through, and enjoy!
22649.pred: To make a cheese omelette, you will need two eggs, two tablespoons of water, a pinch of salt, a little bit of pepper, and a third cup of grated cheese. First, crack the eggs into a mixing bowl and add the water, salt, and pepper. Whisk the mixture well. Next, preheat an 8-inch omelette pan and add a tablespoon of butter. Test the pan by adding a drop of water to see if it sizzles. Once the butter is melted, pour the egg mixture into the pan. Use a spatula to push the cooked egg to the center of the pan and tilt the pan towards the spatula. Repeat this process until the raw egg is all cooked. Place the cheese on one side of the omelette and flip it with the spatula. Cook the omelette until the cheese is melted. Finally, place the omelette on a plate and enjoy.

22655.question: How To Make a Fluffy 3 Egg Omelette
22655.gt: To make a fluffy 3 egg omelette, preheat your pan over medium heat, and crack 3 eggs into a bowl. Add 1 tablespoon of milk, a pinch of salt, and any vegetables you want to the eggs, and whisk them with a fork until there are plenty of bubbles. Then, coat the pan with a thin layer of olive oil and pour in the egg mixture. As the mixture sizzles, use a spatula to lift the edges of the omelette so they don't stick to the pan. After about 1-2 minutes of cooking, sprinkle grated cheese on top of the egg and fold it in half, letting the cheese melt for another 15 seconds before serving!
22655.pred: To make a fluffy 3 egg omelette, you will need three eggs, milk, salt, pepper, and cheese. First, whisk the eggs and milk together until well combined and there are lots of nice air bubbles. Season with salt, pepper, and onion powder. Heat a pan on medium to high heat and spray with cooking spray or use butter. Pour in the egg mixture and cook until the edges start to cook. Use a spatula to bring the edges into the center and tilt the pan to fill the gaps with uncooked egg. Cook for a couple of minutes and go around the edges with a spatula to make sure it's not sticking. Once the omelette is almost cooked, add cheese and let it melt for about a minute. Carefully flip one half onto the other and cook for another 30 seconds to a minute. The omelette is now ready to be served.

24319.question: How To Make Apple Crumble
24319.gt: To make an apple crumble, first, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Then, peel and core 5-6 apples. Cut the apples into 1/4 inch (0.6 cm) pieces and spread them out in an 8 inch (20 cm) baking dish. Next, combine 2/3 cups (80 grams) of flour, 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar, 1/2 cup (100 grams) of brown sugar, and 1/2 tsp of cinnamon in a large mixing bowl. Cut 6 tablespoons of chilled unsalted butter into the mixture with a fork or a pastry cutter. Cutting in simply means combining the butter with the flour until it reaches a crumbly sandy texture. Be careful not to overwork the butter or it will become too soft and more difficult to work with. Pour the crumble topping over the apples and bake it for 45 minutes or until golden. Serve and enjoy!
24319.pred: To make apple crumble, start by peeling and cutting the apples into smaller pieces. Place them in a pan with water, sugar, and cinnamon to simmer for about five to ten minutes. In a separate bowl, mix flour, butter, sugar, and cinnamon to create the crumble topping. Pour the simmered apples into a baking tray and sprinkle the crumble mixture over the top. Preheat the oven to 160 degrees fan and bake for 20 to 30 minutes or until the crumble is lightly golden and the apples are bubbling up the sides. Enjoy your delicious apple crumble with custard.

25189.question: How To Make Chocolate Fondue
25189.gt: To make chocolate fondue, start by breaking up 1 pound of chocolate into small pieces with your fingers or a knife. Then, bring 2-4 inches of water to a boil in a pot over medium-high heat and place a mixing bowl on top of the pot so it traps the steam. Next, pour 2 cups of heavy cream in the pot and heat it up for 1-2 minutes, lowering the heat if it starts to boil. Finally, add the chocolate to the bowl and whisk everything together until the chocolate is melted. To round out the flavor of your fondue, add 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract.
25189.pred: To make chocolate fondue, you will need four boxes of semi-sweet baker's chocolate, heavy whipping cream, a nonmetallic mixing spoon, a fondue pot, and two pots. First, cut the chocolate into small pieces and pour it into a pot. Then, add one cup of heavy whipping cream and stir until the chocolate is melted and smooth. Transfer the chocolate mixture to the fondue pot. You can use marshmallows, strawberries, bananas, or apples to dip in the chocolate fondue. Enjoy!

25190.question: How To Make Fondue
25190.gt: To make basic cheese fondue, choose 1 pound of cheese that's suitable for fondue, like Swiss, Fontina, Gruyere, or cheddar, and shred it with a cheese grater. Next, mix 1 cup of white wine with 1-2 teaspoons of flour over low heat on the stove top, stirring until it looks smooth. Then, combine the cheese and wine mixture on the stove. Finally, transfer the cheese mixture to your fondue pot and light the pot to keep the cheese warm and melted.
25190.pred: To make fondue, you will need a fondue dish, a fondue fork, a bottle of white wine, a clove of garlic, a bag of cheese, a measuring cup, a whisk, a knife, a cutting board, a loaf of bread, a bowl, a spoon, a grater, a bowl of cherry tomatoes, a bowl of pears, and a candle. First, rub the inside of the fondue dish with garlic. Then, add the white wine, cornstarch, and cherry schnups to the measuring cup and mix well. Next, cut the bread into bite-sized cubes and grate the cheese. Heat the liquid in the fondue dish and add the cheese. Stir occasionally until the cheese is melted. Add more wine if needed to achieve the desired consistency. Finally, add freshly grated nutmeg and serve with cherry tomatoes and pears. Enjoy!

25363.question: How To Use a Guitar Whammy Bar
25363.gt: If you want to create a unique sound with your electric guitar, try attaching a whammy bar to it. First, make sure that your guitar can mount a whammy bar. You should see a small hole near the bridge of your guitar where the whammy bar will go. Since whammy bars come in different sizes, you may want to take your guitar to a music shop to make sure you get the right one. When you’re ready to use your whammy bar, plug your guitar into an amp, play a note, and gently push the bar down to drop the pitch of the sound. Practice playing chords and riffs with the whammy bar added. You can also pull up on the whammy to raise the pitch.
25363.pred: The video provides a lesson on how to use a guitar whammy bar. The man in the video demonstrates how to use the whammy bar to enhance the sound of the guitar. He explains that the whammy bar is an integral part of the playing style of guitar players like Jeff Beck and Dave Gilmour. He also shows how to use the whammy bar to create feedback and harmonics. The video provides a step-by-step guide on how to use the whammy bar to enhance the sound of the guitar.

25564.question: How To Clean Up Dog Waste from a Backyard
25564.gt: To remove dog waste from your backyard, try gathering it up every day in a plastic bag. Place your hand inside the bag like a glove, put the bag over the poo, and pull the bag down over it so you don't have to touch it directly. Alternatively, you can use a pooper scooper, which you can buy online or from a pet store. This is a shovel-like device that picks up the poo for you so you can dispose of it. Another option is to apply freeze spray to the poo, which will make it easier to remove later. To use the spray, hold the can a few inches from the poo, spray it for 2 or 3 seconds, and wait for it to harden. Whichever method you decide to use, make sure you dispose of the poo in a trash can, since dog waste can be harmful to humans if it's left lying around.
25564.pred: To clean up dog waste from a backyard, you can use a shovel to dig a hole and then place a piece of slate over it. This will create a natural composting puppy poop hole that can be easily hidden from view. Additionally, you can use a post hole digger to create a hole and then fill it with dirt to cover up any evidence of the old hole. By following these steps, you can maintain a clean and tidy backyard while still providing a safe and comfortable space for your dog to do their business.

25727.question: How To Make Pruno
25727.gt: To make pruno, start by putting some orange wedges and fruit cocktail in a bag, sealing it, and then mashing everything together with your fingers. Next, pour water into the bag and then place it in a sink or bowl filled with hot water, adding new hot water every 5 minutes for 15 minutes. After 15 minutes, wrap the bag in a towel and set it aside somewhere dark for 48 hours. Then, add sugar and ketchup to the bag and let it dissolve for 15 minutes before heating it in hot water again. Finally, wrap the bag and hide it for 24 hours, repeating the heating process every day for 3 days.
25727.pred: To make pruno, you will need to peel and mash ten oranges, add an 8 oz can of fruit cocktail, six teaspoons of ketchup, and 50 cubes of sugar. Then, add 16 ounces of tap water and wrap the mixture in a tarp to keep it warm and dark. Every day for nine days, you will need to reheat the mixture for 15 minutes under warm water and burp it. After nine days, you can strain the mixture and enjoy your homemade pruno.

25733.question: How To Make Watermelon Wine
25733.gt: To make watermelon wine, heat chunks of watermelon over a medium heat for 30 minutes so they break down into juice. Then, strain 14 cups of juice to get rid of any seeds before adding the juice to a pot with sugar. Heat the pot until it's almost boiling, then add acid blend and yeast nutrient. Next, transfer the juice to a fermentation container and wait 24 hours before adding champagne yeast. After another day, rack the wine, then leave it for 3 months. Finally, rack the wine again, leave it for 2 months, rack it for a third time, and leave it  for another month.
25733.pred: To make watermelon wine, you will need six watermelons, a green bag, a bucket, a knife, a cookie sheet, a potato masher, a pot, a colander, a strainer, a bottle of white grape juice, a bag of sugar, a bag of yeast, a bag of potassium metabisulfite, a bag of wine tannin, a bag of acid blend, a bag of yeast nutrient, a bag of yeast, a measuring cup, a straw, and a hydrometer. First, you will need to sanitize all the equipment you will be using. Then, you will need to cut the watermelons in half and remove the rind. Next, you will need to mash the watermelons in the pot and let it cool. After that, you will need to add sugar, white grape juice, yeast, potassium metabisulfite, wine tannin, acid blend, and yeast nutrient to the pot. Finally, you will need to cover the pot with a lid and let it ferment for 24 hours.

25737.question: How To Make Wine Glass Charms
25737.gt: To make wine glass charms, start by picking up some ring-sized memory wire from the craft store. If you have longer memory wire, use heavy-duty wire cutters to cut it to about an inch and a half. Next, use a pair of pliers to pinch the end of the wire into a small loop. Now that you’ve secured one end of the wire, add beads or charms. Once you’ve affixed all the decorations you want, make another loop at the other end of the wire. Finally, attach the charm to a wine glass.
25737.pred: To make wine glass charms, you will need a ruler, 20 gauge craft wire, a 1 inch cylindrical shape, wire cutters, nose pliers, charms, 4 millimeter jump rings, and beads. First, measure out 4 inches of wire and snip it at the 4 inch point. Then, press the wire against the cylindrical shape and curve both sides around it. Next, use the nose pliers to create a hook on one end of the wire. Add beads and charms to the wire, and use jump rings to attach the charms. Finally, use the nose pliers to close the wire around the cylindrical shape, creating a wine glass charm.

25849.question: How To Use Stevia
25849.gt: To use stevia, use a few drops of it as a substitute for 1-2 teaspoons of white sugar. You can add the drops to drinks, sauces, salad dressings, and soups. If you have stevia powder, use half as much as you normally would for sugar. For example, if you're baking something and it calls for 1 cup of sugar, use 1/2 cup of stevia instead.
25849.pred: To use stevia, you can add a teaspoon of the powdered stevia to water and mix it up. This will create a sweetener that you can use in place of sugar. You can also use the stevia extract in recipes that call for sugar.

25935.question: How To Make Rum
25935.gt: To make rum, dissolve sugar and molasses in hot water, let it cool, and add hydrated yeast. Let that mixture ferment for a couple days before you chill it to knock the yeast to the bottom of the bucket. Then, distill the rum by running a siphon from the mash to a collection tank. As the rum evaporates, it will condense in the siphon and flow into the other container.
25935.pred: To make rum, you will need 9 pounds of unsalted molasses, 4 pounds of raw sugar, 6 gallons of water, 1 tablespoon of D.D.V. Yeast, and 2 tablespoons of Fermax Yeast Nutrient. First, mix the molasses and sugar in a large container. Then, add the water and yeast to the mixture. Stir the mixture well and let it sit for a few days. After that, add the Fermax Yeast Nutrient and let the mixture sit for a few more days. Once the mixture has fermented, it's time to distill the rum. You can use a still to distill the rum, or you can use a different method, such as adding coconut extract to the distilled rum. The distilled rum can be stored in a bottle and enjoyed later.

26654.question: How To Make Chocolate Martinis
26654.gt: To make a classic chocolate martini, first prepare the garnish by placing chocolate liqueur and cocoa powder in separate dishes. Next, dunk the rim of a martini glass into the liqueur and then the cocoa powder to coat the rim. Then, add ice, liqueur, vodka, and half and half to a cocktail shaker and shake for 20 seconds until the ingredients are thoroughly combined. Finally, pour the martini into the rimmed glass and serve while chilled.
26654.pred: To make a chocolate martini, you will need a martini glass, a shaker, and a bottle of chocolate syrup. First, chill the martini glass in the freezer. Then, fill the shaker with ice and add two parts of smaroff vanilla vodka, one part of drono amoretto, and one part of gadiva dark and white chocolate liqueur. Shake the mixture well and strain it into the chilled martini glass. Finally, drizzle a little bit of chocolate syrup on the rim of the glass to make it look fancy.

27166.question: How To Give a Rectal Exam
27166.gt: To give a rectal exam, first lubricate your gloved finger with warm petroleum jelly to keep the anal canal relaxed. Then, with your patient on their side, assess their anus for abnormalities, such as hemorrhoids, warts, rashes, or fissures. When you’ve checked their anus, ask your patient to take a deep breath to relax them and prevent their sphincter contracting. Next, part their buttocks and gently insert your finger into their anal canal. Once your finger is inside, rotate it to feel for any abnormalities, like bumps, hard spots, soft spots, or fissures.

Then, you need to insert your finger gently into the anal canal and palpate the prostate anteriorly (for males). Rotate your finger 360 degrees to assess the anal canal, and assess the anal tone. Finally, withdraw your finger and inspect it for blood, stool, or mucus. Wipe away any excess lubricant, re-cover the patient, and dispose of the used equipment.

27322.question: How To Infuse Vodka With Watermelon
27322.gt: To infuse vodka with watermelon, start by cutting a watermelon up into small, 1-inch cubes. Then, place the cubes in a jar and fill the jar with vodka so the cubes are completely submerged. Next, seal the jar and store it in a cool, dark place for at least 6 days. Finally, place a cheesecloth or tea towel over the mouth of the jar and strain the watermelon-infused vodka into a new container.
27322.pred: To infuse vodka with watermelon, you need to cut a hole in the watermelon and insert a bottle of vodka. The vodka will seep into the watermelon, infusing it with the flavor.

27328.question: How To Make Alcohol from Common Table Sugar
27328.gt: To make alcohol from common table sugar, start by getting a food-grade plastic container or a glass carboy to use as a fermentation vessel for your alcohol. Then, dissolve 15-20 pounds of sugar in a pot of warm water before pouring it into your fermentation vessel. Next, add a packet of yeast and let the mixture sit, uncovered, for 24 hours. After 24 hours, put the lid on the vessel, attach a water-filled airlock to the lid, and let the mixture ferment for 2-10 days. Finally, purify the fermented alcohol before siphoning it off.
27328.pred: The video does not provide information on how to make alcohol from common table sugar.

27717.question: How To Make Hungarian Goulash
27717.gt: To make Hungarian goulash, saute a chopped onion in vegetable oil over medium heat until it turns golden. Remove the pan from the heat, then stir in paprika, cubed beef, a pinch of salt, and water to the pan and put it back on the heat. Cook the ingredients for 6-8 minutes, then add all of the remaining ingredients except the potatoes and simmer until the meat is nearly cooked. Add the potatoes and turn down the heat, simmering for another 20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender.
27717.pred: To make Hungarian goulash, you will need the following ingredients: 1.5 lbs of beef, 1 onion, 2 carrots, 1/2 cup of flour, 1/2 cup of paprika, 1/2 cup of garlic, 1/2 cup of black pepper, 1/2 cup of salt, and 1/2 cup of carrots. First, heat up a pan with oil and add the beef, onions, and carrots. Cook for 5-10 minutes until the vegetables are soft. Then, add the flour and stir until it becomes a paste. Next, add the paprika, garlic, and black pepper. Stir everything together and let it cook for 20 minutes. Finally, add the salt and carrots and let it cook for another 20 minutes. Serve with mashed potatoes and enjoy your delicious Hungarian goulash!

27762.question: How To Make Resin Jewelry
27762.gt: To make resin jewelry, start by combining equal amounts of polyurethane casting resin and a resin catalyst. Then, pour enough of the mixture into a jewelry mold to cover the bottom of the mold. Next, turn on a hair dryer and hold it 4 inches above the resin to remove any air bubbles. Let the resin harden for 15 minutes, then add your embellishments, such as flowers or feathers, and pour another layer of resin over the embellishment. Afterwards, use the hair dryer again to remove any bubbles, then cover the mold and let the resin cure overnight.
27762.pred: To make resin jewelry, you will need to mix resin and hardener in a cup, add dye to the mixture, and pour it into molds. You can also add findings like charms, beads, and filigree to the molds. Once the resin has cured, you can remove the objects from the molds and have finished pieces.

Next, either allow it to dry overnight or use a hairdryer, then use tweezers to place the dry silver clay onto a piece of stainless steel mesh over a stove burner. 28080.question: How To Install Carpet on Concrete (Basement)
28080.gt: To install carpet on concrete, choose a carpet that is constructed of synthetic products only as natural fibers are often too absorbent. Before you install the carpet, make sure to check the concrete for any moisture issues that need to be addressed. Then, lay tack strips around the perimeter of the room and install your strips of padding. After that, lay your carpet, starting at the center of the room and tightening the carpet with a rented knee kicker as you move toward the walls. Finally, finish with your edges.
28080.pred: To install carpet on concrete, you need to first remove the old carpet and under padding. Then, place the new under padding on the concrete floor and tape the seams. After that, install the new carpet and vacuum it thoroughly.

28351.question: How To Remove a Coffee Stain from Carpet
28351.gt: To remove a coffee stain from your carpet, start by mixing a solution of 2 cups of warm water and 1/4 cup of lemon juice. Alternatively, you can combine 1 tablespoon of dish soap, 1 tablespoon of white vinegar, and 2 cups of warm water. Apply your homemade cleaner, and soak up the excess coffee with paper towels. Next, dip a cleaning towel into the solution and press it onto the stained area of carpet. Finally, spray the stained area with water to remove any leftover cleaning solution.
28351.pred: To remove a coffee stain from carpet, first, spray the stain with water to make it damp. Then, generously spray the stain with 3% hydrogen peroxide. Place a wet, clean rag over the stain and place an iron on top to steam for 20 to 30 seconds. The stain will come up into the cloth. Be careful not to burn or melt the carpet. Repeat the process until the stain is gone. Finally, rinse the stain with water to remove any residual hydrogen peroxide.

28358.question: How To Get Adhesive out of Carpet
28358.gt: To get adhesive out of carpet, such as household glue, remove as much of the glue as possible from the carpet by blotting with a damp towel or using a spoon or knife to scrape up the adhesive if it has dried. Then, pour distilled white vinegar onto a towel and wipe the area thoroughly for at least 1 minute. Let the vinegar soak into the carpet for 15 minutes before wiping the area with a wet cloth to remove the adhesive. You may need to peel some flakes of glue off of the carpet as you’re wiping to clean it completely.
28358.pred: To remove adhesive from a carpet, you should act quickly and use a sharp knife to carefully scrape away any residue. If the adhesive has hardened, you may need to scrape for a longer period to loosen the substance from the carpet fibers. After scraping, cover the stain with a thin cloth and use a household iron to heat up the adhesive. The adhesive should soften and be absorbed into the cloth. As a last resort, you can use a pair of household scissors to cut the affected area of the carpet. This method only works on thick carpets with long fibers.

28364.question: How To Get Tar out of Carpet
28364.gt: If you’re trying to get tar out of carpet, start by blotting it with a paper towel. Then hold an ice cube against the stain for a minute. When the tar feels hard, use a butter knife or a spoon to scrape up as much as you can. To remove what’s left, you can try wetting a cloth with water and dry cleaning solvent and gently dabbing the stain. If that doesn’t work, try mixing a little dishwashing detergent with some water and blotting the stain. Got a really stubborn stain? You may need to try a commercial product, like WD-40.
28364.pred: To remove tar from a carpet, first, determine if the stain is hard or soft. If it is soft, use a bag of ice or compressed air to stiffen the spot. If it is hard, scrape the tar with a dull edge to remove any residue. Vacuum the tar stain to get rid of any remaining particles. To create a cleaning solution, mix 1 cup warm water and 1 tsp of liquid dish soap. Apply this cleaning solution directly to the tar stain. Slowly work from the outside of the tar stain to the center, moving slowly inward so you don't spread the stain further onto the carpet. Rinse the tar stain with cold water and continue applying the soap solution until the stain disappears. Blot dry the area with paper towels or a shop vac. Another method is to Moisten the affected area of the carpet with 3% hydrogen peroxide or rubbing alcohol. Let the tar stain sit for 1 minute. Blot with a paper towel to absorb any remaining stain. Apply a few paper towels directly onto the area with a weight and let it sit overnight. For more spot cleaning solution visit http://spotremoval.coit.com.

28436.question: How To Tape and Mud Drywall
28436.gt: To tape and mud drywall, use a drywall knife to spread a liberal amount of drywall mud into the seam between 2 drywall boards, then run the trowel over the freshly-mudded sections. Before the mud dries, press a strip of paper tape into the freshly mudded joint, starting at one corner and working your way to another. Seal the tape with your trowel, let it dry overnight, then sand the first coat. Repeat this process with a thicker layer of mud for 2 additional coats.
28436.pred: To tape and mud drywall, you will need a 6-inch taping knife, an 8-inch finishing knife, and a 12-inch finishing knife. First, apply a 5-inch wide layer of mud to the joint, then apply standard paper drywall tape to the joint. You can apply the tape directly to the compound or pre-wet the tape in a bucket of water and smooth it out before applying it. Use the 6-inch taping knife to apply the mud and remove it from the tape. Use the 8-inch and 12-inch finishing knives to clean up the edges of the mud and tape. Once the mud and tape have dried overnight, you can sand the surface with a sponge or a drywall sanding pole with an open-faced paper.

29733.question: How To Fix Brakes on a Bike
29733.gt: If your bike’s brake pads are worn to less than ¼ of an inch, you’ll have to replace the pads. To do so, remove the nuts and washers from your old pads and pull the pads free from the calipers, which squeeze the pads to the tires to make the bike stop. Then, put the new pads in, align them with the tires, and replace the nuts and washers. If you need to adjust your brake’s calipers, tighten the spring on the side that’s moving too much by bending it with pliers. For brake cables that are really stiff or hard to work, remove them completely and lubricate them.
29733.pred: To fix brakes on a bike, you need to first check if the brakes are rubbing on the rim. If they are, you can tighten the brakes by using the barrel adjusters. If the brakes are not tight enough, you can open up the V brake and tighten the brake cable. You can use an Allen wrench to unscrew the V brake and tighten the brake cable. Once the brake cable is tight, you can close the V brake and tighten the barrel adjuster. This will ensure that the brakes are not rubbing on the wheel and are at the exact tension you want them to be.

30229.question: How To Cook Barley
30229.gt: If you want to cook barley, combine 2 to 3 cups of water with 1 cup of barley. After you've brought the water to a boil, let the pan simmer for 30 minutes. Then, leave the barley to sit for 15 minutes so it can absorb excess water. If you want to bake barley instead, preheat your oven to 375 °F and boil 2 cups of water in a saucepan. Pour the barley into a baking dish and add the boiling water, then mix in 1 tablespoon of butter and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Bake for 60 minutes.
30229.pred: To cook barley, you should rinse it in a bowl of water to remove any debris and grit. Then, add salt to the water and cook the barley like pasta. This method will make the barley cook faster and come out perfect every time.

31157.question: How To Shift a Semi Truck
31157.gt: To shift gears in a semi truck, start by pushing down on the clutch pedal and moving the shifter into the Lo-gear position. Next, push down on the accelerator, release the clutch, then depress the clutch slightly as you pull the gear shift into neutral. Then, depress the clutch all the way to the floor, and push the gear shift into first as you release the clutch. Continue this pattern for the first half of the gears, then flip the range selector to 5-H, or fifth gear, to avoid grinding gears when you switch back into the first position.
31157.pred: The man in the video demonstrates how to shift a semi truck by using the gear shifter and the clutch. He explains that the truck has 18 gears and shows how to use the gear shifter to shift between them. He also explains how to use the clutch to shift gears smoothly. The man emphasizes the importance of using the correct gear for the situation, such as using low gears for steep hills and high gears for flat roads. He also demonstrates how to use the clutch to shift gears smoothly and avoid jerking the truck. Overall, the video provides a comprehensive guide on how to shift a semi truck safely and efficiently.

32087.question: How To Apply Dry Rub to Chicken
32087.gt: To apply dry rub to chicken, start by defrosting the chicken if you haven't already. Then, dry off the chicken by patting it with a paper towel and sprinkle your dry rub mix over it. Next, using your hands, rub the mix all over the chicken so all of the chicken is coated with an even layer. Finally, cover the chicken with plastic wrap and refrigerate it for at least an hour before cooking it.

32107.question: How To Butterfly a Chicken
32107.gt: If you want to butterfly a chicken, place the chicken on your cutting board with the breast-side down and the backbone facing up. Use kitchen shears to cut along both sides of the backbone, from the bottom to the top. Remove the backbone and flip the chicken over, and use your hands to press down on the wing and leg joints of the bird. You should feel it flatten out beneath your hands.
32107.pred: To butterfly a chicken, you need to remove the backbone and flatten the chicken. First, pat the chicken dry and flip it so that the back is up. Then, use poultry or kitchen shears to cut along each side of the spine. After that, lay the chicken flat and make a notch in the white cartilage in the breastbone at the neck end and a slit on either side of the cartilage. Pop out the breastbone and remove it entirely. Finally, tuck the wings to keep things neat.

32204.question: How To Make Chicken Enchiladas
32204.gt: To make spicy chicken enchiladas, start by heating cooked chicken, sour cream, cheese, parsley, oregano, onion, and pepper in a pan over medium heat. Once the cheese melts, stir in the tomato sauce, salt, water, chili powder, green pepper, and garlic. Then, use a spoon to scoop some of the mixture onto each tortilla and roll them tightly. Finally, cover the tortillas in taco sauce and bake them for 20 minutes at 350°F.
32204.pred: To make chicken enchiladas, you will need to start by seasoning a breast of chicken with salt and pepper. Then, add the chicken to a skillet with enchilada sauce and minced garlic, and cook it for 15 to 20 minutes until fully cooked. After that, shred the chicken and mix it with enchilada sauce, Monterey Jack cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, and chopped cilantro. Next, roll the tortillas and place them in a baking dish. Brush the tortillas with olive oil or cooking spray and bake them in the oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Pour the remaining enchilada sauce and cheese over the tortillas, sprinkle cilantro, and cover with tinfoil. Bake for 20 minutes, then remove the tinfoil and continue baking for 5 to 10 minutes until the cheese is golden and juicy. Finally, let the enchiladas sit for five minutes before serving.

32213.question: How To Make Chicken Kiev
32213.gt: To make chicken Kiev, start by mixing together butter, parsley, tarragon, salt, and pepper and rolling the mixture up into a log shape on a piece of plastic wrap. Then, freeze the mixture for 2 hours. While that's in the freezer, flatten some chicken breast halves so they're 1/4 inch thick. When you're finished, spoon the frozen mixture and some breadcrumbs onto each chicken breast and then roll them up, refrigerating them for 2 hours. Finally, bread and fry the chicken rolls before baking them in the oven for 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
32213.pred: To make chicken kiev, you will need four chicken breasts, four rashers of smoked streaky bacon, and a homemade garlic and herb butter. First, fry the bacon until crispy and set it aside. Then, make a pocket in the chicken breasts and stuff them with the butter and bacon. Coat the chicken in flour, egg, and breadcrumbs, and fry them in a non-stick pan with sunflower oil until golden brown. Finally, bake the chicken kiev in the oven for 10 minutes at 180 degrees. Serve with mashed potatoes and a side salad.

32228.question: How To Make Chicken Pot Pie
32228.gt: To make chicken pot pie, first make the crust by mixing flour, salt, butter, shortening, and ice water and forming the dough into a flat disc. Then, put the crust in the fridge, and saute chopped onions, carrots, and celery over medium heat for 10 minutes. Next, add flour, chicken stock, and milk to the pan, and let it simmer until it thickens. After that, add chicken, peas, and seasonings to the pan, and let everything simmer for 5 more minutes. Finally, pour the filling into a pie dish lined with half the crust, drape the other half of the crust over the top, and bake the pie for 20 minutes at 400 degrees Fahrenheit.
32228.pred: To make chicken pot pie, you will need to start by boiling potatoes in a pot. Then, you will need to melt butter in a pan and add chopped onions to it. After that, you will need to add the chicken and potatoes to the pan and mix it well. Finally, you will need to add the mixture to a pie crust and bake it in the oven.

32231.question: How To Make Chicken Spaghetti
32231.gt: To make chicken spaghetti, saute the onion with seasoned salt, garlic powder, cream of chicken soup, milk, and cubed cheese in a saucepan to create the sauce. Next, boil and drain the noodles and add them to the sauce. Then, add 3 cups of chicken to the sauce mixture and pour it all into a greased baking dish. Finally, cover the dish with foil and bake it at 350°F for 20 minutes. Top it with shredded cheese and bake the dish uncovered for 5 more minutes before serving it.

Finally, add the cooked spaghetti to the pot and stir until it is well combined. Serve the chicken spaghetti with some rolls and a side of green beans or a salad.

32242.question: How To Make Cordon Bleu
32242.gt: To make cordon bleu, first use a meat mallet to flatten chicken breasts to a thickness of about 1/4 inch. Then, lay 1 to 2 slices of Swiss cheese and ham on top of the flattened breasts. Roll the chicken around the ham and cheese and secure it with 2 wooden toothpicks. Once you've made the rolls, dip each one in an egg wash followed by bread crumbs before placing them in a baking dish. Bake the chicken at 375 degrees Fahrenheit for 45 minutes, or until it's cooked thoroughly.

Then, you will need to dip the chicken breast in egg and bread crumbs. Finally, you will need to cook the chicken breast in a pan.

32484.question: How To Do a Banded Dutch on a Poodle
32484.gt: To do a banded dutch trim on your poodle, first use a number 10 clipper to shave your dog’s face and throat. You can then create one of the trim's signature bands by shaving a band around its neck about a half inch to an inch above its shoulder blades. Once you’ve finished shaving this neck line, make sure your poodle is securely standing still and shave a vertical line down its back from its shoulder blades to the base of its tail. Afterwards, create the waist band by shaving a horizontal line from its last rib to its underside on both the right and left sides. To finish off the trim, shave a 2 to 3-inch wide band all the way around your dog’s tail.
32484.pred:
To do a banded dutch on a poodle, you will need to follow these steps:
1. Start by sectioning the hair into three parts and securing them with rubber bands.
2. Take a small section of hair from the top of the head and twist it into a two-strand twist.
3. Wrap the ends of the twist around the base of the hair to create a band.
4. Repeat this process for each section of hair, working your way down the head.
5. Once you have completed the banded dutch, you can add accessories such as hair clips or beads to complete the look.
Remember to use a comb to create a smooth and even texture before starting the banded dutch.

32684.question: How To Make a Bahama Mama
32684.gt: To make a classic Bahama Mama cocktail, fill a tall glass with ice, then pour in your dark and white rums. Next, add 1 ounce of flavored liquor, followed by your fruit juices and grenadine. Then, place a metal cocktail shaker over your glass, making sure to place it firmly so that it creates a seal. Shake well for 2 to 3 seconds, then pour the drink into your serving glass.
32684.pred: To make a Bahama Mama, you will need the following ingredients: 1 oz of rum, 1/2 oz of peach snaps, half a cranberry juice, and half an orange juice. First, fill a glass with ice. Then, pour the rum, peach snaps, cranberry juice, and orange juice into the glass. Stir the drink well and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Enjoy your refreshing Bahama Mama cocktail!

33155.question: How To Use a Flash Pass at Six Flags
33155.gt: To use a Flash Pass at Six Flags, you'll need to buy it at the entrance, or book it online and collect it when you arrive. Your Flash Pass will come in the form of a Q-Bot, which is a small beeper that lets you reserve rides. Check online to see which rides your Flash Pass works for, although it usually covers all the major rides in the park. To make reservations, scan your Q-Bot on the scanning station in front of each ride, or do it directly from your Q-Bot. When your Q-Bot vibrates to notify you of your reservation, head to the Flash Pass entrance for the ride you booked. At the end of the day, make sure you return your Q-Bot so you don’t get charged a fee.
33155.pred: To use a flash pass at Six Flags, you need to make a reservation for up to six people on your favorite attractions using a single pager type device. This eliminates the need to physically stand in line. You can choose between regular or gold level, with gold level eliminating a significant portion of the wait time of the actual ride line length. To make your first reservation, scroll through the list of rides available next to the reservation time using the up and down arrows to select. Press the circle button under the word reserved and you'll receive a confirmation of your reservation. Your reservation will be honored at the actual time or anytime after your reservation. You cannot be early to your reservation. When your reservation time has arrived, the device will beep and vibrate to let you know that it's your time to ride. You should proceed to the ride and enter through the special entrance marked with signs. When you enter the ride, please allow the ride attendant to confirm your reservation and allow access to the ride. Remember that you can only enter at your reservation time or later. To reserve your next ride, you just scroll through the list of rides and choose another ride. If you wish to cancel your reservation, you should press the button on the right side below the word cancel and will be asked to confirm the cancellation. If you have any questions or issues that arise throughout your day, please stop by the registration center and ask any attendant for help. From time to time, you may receive special messages or discounts on your device. At the end of your day, don't forget to return the device to the registration office.

33343.question: How To Make Lollipops
33343.gt: If you want to make lollipops, combine sugar, light corn syrup, and water in a small saucepan over medium heat and stir until the sugar is dissolved. Bring the mixture to a boil, then continue to cook it until it reaches the hard-crack stage, or 300 to 310 °F. Take the saucepan off the stove, then stir in your flavoring oil and gel food coloring. When the mixture stops bubbling, use a metal spoon to pour it into the molds or onto a greased baking sheet. Place the lollipops sticks halfway into the candy while it is still soft, then let the candy harden.
33343.pred: To make lollipops, you need to start by pouring hot sugar into a tray and adding flavoring. Then, you need to stir the mixture carefully to boil all the water out. After that, you can add citric acid to the mixture. Once the candy is cooled down, you can fold it over and over again until it becomes white. Then, you can assemble the candy and make it into a heart shape. Finally, you can insert a wooden stick into the candy to make it into a lollipop.

33645.question: How To Make Your Own Air Freshener
33645.gt: To make your own air freshener, start by pouring 2 tablespoons of vodka, rubbing alcohol, or witch hazel in a glass or high-quality plastic spray bottle. Then, add 15-20 drops of your favorite essential oils, like lavender, eucalyptus, chamomile, and lemon. Finally, add 3/4 cup of water to the bottle and shake everything together. To use your air freshener, simply shake the bottle and spritz the mixture 3-4 times in a room.

Then, add 30-40 drops of essential oil, such as lemon, to the baking soda. Next, add three cups of water to the mixture. Use a funnel to pour the mixture into the spray bottle. Finally, shake the bottle well to mix the ingredients. You can use this air freshener on upholstery, furniture, or to kill odors in the air.

33684.question: How To Make Strawberry Tarts
33684.gt: To make strawberry tarts, start by mixing egg yolk, water, vanilla extract, flour, sugar, salt, and butter to make the dough for the crust. Then, refrigerate the dough for 30 minutes, roll it out into a circle, and transfer it to a tart tin. Next, bake the crust for 25 minutes at 350 degrees Fahrenheit. While the crust is baking, beat cream cheese, heavy cream, vanilla extract, and confectioner's sugar to make the filling. Finally, pour the filling into the crust and top the tart with cut strawberries and red currant glaze.
33684.pred: To make strawberry tarts, you will need to start by making a pastry cream. In a heavy-bottomed pot, bring a cup of milk to a simmer on medium heat. Add a teaspoon and a half of vanilla bean paste and three egg yolks. Whisk everything together and add two tablespoons of cornstarch. Gradually add hot milk to the mixture to temper it. Cook the mixture on medium heat until it thickens. Strain the mixture and let it cool. For the crust, mix a cup of plain graham cracker crumbs with a cup of flour, four teaspoons of sugar, and a pinch of salt. Melt half a cup of unsalted butter and mix it with the crumbs. Press the mixture into a mini tart pan and bake for ten minutes. Once the crust is cooled, fill it with the pastry cream. Top with strawberry halves and serve.

33814.question: How To Clean Amethyst
33814.gt: To clean amethyst, start by soaking your gem in soapy water for 15-20 minutes to loosen up any dirt. If your amethyst is too large to submerge, use a wet, warm washcloth and some dish detergent to wipe down the gemstone. Next, use a toothbrush to remove any grime stuck to the amethyst. Then, rinse it off in warm water, and allow it to air dry completely before using it or putting it away.
33814.pred: To clean amethyst, you can use a combination of soap and water, bright sunlight, salt, or Penny Royal. First, wash the crystal in warm soapy water. Then, place it in bright sunlight to charge it. If the crystal has been owned by a negative person, you can cover it in plain salt to absorb the negativity. If you don't have salt, you can bury the crystal in fresh earth with seedlings to bring new life. Another method is to use Penny Royal, a liquid oil, to clean the crystal. However, be careful not to get Penny Royal on your body.

33839.question: How To Polish Quartz Crystals
33839.gt: To polish quartz crystals, start by using a toothbrush and water to remove any dirt from them. Next, remove any stains by soaking the crystals in vinegar for 8-12 hours, then soaking them in washing ammonium for an equal amount of time. Once the crystals are clean, put on safety goggles, gloves, and an air mask to protect yourself from the dust and powder. Then, polish your crystals by sanding them with 50 grade sandpaper, followed by 150 grade, and finish with 300 or 600 grade sandpaper. Finally, rub the crystals with a soft cloth to make them shine.
33839.pred: To polish quartz crystals, you need to use a base lab and run water on it to make it stick. Then, you can use a floppy disk produced by 3M, which is a cerium oxide, to polish the quartz. You can add extra cerium oxide to the floppy disk to make it more effective. However, you need to turn the water down so that it doesn't wash off the cerium oxide. You can also use a q-tip to rub some cerium oxide on the center of the floppy disk. The technique of using cerium oxide increases the polishing of the quartz. If you see scratches on the stone, it may be because you have a hole in the floppy disk, and you need to use a different part of the lab or replace the floppy disk. The size of the facet takes significantly more time to polish, but using the floppy disk with cerium oxide will speed up the polishing process.

34796.question: How To Bake Cookies on Your Car Dashboard
34796.gt: To bake cookies on your car dashboard, you'll need to be parked in a sunny spot on a day when it's at least 95 degrees Fahrenheit out. First, spread cookie dough out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Then, set the baking sheet on your car dashboard, and shut all of the doors. Finally, check on the cookies every 15-30 minutes until the edges of the cookies are firm and you're able to slide them off the parchment paper.
34796.pred: To bake cookies on your car dashboard, you will need a non-stick cooking spray, a cookie sheet, cookie dough, a plastic or silicone spatula, plastic wrap, a car, a thermometer that reads temperatures up to 250 degrees Fahrenheit, and a pod holder or towel. First, spray a cookie sheet with cooking spray. If you're using pre-made cookie dough, cut it into 1/4 inch thick slices and place them on the sheet about 2 inches apart. If you're using homemade dough, roll pieces into 1-inch balls and drop them onto the cookie sheet. Because of the low baking temperature, the eggs in the cookie dough may not cook completely. To reduce your risk of salmonella infection, use dough with pasteurized egg whites or search online for eggless dough recipes. Next, use a spatula to flatten the cookie slightly and cover with plastic wrap. Refrigerate until you're ready to hit the road. Then, find a very sunny spot to park your car in during the hottest part of the day, which is usually from 1pm to 4pm during the summer. Let it sit in the sun for at least 15 minutes. The temperature outside must be at least 95 degrees Fahrenheit in order for the inside of the car's temperature to bake the cookies. Place the cookie sheet on the dashboard and put a thermometer next to it so you can look through the windshield to check your car's temperature. The inside of the car should read at least 180 degrees Fahrenheit. Set the cookie sheet on a pod holder or towel to prevent damage to the dashboard. Be patient and wait anywhere from 2 to 3.5 hours for your cookies to cook completely. Don't open the car doors until at least 2 hours have passed. After 2 hours have passed or when the cookies look baked, open the door to check on them. If they stick to the sheet when you try to lift them with a spatula, they're not done yet. Let them cook for another 20 minutes or so. If they come up easily, the edges are firm and the center is no longer gooey, they're done. The finished cookies will be paler than those baked in a conventional oven at a higher temperature. Carefully remove the cookies from the car and watch them disappear.

34829.question: How To Keep Homemade Cookies Soft
34829.gt: To keep homemade cookies soft, let them cool for 2-3 minutes after they come out of the oven, transfer them to a cooling rack for 10-20 minutes, and make sure they've cooled completely before storing them. Put the cooled cookies in an air-tight container and store them in the fridge to preserve their softness. You can also place a slice of bread on top of the cookies before sealing the container, which helps them stay fresh and soft.
34829.pred: To keep homemade cookies soft, you can follow the tip provided in the video. The woman in the video suggests using a piece of bread to keep the cookies soft. She places the cookies in a Tupperware container and puts a piece of bread in the container with the cookies. The bread absorbs the moisture from the cookies, keeping them soft. If the bread gets too hard, you can replace it with a new piece of bread. The woman in the video shows how soft the cookies are after being stored in the container overnight.

34843.question: How To Make Anzac Biscuits
34843.gt: To make Anzac biscuits, start by combining oats, flour, sugar, and flaked coconut in a bowl. Then, heat butter and syrup in a pan, and make a paste out of boiling water and baking soda in a cup. Next, add the baking soda paste to the pan, and whisk the ingredients together. Afterwards, combine the wet and dry ingredients, roll the dough into walnut -sized balls, and place them on a greased baking tray. Finally, bake the biscuits at 350 degrees Fahrenheit for 18 to 20 minutes, or until their surfaces are golden brown.
34843.pred: To make anzac biscuits, you will need 100g of butter, 100g of plain flour, 90g of porridge oats, 90g of coconut, 100g of sugar, 1 tsp of bicarbonate of soda, 2 tbsp of boiling water, and 1 tbsp of golden/corn syrup. First, melt the butter in a saucepan over a low flame. Then, add the golden syrup and boiling water to the melted butter and stir. Next, add the bicarbonate of soda to the mixture and stir. In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, porridge oats, coconut, and sugar. Pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture and stir until fully combined. Use a spoon to scoop out the mixture and roll it into balls. Place the balls on a lined baking tray and flatten them slightly. Bake the biscuits in the oven at 325F for 9 minutes. Once baked, transfer the biscuits to a wire rack to cool down.

34932.question: How To Make Oatmeal Cookies
34932.gt: To make classic oatmeal raisin cookies, beat the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar with a mixer for 3-4 minutes until the mixture gets light and fluffy. Next, beat in the eggs and vanilla. Then, mix the flour, salt, cinnamon, baking soda, and oatmeal together in a separate bowl. Switch the mixer to low and gradually add the dry mixture to the batter before gently stirring in the raisins. Finally, drop spoonfuls of batter onto a nonstick cookie sheet and bake the cookies at 350 degrees for 10-12 minutes.
34932.pred: To make oatmeal cookies, you will need to cream one cup of unsalted butter and one cup of brown sugar in an electric hand mixer. Then, add two large eggs, one and a half teaspoons of vanilla extract, and 1/2 cup of white sugar. Set the wet ingredients aside and combine the dry ingredients, which include 1 3/4 cups of all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons of cornstarch, 1 teaspoon of baking soda, 3/4 teaspoon of salt, and 3/4 teaspoon of cinnamon. Fold the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, and then add 3 cups of old-fashioned oats. Chill the dough for 30 minutes, preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit, and drop the dough onto a prepared cookie sheet. Bake the cookies for 10 to 12 minutes or until the edges are lightly golden brown. Let the cookies cool completely on the cookie sheet.

35754.question: How To Make Egg Drop Soup
35754.gt: To make egg drop soup, start by bringing the broth or stock to a rolling boil in a deep saucepan or wok. Next, mix in the salt and white pepper and continue cooking the soup for another minute before turning off the heat. Then, slowly pour in the eggs through a fork while simultaneously whisking them with your free hand to get the shredded look this soup is known for. Finally, garnish your soup with onion or chow mein noodles and enjoy!
35754.pred: To make egg drop soup, you will need 4 cups of chicken stock, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, a thumb-sized grated ginger, a cup of mixed veggies, ground black pepper, sesame oil, 2 tablespoons of cornstarch, and 2 beaten eggs. First, add the chicken stock, soy sauce, grated ginger, mixed veggies, and ground black pepper to a pot and bring it to a boil. Then, add the sesame oil and stir. Next, add the cornstarch and water mixture to the pot and stir until it thickens. Finally, add the beaten eggs and stir continuously until it forms a ribbon effect. Garnish with green onions and serve.

36485.question: How To Remove Tree Stumps
36485.gt: To remove a tree stump, first use a shovel to dig up the soil around the tree so the roots are exposed. Then, cut the smaller roots up into pieces with loppers, and use a pruning or reciprocating saw to cut up the bigger roots. When you’re done, use a shovel or pry bar to lift the stump out of the ground. Fill in the leftover hole with soil and loam. For a faster method, you can rent a stump grinder from a home improvement store. Place the stump grinder over the stump, then slowly grind it away until it’s about 6 to 8 inches (15 to 20 centimeters) below the surface. Finish by filling in the hole with loam. To get rid of a tree stump using stump removal chemicals, first cut it as close to the ground as possible. Then, drill several holes into the top of the stump that are at least 10 inches (25 centimeters) deep. Fill the holes with a stump removal chemical, then wait 4 to 6 weeks for the stump to rot. Finally, break up the rotted stump with an axe and remove it from the ground.
36485.pred: To remove a tree stump, you can drill holes into the stump and fill them with vegetable oil. Let the oil soak in the stump for a long time, such as a month or so. This method is not the quickest way, but it can be fun and entertaining. It is important to note that this method should not be used on green stumps.

36493.question: How To Care for Frangipanis
36493.gt: Frangipani trees are easy to care for and can do very well in areas with extreme heat and droughts. While it’s best to plant a Frangipani in the ground if you live somewhere with harsh winters, plant it in a pot so you can move it indoors seasonally. Frangipanis need to be planted somewhere that gets at least 6 hours of sunlight a day. They also need fresh soil mixed with a high phosphorus fertilizer to thrive. Once you plant your Frangipani, water it thoroughly then give it some mulch or moss to help it retain moisture. As it grows, you’ll want to give it an inch of water a week, since these plants prefer dryer conditions.
36493.pred: To care for frangipanis, it is important to choose a location that receives at least 6 hours of sunlight and has well-drained soil. The soil should be lightened up with sand and potting soil to aid in drainage. Frangipanis can also be grown in pots, and a cactus mix can be used as a soil. The plants should be kept on the dry side during the winter months and watered regularly during the summer months. A fertilizer with a low nitrogen ratio, such as Dr. Earth Flower Girl, can be used to encourage flowering.

36519.question: How To Grow a Rubber Tree
36519.gt: To grow a rubber tree, start by lining the bottom of a pot with pebbles to improve its drainage. Then, plant a rubber tree in the pot using 1 part peat, 1 part pine bark, and 1 part sand or perlite. When you're finished, place your rubber tree in a warm spot that receives indirect sunlight. To care for your rubber tree, water it whenever the leaves start to droop, which can be once or twice a week in the summer and once every couple of months in the winter.
36519.pred: To grow a rubber tree, you need to provide it with bright indirect light, avoid overwatering, and use a well-balanced liquid plant food during the growing season. You should also clean the leaves regularly to remove any dust or dirt and inspect the plant for pests. The ideal temperature for a rubber tree is between 15 to 25 degrees Celsius, and it should not be exposed to cold drafts.

36580.question: How To Prune a Butterfly Bush
36580.gt: To prune a butterfly bush, start by identifying what kind of butterfly bush you have. If you have a buddleia davidii, which has dark purple flowers, prune it back 6 to 12 inches in early spring or late fall. Alternatively, if you have a buddleia alternifolia, which has light purple flowers, prune it in mid to late summer to about ⅓ its size. You should also pick or cut the flowers that have died while the plant is still flowering, and remove spent blooms at the end of the season.
36580.pred: To prune a butterfly bush, you should cut off the dead wood and branches that are not producing new growth. You should also cut the branches that are not in the center of the bush. The video shows a man cutting off dead wood and branches from a butterfly bush.

36835.question: How To Refinish Bathtubs
36835.gt: To refinish a bathtub, you'll need a bathtub reglazer or finish, which you can find for both spray-on and paint-on applications. When you're ready to get started, cut away all of the old caulk on your tub using a putty knife and clean the tub with a commercial cleaner. Then, tape off the edges of the tub and cover anything you don't want to refinish with plastic. Finally, apply 3 coats of the reglazer or finish to your bathtub, letting it dry for 15 minutes in between each coat. When you're finished, let the tub dry for at least 24 hours before using it again.
36835.pred: To refinish a bathtub, first, clean the bathtub thoroughly with Ajax or Comet and remove any soap residue. Then, use a razor blade to test if the surface is clean. Next, apply the Easy Edge kit to create a bond between the refinishing kit and the tub. After that, sand the tub and patch any holes or chips. Dry the tub with a blow dryer and use a tack cloth to clean any foreign materials. Apply the liquid primer and mix the color and hardener. Roll the paint with a foam brush and let it dry for 10 minutes before applying a second coat. Finally, remove the painter's tape and let the tub dry for 24 hours before caulking it with the Bathworks Pro caulking gun.

36942.question: How To Install Plastic Lawn Edging
36942.gt: To install plastic lawn edging, start by measuring the perimeter of your garden bed using rope to determine how much edging you'll need. Then, dig a 3-6 inch deep trench around your garden bed that's slightly wider than the width of the edging. Next, place the plastic edging in the trench so the lip on the bottom is pointing toward your garden bed and not the lawn. If you need multiple rolls of edging, use a connector to attach the ends of the rolls. Finally, fill the trench in with soil and install a stake every 5 feet along the edging.
36942.pred: To install plastic lawn edging, you need to first lay out the edging using a stringline, a painted line, or by measuring. Then, brush away any debris from the area where you want to install the edging. Dig a trench in the soil and place the edging in the trench. Fill the trench with dirt and gravel, and then cover the edging with more gravel. Finally, walk on the edging to compact the soil and gravel.

37009.question: How To Grow Vanilla
37009.gt: If you want to grow vanilla but don’t live in a tropical region, build a greenhouse that stays between 65 and 85°F, and maintain 85% humidity in the area. Then, fill a small pot with an orchid potting soil and make sure its pH is between 6.6 and 7.5. If it is, plant the vanilla cutting in the pot, mist it daily, and fertilize it weekly. Continue to care for the plant for 2 to7 years before it starts fruiting.
37009.pred: To grow vanilla, you need to provide the plant with the right growing conditions. Vanilla orchids prefer to be a little more damp than most orchids, so make sure the soil is moist but not soaking wet. They also need high humidity, which can be achieved by misting the plant or placing it in a humid environment. Vanilla orchids are vining plants, so they can be grown on a trellis or allowed to grow freely. They can also be trimmed if they become too tall. Fertilizing is important, but it should be done with a diluted fertilizer to avoid burning the roots. Vanilla orchids prefer strong sunlight, but it should be filtered through blinds or a shade to prevent burning. The ideal temperature for growing vanilla orchids is between 70 and 85 degrees Fahrenheit.

37354.question: How To Make a Medusa Costume
37354.gt: To turn your long hair into Medusa hair, start by curling your hair with a curling iron or foam rollers to create volume, which will help support the fake snakes. Create Medusa’s head of snakes by forming 10 to 12 small braids and weaving small rubber snakes in between the braids using elastics and pins. Alternatively, if you have short hair, you can recreate this look by purchasing a green wig and gluing rubber snakes throughout with a hot glue gun.
37354.pred: To make a Medusa costume, you will need to gather materials such as 16 gauge wires, snake print fabric, rhinestones, needle and thread, pins, and a pencil or similar skinny object. First, cut out a small piece of the snake fabric and fold it in half with the good side inside. Pin it together and stitch it up, leaving a 1-inch gap at the neck. Cut the thread and stitch up the other side. Next, use a pencil or similar skinny object to flip the entire shape inside out. Cut a piece of 16 gauge wire slightly longer than the size of your snake and bend the end of the wire so that the sharp edge doesn't rip the fabric. Insert a piece of batting into the hole that you left open where the head would be. Roll the batting together into a snake shape and attach it to the wire using hot glue. Insert the coated wire into the snake and stitch up the 1-inch hole that you left open. Add rhinestones to the snake headband and measure around your head to cut the wire with a little bit of excess. Glue the ends together and lay out the snakes in the desired pattern. Pull the fabric tight over the bottom of the wire and hot glue the extra flap. Repeat this process until all of the snakes are on. To wear the headpiece, lift the top portion of your hair, excluding your bangs, and place the crown over the top of your head. Bend and twist the snakes to blend in. To make the dress, cut a piece of black fabric that is 1 1/2 times your size widthwise and tall enough to go from your shoulder seam to the ground. Hold the fabric up to your figure and see where you would like the waistline to be. Fold the fabric in half and use a measuring tape to make sure each side is even. Stitch the fabric together, gather the fabric, and tie a knot in the thread where you would like the end of the fabric to be. Cut a line down the side of the dress and attach the back straps. Finally, make a belt by stitching two long strips of the snakeskin fabric together and tying it in the back.

37797.question: How To Make a Party Hat
37797.gt: To make a party hat, you'll need some colorful tagboard or construction paper. Cut a 10 inch diameter circle into your paper and fold the paper in half to find the center of the circle. Then, cut a small triangle from the center out to one side of your paper. Fold one side of the circle over the other, connecting the sides at the wedge you've cut. Glue, staple, or tape the two sides together to create a cone-shaped hat. Punch a hole in one side to add a chinstrap and decorate!
37797.pred: To make a party hat, you will need a cone-shaped hat, a piece of paper, a stapler, and a pair of scissors. First, cut a piece of paper to the same size as the cone-shaped hat. Then, fold the paper in half and staple it to the cone-shaped hat. Next, cut a piece of ribbon and tie it to the top of the cone-shaped hat. Finally, add a bow to the ribbon to complete the party hat.

38140.question: How To Make a Poodle Skirt Without a Pattern and With Minimal Sewing
38140.gt: To make an easy poodle skirt without a pattern, start by measuring your waist, adding 2 inches, and then dividing that number in half to get the radius for your skirt. Then, fold some felt fabric in half and insert a pin at the halfway point along the fold. Next, cut a piece of string that's the same length as the radius you found and tie one end to the pin and the other end to a pencil so you can draw a half circle on the fabric. After you draw the half circle, cut another piece of string that's as long as you want your skirt to be and use it to draw a second half circle. Finally, cut along the lines you drew to finish your skirt.
38140.pred: To make a poodle skirt without a pattern and with minimal sewing, you can follow these steps. First, draw a circle on a piece of paper and cut it out. Then, trace the circle onto a piece of fabric and cut it out. Next, cut a piece of red fabric to the same size as the circle. Place the red fabric on top of the circle fabric and sew them together. Finally, add a piece of tulle to the bottom of the skirt to make it fuller.

38306.question: How To Remove Yellowing from White Appliances
38306.gt: If you want to remove yellowing from white appliances, you can clean them weekly with some basic household products. For a simple and natural solution, try sprinkling a generous amount of baking soda on a damp cloth and wiping down your appliance. Then, wipe it down again with a clean, wet cloth. You can also make your own cleaning solution by combining warm water, bleach, and baking soda in a bucket. With gloved hands, dip a clean sponge in the solution, wring it out, and clean your stained appliances. Let the solution sit for 10 minutes before wiping the appliance down again with a wet sponge. Another way to remove yellowing from your white appliances is to use an all-purpose cleaning spray with bleach. You can also try using a magic eraser pad by wetting the sponge and wiping down the appliance thoroughly.
38306.pred: To remove yellowing from white appliances, you can use a mixture of hydrogen peroxide and cream. First, apply the mixture to the affected area and then place the appliance in a plastic bag. Leave the appliance in the bag for a few hours in direct sunlight. After that, remove the appliance and wipe it clean.

38941.question: How To Make a Sail
38941.gt: To make a sail, first sketch the luff curve using your boom and mast measurements. Next, choose a scratch-resistant material that works best for your budget and sailing needs, such as Monofilm or Pentex taffeta scrim laminate. Then, place your pattern onto your material and outline the panel, battens, and seams. Once you have your sail’s shape, cut out the panels, and stitch them together, leaving extra cloth at the edges for seams.
38941.pred: To make a sail, you will need a piece of fabric, a mast, and a sailboard. First, cut the fabric to the desired size and shape. Then, attach the fabric to the mast using a sailboard. Finally, attach the mast to the sailboard using a sailboard.

39046.question: How To Make a Pipe from a Soda Can
39046.gt: To make a pipe from a soda can, first rinse the can out with clean water and let it dry. Once the can has dried, use your thumb to make a small indentation on the side of the can. Next, punch several small holes close together in the base of the indentation with a needle, pin, or pen. Use a pen to make a larger hole somewhere else on the side of the can, which you’ll cover with your thumb while you smoke. Sand the area around the indentation to remove any chemicals that may be vaporized while you smoke. When you’re ready to smoke, place your material on the indentation, cover the large hole with your finger, and inhale through the mouth of the can to fill it with smoke. Release your finger when you’re ready to inhale the smoke. Remember that heating aluminum to high temperatures is linked with serious health risks, so it would be safer to build a pipe out of other easily available household items, like an apple or a potato.
39046.pred: To make a pipe from a soda can, you will need an aluminum can and something to poke holes with, such as a pen. Poke about eight to ten small holes halfway to two-thirds down the can, grouping them together. Then, make a carb on the side of the can. Once you have done this, you can load it up and light it to smoke.

40066.question: How To Decorate a Buffet Table
40066.gt: To decorate a buffet table, decide on a color scheme and try coordinating your table cloth, table runner, napkins, and place mats to match it. You could also buy accessories to enhance your color scheme, such as flowers or candles. Then, place your main feature at the center of the table and smaller accessories around the edges. Additionally, make labels for each dish so guests will know which types of food are on offer.
40066.pred: To decorate a buffet table, start by painting the cabinet with a cream-colored paint. Then, add rustic elements like old baskets, mercury glass candlesticks, and a marble glass candle votive cup holder. Add a large mercury glass ginger jar and a decorative wall to complete the look. Finally, add greenery to soften the other elements on the table.

40232.question: How To Make an Applique
40232.gt: To make an applique, start by drawing or printing your design on a sheet of paper and cutting it out. Then, get some iron-on adhesive and trace your design onto the paper side of it. Next, cut around the lines of your design, leaving about 1/4 inch of the iron-on paper around the edges. Once you have your iron-on design, iron it onto the back side of the fabric you want to use, holding the iron over it for 5-8 seconds. Finally, cut out your fabric applique and peel off the paper backing.

40529.question: How To Make Mexican Enchiladas
40529.gt: To make Mexican enchiladas, start by heating the tortillas in a pan. Once they’re heated, stuff them with cheese and roll them tightly. Then, place the rolled tortillas in a dish and cover them liberally with enchilada sauce and cheese. Leave them in the oven at 350°F until the sauce is bubbling and the cheese has melted. After they’re done baking, set the enchiladas to cool before eating them. Try serving them with sour cream, chopped cilantro, and Mexican rice.
40529.pred: To make Mexican enchiladas, you will need the following ingredients: Mexican cheese, sour cream, chile, bojillo, chicken, chicken flavored bouillon cubes, tortillas, iceberg lettuce, salt, two cans of tomatoes, onion, Mexican oregano, and garlic. First, you will need to cook the chicken in a pot with water and chicken bouillon cubes. Once the chicken is cooked, you will need to shred it and mix it with diced onion. Next, you will need to prepare the enchilada sauce by boiling guajillo chiles in water and blending them with minced garlic, broth, and salt. After the sauce is ready, you will need to heat oil in a pan and dip the tortillas in the sauce before placing them in the pan to fry. Once the tortillas are fried, you will need to roll them with the chicken mixture and place them in a baking dish. Finally, you will need to prepare the tomato sauce by blending canned tomatoes with salt and Mexican oregano. Pour the tomato sauce over the enchiladas and top with shredded iceberg lettuce and Mexican cheese. Bake the enchiladas in the oven until the cheese is melted and bubbly. Serve the enchiladas with sour cream on top.

40581.question: How To Clean the Tires on Your Car
40581.gt: To clean your car’s tires, all you need is a cleaner designed for tires, a stiff brush, and a hose. Start by spraying tire cleaner onto your tires. Try to avoid getting any on your wheels or paint, since this can dull the paint or remove clear coat. If you’re cleaning your whole car, do the wheels and tires first so you don’t get mud or grime on your paint job. Leave your tire cleaner to soak for 1 or 2 minutes. Then, scrub them with your brush. Once you’ve lifted the dirt from your tires, rinse them with a hose or pressure washer. If your tires are still dirty, spray some more tire cleaner and repeat the process.
40581.pred: To clean the tires on your car, you can use a Maguire hot rims wheel and tire cleaner. First, wet the wheels and apply the cleaner. Then, use a paintbrush to scrub the wheels and agitate the cleaner. You can do this twice for the inside of the wheels. Finally, rinse the wheels with a hose to remove any remaining cleaner.

41001.question: How To Grow Gooseberries
41001.gt: To grow gooseberries, start by getting a gooseberry clipping from a nursery or an older gooseberry plant sometime in early spring. Then, plant the clipping outdoors in nutrient-rich, well-draining soil, making sure the hole is deeper and wider than the roots. Next, right after planting, scatter 2-4 inches of organic mulch to keep the soil cool and moist. After you plant your gooseberry clipping, water it daily and wait until mid-summer to harvest it.
41001.pred: To grow gooseberries, you need to plant them in a garden with rich, well-drained soil. You can choose from culinary or dessert varieties, and they can be grown in containers or as standards. It is important to plant them in a bright position and to prune them in winter to encourage an open, evenly-spaced branch structure. You can also cover the plants with netting or grow them inside a fruit cage to protect them from birds. The gooseberries are ready to pick from early summer onwards, and they can be enjoyed in many ways, such as in jams, pureed with elderflower cordial, or boiled with other fruits to make a tangy, sweet compote.

41518.question: How To Make Chicken 65
41518.gt: To make Chicken 65, start by cutting chicken into bite sized pieces, then coating them in a thick marinade. The ingredients are flexible, so you can use a mixture of cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, or get more creative, as long as you also include chili powder and a ginger-garlic paste. Cover the chicken in the marinade and refrigerate it overnight for more a more flavorful and tender dish. Finally, fry the chicken in oil and serve with fresh coriander!
41518.pred: To make chicken 65, you will need the following ingredients: chicken, cumin seeds, coriander leaves, egg, chili powder, curry leaves, salt, cumin powder, ginger-garlic paste, ajinomoto, red color, chili garlic paste, corn flour, chopped ginger, chopped garlic, and pepper powder. First, cut the chicken into small cubes and add salt, ajinomoto, ginger-garlic paste, pepper powder, and corn flour to the chicken. Mix well and add an egg to the mixture. Heat oil in a pan and fry the chicken until it is golden brown. In a separate pan, add cumin seeds, chopped ginger, chopped garlic, and chopped chili. Add curry leaves, chili powder, cumin powder, salt, and ajinomoto to the pan. Add the fried chicken to the pan and mix well. Add red color and water to the pan and cook for a few minutes. Serve the chicken 65 hot with a side of rice or bread.

41748.question: How To Make Beef Wellington
41748.gt: To make beef Wellington, start by searing a center-cut beef tenderloin for 3 minutes on each side so the meat will hold its shape as it cooks in the oven. Once you’ve seared the meat, make some duxelle by cooking minced shallots, mushrooms, garlic, and butter for 25 minutes in a separate pan. While the duxelle is cooling, place overlapping strips of prosciutto on a spread-out piece of plastic wrap. Spread the duxelle over the prosciutto and place the tenderloin on top. Then, lift up the ends of the plastic wrap to tightly cover the beef with the prosciutto. Chill the beef in the fridge for 15 minutes before removing the wrap and rolling the meat in puff pastry. Afterwards, wrap and chill the beef Wellington for another 15 minutes, then bake it at 400 degrees Fahrenheit for 40 minutes.
