41806.question: How To Marinate Lamb Chops
41806.gt: Before marinating lamb chops, defrost them in the fridge for up to 12 hours. Once they’re fully thawed, put them in a large, sealable plastic bag and set them aside. In a small bowl, whisk together red wine, olive oil, and crushed garlic for a simple Italian marinade. Then, pour the mixture into the plastic bag and massage the chops to coat them thoroughly with the marinade. After pushing the excess air out of the bag, seal it and place it in the fridge for 4 to 12 hours, depending on how strong you want the flavors to be. To ensure the marinade coats each side evenly, turn the bag every 2 hours, or halfway through your marinating time.
41806.pred: To marinate lamb chops, place them in a prepared marinade for at least four hours to overnight in the refrigerator. You can marinate chops in a glass container or in a plastic food storage bag. Turn chops or rotate the bag frequently to ensure the marinade coats all sides of the chops. After marinating, remove the chops and discard any remaining marinade.

41908.question: How To Bottle Feed an Orphaned Fawn
41908.gt: If you need to bottle-feed an orphaned fawn, pour warm goat’s milk or wildlife milk replacer into a water bottle and attach a goat or lamb bottle-feeding nipple. Use 2-4 fl oz for a fawn that’s knee-high or 4-6 oz if it’s waist-high, and give it a bottle every 3-4 hours. However, keep in mind that in most cases, you should leave a fawn alone, since its mother is likely hiding nearby. If you’re sure the fawn is orphaned, call a wildlife rehabilitator, and only attempt to bottle-feed it if the rehabilitator tells you to.
41908.pred: To bottle feed an orphaned fawn, you need to use a bottle with a nipple that is appropriate for the fawn's age. The bottle should be filled with a milk replacer that is specifically formulated for fawns. The fawn should be held securely in your arms, and the bottle should be held at an angle that allows the fawn to drink comfortably. The fawn should be fed every few hours, and the amount of milk should be gradually increased over time. It is important to monitor the fawn's weight and overall health to ensure that it is receiving adequate nutrition.

41940.question: How To Make a Salmon Patty
41940.gt: To make a salmon patty, start by mixing all of the ingredients together in a large bowl until they're fully incorporated. Next, divide the mixture into 4 equally sized portions and shape each portion into an oval that's about ¾ inch thick. Be careful not to handle the meat too much, since this can make it dense and tough! Then, chill the patties for 30 minutes, dredge them in flour, and fry them for 4-5 minutes on each side until the edges are browned and crisp!
41940.pred: To make a salmon patty, you will need to sauté vegetables such as red and green bell peppers and onions, then add them to a mixture of pink salmon, egg, lemon juice, melted butter, seasoning, and breadcrumbs. The mixture is then shaped into patties and fried in a pan with oil.

42582.question: How To Make a Lightbox
42582.gt: To make a lightbox from scratch, start by cutting a square hole in 3 sides of a cardboard box, making the borders of the holes about 2 inches away from the edges of the box. Then, tape white paper towels over the holes, and cut a piece of poster board that's slightly longer than the width of the box. Next, attach the poster board to the back of the box to create a background. Finally, place your lightbox in a well-lit area, or use a lamp to shine light into it from the top.
42582.pred: To make a lightbox, you will need to cut wood into various pieces, assemble them into a frame, and attach a diffusion fabric to the front. You can use pocket hole screws or wood glue to secure the pieces together. Additionally, you can add a back and a top to the frame, and use wood filler to cover any gaps or holes. Finally, you can add a backdrop to the lightbox to create a seamless background for your photos.

42796.question: How To Make Nickelodeon Slime
42796.gt: To make Nickelodeon slime, start by putting 1 cup of cornstarch, 1 cup of water, and 3-5 drops of green food coloring in a sealable plastic bag. Then, shake the bag to combine the ingredients into a green paste. Alternatively, combine 6 large packages of Jell-O, 4 ½ pounds of flour, and 1 gallon of water, and whisk until smooth. Next, add another 4 ½ pounds of flour, then gradually stir in as much water as it takes to get the mixture to run slowly down your spoon. After that, stir in 8 ounces of Johnson’s Baby Shampoo and some green food coloring.
42796.pred: To make nickelodeon slime, you will need the following materials: 3 bottles of white glue, 1 bottle of clear glue, 1 bag of slime making powder, 1 bag of styrofoam foam beads, 2 mixing bowls, 1 mixing spoon, 2 wooden sticks, 4 different colors of paint, 2 scents, 1 bag of glitter, 1 measuring cup, 4 storage containers, and instructions on how to make slime. First, pour 10 milliliters of white glue into a mixing bowl. Then, add 30 milliliters of water and mix well. Next, add a spoonful of glow paint and mix well. In another bowl, add 2 spoonfuls of slime making powder and 15 milliliters of hot water. Mix well until the powder is fully dissolved. Then, slowly add the powder mixture into the glue mixture and mix well. Finally, add the styrofoam foam beads and mix well. The slime is now ready to be played with.

42910.question: How To Make Pavlova
42910.gt: To make pavlova, start by combining corn starch and sugar, then beat it into 4 egg whites 1 teaspoon at a time. When the mixture develops stiff peaks, mix in the vinegar and vanilla. Pour the mixture into a round tray covered with parchment paper and make an indent in the middle for the topping to sit in later, then bake the meringue at 270 degrees F for 60-70 minutes. Allow the pavlova to cool on a wire rack before spreading the whipped cream on top. Finish by topping your pavlova with strawberries or kiwi slices.
42910.pred: To make pavlova, you need to beat six egg whites on high speed for about a minute, or until you have soft peaks. With the mixer on, gradually add one and a half cups of sugar. Continue mixing for ten minutes, until it's smooth, glossy and stiff peaks form. Then, fold in half a tablespoon of lemon juice, and half a tablespoon of vanilla extract. Next, add two teaspoons of cornstarch, and mix just until well blended. Transfer the meringue to a pastry bag, with a large open star tip. Pipe it onto a parchment lined baking sheet. Start in the center, and work outwards to make a rose, and then build it up. This yields about 15 meringues, and if you use a large 3/4 baking sheet, they all fit on one pan. Use the back of a spoon to create little bowls. This gives your cream and berries a place to sit. Now into the oven they go at 225 degrees fahrenheit, for an hour and 15 minutes. Then turn the oven off and leave them in there another 30 minutes with the door closed. Once they're done, slide them off the baking sheet, and let them cool completely to room temperature. When you're ready to assemble, combine one and a half cups of cold heavy whipping cream, with two tablespoons of sugar. Beat those on high speed for about two minutes, or until thick, fluffy, and spreadable. I'm using the very same frosting tip to pipe on generous amounts of the cream. Then add a whole bunch of berries, and that's really all there is to it.

42919.question: How To Make Red Velvet Pancakes
42919.gt: To make red velvet pancakes, combine the flour, powdered sugar, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl until they’re well mixed. In a separate bowl, mix the buttermilk, eggs, sugar, and red food coloring together. Next, add the buttermilk mixture to the flour mixture, taking care not to over-mix the batter. Then, drop small amounts of batter on a hot, greased skillet, let them cook for a few minutes, then flip the pancakes and cook them for a few more minutes.
42919.pred: To make red velvet pancakes, you will need to mix together all-purpose flour, baking powder, cocoa powder, salt, sugar, melted unsalted butter, vanilla extract, and red food coloring. Then, you will need to mix together the wet ingredients, including butter milk, egg, and vanilla extract, and add them to the dry ingredients. After mixing the batter, you will need to cook the pancakes on a nonstick griddle pan over medium heat. Once the pancakes are cooked, you can make a cream cheese drizzle by mixing cream cheese, vanilla extract, and confectioners sugar. Finally, you can drizzle the cream cheese mixture over the pancakes and enjoy your delicious red velvet pancakes.

43164.question: How To Make a Cookies and Cream Milkshake
43164.gt: To make a cookies and cream milkshake, crush 5 Oreo cookies using a blender or a rolling pin. Next, put 2 cups of vanilla ice cream and 1 cup of milk in a blender and blend them until the mixture is smooth. Then, add the crushed Oreo cookies to the blender and pulse it a few more times to combine the ingredients. Finally, pour the milkshakes into 2 tall glasses, add a swirl of whipped cream and half an Oreo on top of each milkshake, and enjoy!
43164.pred: To make a cookies and cream milkshake, you will need the following ingredients: milk, vanilla ice cream, and cookies. First, pour the milk into a blender. Then, add two scoops of vanilla ice cream. Next, add the cookies to the blender. Blend the ingredients together until smooth. Pour the milkshake into a glass and top with whipped cream and crumbled cookies. Enjoy your delicious cookies and cream milkshake!

43600.question: How To Cure Cast Iron
43600.gt:
To cure cast iron, warm the cookware slightly over the stove. Then, use a 
cloth to apply a thin layer of olive oil, shortening, or lard all over the 
cookware, including the exterior. Use a clean cloth to wipe away the 
excess oil. Place a lid on the pan and put it over low heat. Wait 5-15 
minutes to check for haze under the lid, increasing the temperature until you see 
it. Remove the pan from the heat to cool. Apply another coat of oil, and 
place it on the heat for an hour. Repeat this curing process 2 times before 
scrubbing the cast iron with table salt and rinsing.
43600.pred: To cure cast iron, you need to scrub it with steel wool and mild dish soap, rinse it with hot water, and dry it with a towel. Then, place it on a stove and turn it on to boil off any excess water. After that, apply a thin layer of oil, either flax seed oil or canola oil, and wipe it off with a paper towel. Place the skillet in the oven on the highest temperature it can go, between 450 and 500 degrees, for an hour. This process will create a hard glassy layer that helps make the cast iron non-stick.

43874.question: How To Clean a Glass Top Stove
43874.gt: If you don’t have a glass stove specialty cleaner, you can make a cleaner by mixing hot water and a few drops of dish soap. Then, sprinkle a thick layer of baking soda on the area you want to clean. Soak a large microfiber towel in the water and soap mixture and spread the towel so it fully covers baking soda. After 15 minutes, remove the towel and scrub any excess residue off. Use a new towel to dry and buff your stove top, and voila!
43874.pred: To clean a glass top stove, you will need a cooktop cleaner and a razor blade. First, apply the cleaner to the stove and use a scrubber to remove any grease or grime. Then, use the razor blade to scrape off any remaining residue. Finally, use a microfiber cloth to buff the stove and remove any cloudiness.

44041.question: How To Make Fresh Squeezed Lemonade
44041.gt: To make fresh squeezed lemonade, start by juicing 4-6 lemons or enough to get 1 cup of lemon juice. Then, prepare simple syrup by bringing 1 cup of water and 1 cup of granulated sugar to a boil before reducing the heat and letting it simmer for 4-5 minutes. Once that's done, combine the simple syrup and lemon juice with 3 cups of water in a pitcher. For a fizzy lemonade, use 2 cans of soda water instead. Finally, chill your lemonade in the fridge or serve it in a glass over ice.
44041.pred: To make fresh squeezed lemonade, you will need to start by bringing two cups of water and two cups of granulated sugar to a simmer on the stove. Give it an occasional stir until the liquid runs clear again, which means that the sugar has completely dissolved in the water. What we're making right now is called a simple syrup. It's actually a chemical process which allows sugar to completely dissolve in water. You could just add sugar to water and make lemonade, but if you take the extra step to heat it, then the sugar is completely dissolved into an actual syrup, which means that there's no separation and no grainy grittiness to your lemonade. Just before this mixture comes to a simmer, you'll see that it's clear again. That is a simple syrup. Simple enough, right? Turn off the heat and set that aside. If you wanted to make lemonade using honey, then you'd simply dissolve two cups of honey in two cups of water just like we did for the sugar. If you want to go completely sugar-free for your lemonade, simply dissolve a quarter cup of ground stevia in two cups of water just like you would with the honey or the sugar. Next, you'll need five pounds of lemons. Now, you can just use two cups of bottled lemon juice, but nothing beats freshly squeezed. Before you juice a lemon, it helps if you roll it between your palm and the countertop to release the juices. It breaks things up inside and you can actually feel that the lemon is squishy. Then just slice it in half right down the middle. Next, it's time to juice your lemons. There's lots of different juicing products on the market, but I like to just use hand juicing tools for lemonade. I like this one in particular because it filters the juice and catches all the seeds and captures the juice in the bottom and it also has measuring markings so I know how much juice I'm getting. Keep on going until you have two cups of lemon juice. There we have it, two cups of freshly squeezed lemon juice. How many lemons it takes to get to two cups of lemon juice is a little hard to tell because lemons vary in how much juice they have inside. Five pounds is a good rule of thumb, although today's lemons were pretty juicy and we only used four pounds. Now, since I don't like pulp in my lemonade, I strain my lemon juice through a strainer into a pitcher. But of course, if you like pulp in your lemonade, feel free to just pour it directly into the pitcher. Next, we'll take that simple syrup and pour it directly in with our lemon juice. Give this a stir and what you have now is lemonade concentrate. You can actually freeze this so if you want to make it in big batches, you can freeze it in portions to serve throughout the summer. That way you can have freshly squeezed lemonade all summer long. To serve, you'll just add water and ice to taste. Some people like their lemonade super tart like me and so we add a little bit less water. But if you are a normal individual and like yours a little more thinned out and an even balance between sweet and sour, you'll add a little bit more water. So just keep on tasting it and adjust the water to your personal taste. Now, if you wanted to turn this into a fruit lemonade, you'd simply add your fruit to the lemonade concentrate. So you can add raspberries for raspberry lemonade, strawberries for strawberry lemonade, or maybe even some blueberries for blueberry lemonade. Just smash them up and mix them in with that concentrate. Thanks for watching. You can find the full written recipe in the video description. Be sure to subscribe, like, and follow and check out the rest of my videos where you can find hundreds of restaurant quality recipes you can easily make at home. See you later.

44120.question: How To Flip a Coin
44120.gt: If you want to flip a coin, make a fist with your thumb pointing up toward the sky, then tuck the tip your thumb beneath your index finger. Place the coin over the gap between your thumb and index finger so it’s sitting on top of both fingers. To flip the coin, quickly snap your thumb upward. This will push the coin into the air, causing it to flip over and over. Watch the coin in the air and either catch it or pay attention to where it rolls after it hits the floor. Whoever called the side that’s facing up is the winner of the toss.
44120.pred: To flip a coin, you need to hold the coin in your hand and slide it up to the top of your first finger. Then, you need to lower your middle finger and raise your first finger, causing the coin to pivot up and fall flat on your middle finger. You can continue this motion with the next finger, and the coin will fall flat on the next finger. Finally, you can let the coin fall through the crack between your middle and pinky fingers and catch it on the other side of your hand with your thumb.

44193.question: How To Laminate Paper
44193.gt: To laminate paper using a machine, turn the machine on and wait until it heats up. Next, put your document inside the laminating pouch, which is 2 sheets of laminate attached at one end. Place the pouch into the carrier, taking care that the sealed end is pushed up against one end, then feed the carrier through the machine sealed end first. When the laminating is finished, let the pouch cool before removing it from the carrier and trimming the edges if needed.
44193.pred: To laminate paper, you can use a laminating machine or a DIY method. One method is to use a laminating machine, which is a device that heats and applies a plastic film to the paper. Another method is to use a laminating pouch, which is a plastic pouch that you can fill with water and then use an iron to apply heat and pressure to the paper. You can also use a DIY method, such as using a plastic bag or a piece of plastic wrap to cover the paper and then using a hair dryer or a heat gun to apply heat and pressure to the paper.

44241.question: How To Make a Piggy Bank
44241.gt: To make a piggy bank, start by gluing a piece of paper around a toilet roll. Fold the excess paper into the ends of the roll. Then, cut 2 circles, 2 triangle shapes for ears, and an oval and small rectangle for the nose out of cardstock. Attach the circles to each end of the roll with glue. When both ends are securely in place, assemble and attach the nose to one of the circles. Draw a pig's face above the nose using any color you like and glue the ears to the sides. Finally, use a box cutter to cut a hole in the top of your piggy bank that's just large enough for coins to fit through.
44241.pred: To make a piggy bank, you will need various bills, a toilet paper roll, coins, and cardboard. First, draw a layout on the cardboard using a dark marker to mark out everything. Then, separate each slot for separate bills and glue them together. Place a cardboard piece slanted so that when it is pushed out, it rolls down to the open slot. Glue the sides and the top down to make it more secure. Roll the bills and secure them with tape. Make a lot of rolls and sort them in piles to keep track of them. You can decorate the piggy bank as you like.

44255.question: How To Make Paper Fans
44255.gt: To make a paper fan, start by cutting a piece of paper into a rectangle and folding the top edge by one third. Next, fold the paper in half vertically and use your finger to crease the edge. Unfold the vertical fold, and fold the left and right edges in toward the crease you just made and continue making vertical folds. Once the paper is folded, unfold everything, rotate the paper 90°, and pinch the creases into you upward “V” shapes.

44336.question: How To Make Puff Pastry
44336.gt: To make puff pastry, you’ll need 1 cup of all-purpose flour, a ¼ teaspoon of fine salt, 10 tablespoons of cold butter, and 1/3 of a cup of ice cold water. Combine flour and salt in a food processor and pulse. Next add the cubed butter and water to the mix. Pulse a few more times, remove the dough, cover in plastic wrap, and refrigerate for 20 minutes. Gently knead the dough, fold it in thirds, roll it, turn it, and repeat to create thin layers. Rewrap the dough and refrigerate for an hour. Once the dough is chilled, use it for croissants or filled pastries!
44336.pred: To make puff pastry, you need to start by adding flour and salt to a large bowl. Then, grate frozen butter into the bowl and mix it with a knife. Add cold water and lemon juice to the mixture and stir it together. Once the dough comes together, pat it down and wrap it in cling wrap. Place the dough in the fridge for at least one hour before using it.

44789.question: How To Add Oil to Your Car
44789.gt: If you need to add oil to your car, pop the hood of your car and find the oil fill port, which is almost always labeled “Oil” with a small picture of an oil can on the top. Unscrew the cap, then check the dipstick to determine how much oil you need to add. Usually, the distance between the bottom of the stick and the top is equal to 1 quart of oil, so estimate based on that. Add the oil to the reservoir slowly, checking the dipstick periodically, then close the oil fill cap.
44789.pred: To add oil to your car, you need to first check the oil level using the dipstick. If the oil level is low, you need to add oil. You can use a funnel to add the oil to the engine. Make sure to add the correct type of oil as specified in the owner's manual. After adding the oil, check the oil level again to ensure that it is at the correct level.

45678.question: How To Build a Siren
45678.gt: To build a siren, first make the rotor by using a jigsaw to cut out 2 6-inch disks and smaller connectors from plywood. Next, sandwich your connectors between the 2 disks and glue them together with carpenter’s glue. To build the siren’s outer portion, use your jigsaw to cut a hole larger than the rotor into a plywood board. Then, attach rounded wooden pieces around the edge of the hole. Finally, align the small hole of the rotor onto a motor shaft, and mount everything onto the outer portion of the siren.
45678.pred: To build a siren, you will need to cut a hub and a shaft, glue up the first layer of the rotor, fit up the rotor, cut the winglets, space them evenly, balance the rotor, drill holes, make a shim, put a v-nosh in the wood, put a nail in the key weight, power up the siren, cut the hole in the front plate, and glue the next layer.

46509.question: How To Grow Beetroot
46509.gt: If you want to grow beetroot, pick a spot with rich, fertile soil that receives plenty of sunlight, although a little shade is okay. Till the soil 3-4 inches deep and remove any weeds, stones, or other debris. Sow your seeds or plant your seedlings after the last frost of the year. Water your plants daily until the leaves begin to sprout, then water them every 10-14 days if the weather is dry, and not at all during periods of normal rainfall.
46509.pred: To grow beetroot, you need to buy some seeds and fill a seed tray with compost. Then, water the compost and place the seeds on top of it. Cover the seeds with compost and press down lightly. Keep the seedlings warm and watered, and they will appear within 14 to 21 days. For continuous crops, sow more seeds every two to three weeks. When the seedlings have at least two sets of leaves, it's time to plant them outside. Dig the soil, remove any weeds and large stones, and water the beetroot. Carefully remove the seedlings from the seed tray and plant them at a distance of 10 cm apart. Give the beetroot a good watering, and after a few days, they will recover and begin to grow healthily. Keep the beetroot watered and free from weeds. When the roots reach 2 to 3 inches in diameter, it's time to pull them out of the ground. Twist the tops off to prevent bleeding.

46885.question: How To Knit a Cable
46885.gt: To knit a cable, start by casting 18 stitches on your left needle. Then, alternate between purling 6 stitches and knitting 6 stitches for the next 4 rows. Next, start your fifth row by purling 6 stitches, and then transfer the first 3 knit stitches from your regular needle to a cable needle. Once you've done that, move the cable needle to the front or back of your work, and knit the next 3 stitches on your knitting needle followed by 3 more on the cable needle. Finally, purl the last 6 and turn your work.
46885.pred: To knit a cable, you need to follow a specific pattern. First, you need to knit four stitches, then purl six stitches, and then knit four stitches again. This pattern is repeated until you have completed the desired number of rows. To create the cable, you need to hold three stitches to the back of the work and knit three stitches off of the left-hand needle. This creates a twisted cable pattern. You can repeat this process until you have completed the desired number of rows.

47245.question: How To Build an Ark
47245.gt: To build an ark, start by getting over 100,000 square feet of cypress wood to build the hull, the decks, the roof, and the flooring. Once you have all of the wood, build the hull of the ark and add the flooring so there's a lower, middle, and upper deck. You'll also want to add a door to the side of the ark so it's easy to board. Once you've finished the hull and flooring, build a roof to cover the upper deck. Finally, coat the hull of your ark with pitch so it's waterproof.
47245.pred: The video provides a humorous and satirical take on how to build an ark. It suggests that one should convince rich religious people to pay a lot of money to see the ark, and then build it with a concrete foundation and core, wooden buildings, and castile and toilets. The video also suggests that one should install a gift shop and editing to outside and carve green and images of two of every animal and put it within the ark. However, it is important to note that the video is a parody and should not be taken as a literal guide on how to build an ark.

47381.question: How To Clean a White Sink
47381.gt: To clean a white sink, spray your sink with vinegar and scrub it with a non-scratch scrub brush to remove limescale. Keep your sink clean by wiping it with a mix of equal parts baking soda and ammonia diluted in 1 gallon of water, once a month. Next, add a few drops of lemon oil to a dry cloth and wipe the sink down to add shine and repel residue. To maintain your sink, wipe and dry your sink out after each use, and avoid leaving dishes and food in kitchen sinks overnight, which can lead to stains.
47381.pred: To clean a white sink, first, put a plug in the sink and add a mixture of baking soda and dawn. Then, use a scrubby to clean the sink. After that, drain the mixture and rinse the sink with water. Finally, use vinegar on a paper towel to shine the fixtures.

47383.question: How To Drain Water Away from Your Home
47383.gt: To drain water away from your home, invest in a gutter system so that rainwater on the roof doesn’t leak into your foundation. If you already have gutters, be sure to clean them at last once a year so that debris doesn’t block them and cause water to back up. Additionally, install extensions on the gutter downspouts to direct water further away from your house. Finally, add some dirt around the foundation of your home to create a gentle slope so that water drains away more easily.
47383.pred: To drain water away from your home, you can install a French drain system. This involves digging a trench around the foundation of your home, placing a perforated pipe surrounded by styrofoam peanuts and fabric, and then covering it with soil. The water can then flow through the pipe and be carried away from the house. You can also use a plastic drywall to collect water and disperse it slowly. Additionally, it's important to clean out gutters and downspouts to prevent water from accumulating around your home.

47393.question: How To Unblock a Drain
47393.gt: To unblock a drain, start by drying the sink with a towel and pouring 1 cup of baking soda into the drain. Then, pour 2 cups of boiling water into the drain to help the baking soda reach the clog. After a few minutes, add 1 more cup of baking soda, followed by 1 cup of white vinegar. As soon as you pour in the vinegar, put the plug in the drain to keep the foam from bubbling back up. Once the gurgling sounds in the drain stop, pour 4 more cups of boiling water down the drain to clear it.
47393.pred: To unblock a drain, first clear all debris and excess water from the drain. Then, pack any leftover sheets tightly into the drain and push them down with the end of a broom shaft or something similar. Turn on the water and let it run for about 5 minutes. The pressure of the water will eventually explode the barrier and unblock the drain.

If the the clog is visible, shut off the power to the disposal and try to remove foreign objects using pliers or tongs. If you can’t see the clog, use an Allen wrench to turn the operator's blades, which can help break up debris. You can also use a plunger to pull up any remaining clogs. Then, run some water through the drain, turn the power back on, and try to run the disposal.

47401.question: How To Macrame
47401.gt: To macrame, start by getting some rope, yarn, or twine to tie your knots with, as well as a dowel or rod to anchor everything on. Then, tie different knots around the anchor to create your design! For example, you could tie a reverse lark's head knot by folding your cord in half, placing the loop under the anchor, and pulling the cord through the loop to tighten the knot. Once you get the hang of it, you can experiment with different knots, like square knots and half knots.
47401.pred: To macrame, you will need a dowel rod, a rope, and a pair of scissors. First, measure and cut the rope to the desired length. Then, fold the rope in half and tie a knot at the end. Next, attach the rope to the dowel rod by tying a knot. Repeat this process for each rope, alternating the direction of the knots to create a pattern. Continue tying knots until the desired length is reached. Finally, trim the excess rope and add fringe to the bottom of the macrame piece.

47461.question: How To Water Indoor Plants
47461.gt: To water indoor plants, start by feeling the top inch of soil your plants are in to determine how dry it is. If the top inch of soil feels dry, your plants most likely need to be watered. If the soil is moist, you can probably hold off on watering for now. When you're ready to water your plants, pour room-temperature water evenly across the surface of the soil. Be careful that you don't add too much water or you could overwater your plants and damage the roots.
47461.pred: To water indoor plants, you should fully submerge the pot in water and let it soak until the bubbles are gone. This ensures that the water gets into the roots of the plant. After soaking, you can let the pot drain and then place it back in its home.

47468.question: How To Care for a Norfolk Pine
47468.gt: To care for a Norfolk pine, plant it in equal parts potting soil, peat moss, and sand. Keep the soil slightly moist, and make sure the tree gets lots of indirect sunlight. Since Norfolk pines will turn to face the light, turn your tree regularly so it grows straight despite its tendency to lean toward the sun. These trees also thrive in moderate temperatures ranging from 55 degrees Fahrenheit to 65 degrees Fahrenheit, so either set your thermostat accordingly!
47468.pred: To care for a Norfolk Island Pine, it is important to provide it with the right amount of water, light, and humidity. The plant prefers bright, indirect light and can tolerate a range of temperatures, but it should not be exposed to temperatures below 45°F. It is also important to keep the plant in a pot that is not too large, as this can restrict its growth. The plant should be watered sparingly during the winter months, as it is dormant, and more frequently during the summer months when it is actively growing. The plant should also be misted regularly to maintain humidity levels. Additionally, it is important to keep the plant free of pests, such as spider mites and aphids, by using insecticidal soap or other appropriate treatments.

47469.question: How To Care for a Prayer Plant
47469.gt: To care for a prayer plant, keep it in a room with a temperature between 65 and 75 degrees Fahrenheit, since this will prevent it from drying out or wilting. Although you should never keep it in direct sunlight, make sure you place or hang your prayer plant near a window so it gets indirect sunlight. You should also add lukewarm water to the pot whenever its soil starts to get dry so it won’t dry out. In addition to water, feed your prayer plant with a water-soluble fertilizer diluted to half-strength every 2 weeks, which will give it all the nutrients it needs. If you want your plant to grow quicker, use sharp scissors or hand pruners to snip a few inches from some of the stems 2 or 3 times a year, since new stems and leaves will grow from the cuts.
47469.pred: To care for a prayer plant, you should provide it with a moist and humid environment, as it loves these conditions. It is a low-light plant, so it can thrive in a north-facing window or a little further back in an east and west window. The plant also loves to move, so it will put its leaves down during the day and fold them up at night. It is sensitive to too much heat or dry air, so it is important to keep the humidity high. The soil should be able to hold some water but also drain well to prevent root rot. The type of water used is also important, as the plant is sensitive to dissolved salts and fertilizer. If the plant starts to die back, it may be going into dormancy, and it can be revived by continuing to care for it in the same way.

47470.question: How To Care for a Sansevieria or Snake Plant
47470.gt: To care for a sansevieria or snake plant, place it in a windowsill that faces east, west or north so it gets the right amount of sunlight. You should also put up sheer drapes on the window in front of your plant to filter out intense afternoon sun. To keep the light exposure even, rotate your plant by a quarter turn each week. Before watering your snake plant, wait until the soil feels dry, and sprinkle the water along the edge of the pot, rather than dumping it all in center. If you can, use distilled water so the minerals in tap water don't harm your plant.
47470.pred: To care for a sansevieria or snake plant, you should provide it with bright, indirect light, water it when the soil is dry two inches down, use a well-draining soil mix, and repot it every year or two. You can also prune damaged leaves and propagate the plant by division.

47485.question: How To Clean Your Indoor Houseplants
47485.gt: Cleaning your indoor house plants will help them stay healthy and keep pests at bay. Regularly spritz the leaves of your plants with lukewarm water to prevent a build-up of dust, which can attract insects. If the leaves are large, you can even use a damp cloth to wipe them down. You can also use a soft-bristled toothbrush to gently scrub dust off leaves if it has already built up over time. If the leaves on your plant are very small, swish them around in a bucket of lukewarm water to clean them quickly. Just make sure to support the soil in the pot with your hands so it doesn’t fall out when you turn the plant upside down. Once a year, put your plants in the shower and spray them all over with lukewarm water to remove any grime that’s been building up. Leave them to drip dry before returning them to their normal place.
47485.pred: To clean your indoor houseplants, you can use a microfiber cloth to wipe the leaves and remove any dust. This will help the leaves absorb sunlight better and keep the plant looking healthy. Additionally, you can mist the leaves with water to increase humidity, which is especially important for plants that prefer moist environments.

47494.question: How To Get Rid of Mold on Houseplants
47494.gt: To get rid of mold on houseplants, start by taking your plant outside and wiping down the leaves with a dampened paper towel. If the mold is still visible after wiping down the leaves, cut those leaves off at the stem and dispose of them. Spray the plant thoroughly with fungicide before bringing it back inside your  home. Choose a bright area with good air circulation to prevent future mold from growing on your houseplant!
47494.pred: To get rid of mold on houseplants, you can gently scrape off the mold and cut back on watering. This will allow the soil to dry out a little bit more in between waterings, and the mold will go away on its own. It is important not to panic and not to use any drastic strong fungicide.

47568.question: How To Harvest Rosemary
47568.gt: To harvest rosemary, wait until spring or summer since that's when rosemary grows most actively. You can trim off some of the plant every day or once a week, which will encourage new sprigs to grow. Also, when you're harvesting rosemary, only take sprigs that are at least 8 inches long so you're not harvesting from newly growing branches. Once you've found a sprig you want to harvest, use shears or scissors to cut off the top 2 inches. Just make sure you're not harvesting more than a quarter of the plant at a time.
47568.pred: To harvest rosemary, you should first make sure that you are harvesting it before it blooms and avoid taking too much from one stalk. You can clip several stems in different places and get as close down to the part where it comes off of the main stalk as possible. It is important to use sharp tools to clip the rosemary and handle the plant carefully to avoid bruising. If you don't like the scent of rosemary, you can wear gloves while harvesting it. Once you have harvested the rosemary, you can clean it and use it as needed.

47903.question: How To Make Sugar Water
47903.gt: To make sugar water, start by putting 1 cup of granulated sugar and 1 cup of water in a pot. You can use more or less sugar and water depending on how much you need for your recipe, but make sure you're using equal parts of both. Next, bring the sugar and water to a boil on the stovetop. Once the water starts boiling, reduce the heat and let the mixture simmer for about 3 minutes, or until all of the sugar dissolves. Finally, let the sugar water cool before transferring it to a bottle.
47903.pred: To make sugar water, you will need a small cup, two pieces of toilet paper, hot water, and sugar. First, wrap the toilet paper around the area where you will be making the sugar water. Then, pour hot water into the cup and add sugar to taste. Mix the sugar and water together until the sugar dissolves. The resulting mixture is your sugar water.

47931.question: How To Make Tie Dye Paint
47931.gt: To make tie dye paint, you can use food coloring. Just mix 1/2 cup of water with 8 drops of food coloring in a bottle, and you're done! You can also easily make tie dye paint with fabric paint and water. Simply combine 1 cup of water with 3 tbsp of fabric paint in a spray bottle and shake it to make a smooth mixture.
47931.pred: To make tie dye paint, you will need a white shirt, vinegar, water, food coloring, and rubber bands. First, soak the shirt in a mixture of vinegar and water for a few minutes. Then, tie the shirt with rubber bands in a pattern of your choice. Next, add food coloring to the water and pour it over the shirt. Let the shirt sit for a few hours, then rinse it out in cold water. The shirt will be dyed with the colors you used.

48077.question: How To Make Shawarma
48077.gt: To make chicken shawarma, mix together your garlic powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, paprika, cardamom, and salt. Cut your chicken into strips, then toss the chicken and the spices together. Drizzle the mixture with olive oil, then cook the chicken on medium-high heat for about 8 minutes on each side. Turn the chicken several times during the cooking process to ensure it cooks evenly.
48077.pred: To make shawarma, you will need to prepare a dough by mixing flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, sugar, oil, and curd. After kneading the dough, you will need to prepare a filling by marinating chicken with spices and vegetables. Then, you will need to cook the chicken and vegetables in a pan. Finally, you will need to roll out the dough and wrap the chicken and vegetables in it.

48081.question: How To Make Tabouli
48081.gt: If you want to make tabouli, start by washing parsley to remove any pesticides and soaking bulgur in boiling water for 20 minutes. Meanwhile, chop the parsley, spring onions, tomatoes, and mint. When the bulgur is soft, strain it and press down on the bulgur with a paper towel to make sure you get rid of excess water. To finish, combine the bulgur and vegetables in a bowl, add the lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper, then stir in the tomatoes.
48081.pred: To make tabouli, you will need to soak bulgur in water for 20-30 minutes. Then, finely dice six small-sized tomatoes and one red onion. Chop a bunch of fresh parsley and mint. Mix the tomatoes, onion, parsley, and mint in a large bowl. Add freshly cracked pepper, a pinch of salt, and the soaked bulgur. Strain the bulgur to remove excess water. Add two tablespoons of olive oil and the juice of half a lemon. Mix everything together and serve.

48124.question: How To Make Chocolate Sauce
48124.gt: To make a basic chocolate sauce without a double boiler, fill a saucepan with a few inches of water and set a metal bowl on top of it. Then, combine your chocolate and heavy cream and gently mix the ingredients together as they melt. After the sauce melts, you can use it immediately or store it in the refrigerator for 2 weeks.
48124.pred: To make chocolate sauce, you need half a cup of sugar, half a cup of cocoa powder, half a cup of water, and one fourth cup of sweetened condensed milk. In a saucepan, add half a cup of water, half a cup of sugar, half a cup of cocoa powder, and mix well. Cook the mixture on medium heat until the sugar melts. Add half a cup of sweetened condensed milk and keep stirring. Cook the sauce on medium to high heat for 3-4 minutes. Do not overcook the sauce as it will become thicker once it cools down. Once the sauce has thickened, switch off the heat and let it cool completely. Pour the sauce into a cup and enjoy it with vanilla ice cream, cake, or any other dessert.

48138.question: How To Make Modeling Chocolate
48138.gt: To prepare modeling chocolate on the stove, first cut up your chocolate into small pieces. Next, spread the chocolate evenly in the top bowl of a double boiler. Once you’ve done that, simmer a little water in the lower part of the boiler over low heat. When the water is simmering, place the bowl of chocolate in the boiler and stir the chocolate with a spatula until it is completely melted. Then, set the bowl of chocolate aside and mix in some slightly warm corn syrup. Finish by letting the mixture cool for a few hours, then knead the chocolate until it’s smooth and malleable.
48138.pred: To make modeling chocolate, you need to melt chocolate and corn syrup in a double boiler. The amount of corn syrup depends on the type of chocolate used. For dark chocolate, you need 3.5 ounces of corn syrup, while for white chocolate, you need 2.4 ounces. Stir the mixture until it becomes thick and pasty. Then, transfer the mixture to a container and wrap it in plastic wrap. Let it sit for a period of time to firm up.

48141.question: How To Melt Almond Bark
48141.gt: To melt almond bark in a double boiler, chop it into small pieces that are roughly the same size so the chocolate will melt evenly. Fill the bottom of the double with water and place the almond bark in the top part of the double boiler. Turn your stove to medium-high heat, stirring the almond bark constantly until it melts. When all of the chunks are melted, turn the heat off and remove the top pan from the double-boiler.
48141.pred: To melt almond bark, you can use a double boiler method, a candy melting machine, or a microwave. The double boiler method involves filling a pot with water, bringing it to a boil, and then adding the almond bark to the top of the pot. The candy melting machine method involves cutting the almond bark into small pieces and continuously mixing it until it is completely melted. The microwave method involves microwaving the almond bark for 30 seconds, stirring it, and then repeating the process until it is fully melted.

48357.question: How To Clean a Cowhide Rug
48357.gt: To clean a cowhide rug, never use water since getting a cowhide rug wet can damage it. Instead, vacuum the rug regularly and shake it off outside every once in a while to get rid of dirt and dust that's trapped deep in the fibers. If you accidentally stain the rug, rub a small amount of shampoo into the stain using a damp, but not soaked, sponge. When you're finished, take a damp cloth and wipe away any soapy residue.
48357.pred: To clean a cowhide rug, first, soak a rag in water and Dawn dish soap. Then, wipe the rug with the soapy rag, making sure to go with the grain of the hair. If there is any liquid puddling up, wipe it off. Repeat the process until the rug is clean.

48450.question: How To Install Formica
48450.gt: To install Formica, start by marking the measurements on the Formica sheet, adding 1 inch to each measurement to avoid cutting it too small. Then, cover the lines with masking tape to make them easier to see, and cut along them with a saw. Next, spread contact cement on the edges of the Formica sheet and press on the edge strips with a dry roller. Once the sheet is ready, use a paintbrush to spread contact cement on the surface you’re covering, and to the back of the Formica sheet. Finally, lay the sheet on the surface and push it down firmly with a roller.
48450.pred:
To install formica, you will need to follow these steps:
1. Cut the formica to the desired size and shape.
2. Apply contact cement to the surface you want to install the formica on.
3. Place the formica on top of the surface and press it down firmly.
4. Use a roller to apply even pressure to the formica and remove any air bubbles.
5. Trim the edges of the formica with a router or file to create a clean finish.
6. Sand the edges of the formica to create a smooth finish.
7. Apply a finish to the formica to protect it and enhance its appearance.
8. Install any hardware or fixtures on the formica as needed.
9. Enjoy your newly installed formica surface!

49270.question: How To Remove a Mustard Stain
49270.gt: If you’re trying to remove a mustard stain from clothing, first blot the stain if it’s fresh or scrape off what you can if it’s dried. Then, rinse the stain with cold, running water, rub it with detergent or stain remover, and run it through the wash. If you’ve gotten a mustard stain on furniture, start by scraping off any excess mustard. Then, mix some detergent with water and let it sit on the stain for 5-10 minutes before blotting.
49270.pred: To remove a mustard stain, first, spray the stain with water to saturate it. Then, use a toothbrush to gently scrub the stain, working the bristles into the fabric. After that, apply a small amount of dishwashing liquid to the stain and rub it in with the toothbrush. Finally, rub the fabric against itself to loosen the stain and wash the garment in cold water.

49286.question: How To Remove Grass Stains from Clothing
49286.gt: To remove grass stains from clothing, try using white vinegar. First, remove any excess dirt or grass by blotting the area with a damp rag. Avoid rubbing, as this will cause the stain to penetrate deeper into your clothes. Once the dirt is removed, soak the stain in a mixture of equal parts warm water and white vinegar. After the stain has sat in the vinegar mixture for 5 minutes, apply laundry detergent to the area and gently massage the fabric for several minutes. From there, rinse the stain with cold water and repeat the process until it fades away.
49286.pred: To remove grass stains from clothing, you can use a mixture of white distilled vinegar and liquid detergent. First, pour the vinegar onto the stain and let it soak for a few minutes. Then, apply the detergent to the same area and wash the clothing in a washing machine on a cold cycle. After washing, dry the clothing on high heat. This method should effectively remove grass stains from clothing.

49291.question: How To Remove Perfume Stains from Fabric
49291.gt: You can remove perfume stains from cotton or other washable fabrics with simple household ingredients. Try dabbing the stain with a damp sponge or cloth. For tougher stains, try soaking a paper towel in rubbing alcohol or a mixture of glycerin, detergent, and water. Then, cover the stain with the paper towel and leave it for 10 minutes. If that doesn’t work, soak the material in equal parts water and baking soda for 15 minutes, then wash it in your washing machine. To get perfume stains out of leather or suede, wipe it with warm, soapy water. If the stain’s still there, sprinkle cornmeal on top, leave it to sit for half an hour, then brush it off.
49291.pred: To remove perfume stains from fabric, you can use a clean white cotton sock. Simply rub the stain with the sock in circular motions until the stain is gone. This method works well for cotton tops, jeans, and wool sweaters.

49301.question: How To Remove Tar and Asphalt from Clothing
49301.gt: If a piece of tar is stuck to your clothing, try filling a bag with ice cubes and rubbing it over the tar. Allow the tar to freeze and become brittle, then scrape it off with your fingernails or a dull knife. To get rid of smaller spots, try coating the affected area with vaseline or warm lard. Alternatively, take your piece of clothing outdoors, and dab a small amount of white kerosine or paint thinner on the spot. Finally, to remove the grease or oil, rub the area with a paper towel or rag.
49301.pred: To remove tar and asphalt from clothing, you can use a pressure washer to spray water on the affected area. You can also use a brush to scrub the area and then rinse it with water. Additionally, you can use a solvent like kerosene or diesel to dissolve the tar and asphalt. It is important to wear gloves and protective clothing when handling these chemicals.

49810.question: How To Clean a Wrist Brace
49810.gt: To wash your wrist brace, scrub it with solution of water and dish soap using a lint-free rag. Then, rinse your brace, and let it dry on a flat surface. Alternatively, if your wrist brace is machine washable, wash it in your washing machine with warm water on a delicate cycle. Lay your brace flat to dry.
49810.pred: To clean a wrist brace, first, remove the brace if possible. Then, wash the area of your arm and wrists that are covered by the brace with antibacterial soap and water. After that, rinse the brace thoroughly and dry it with a hair dryer set on high volume and a cool or warm setting. If you cannot remove the brace, you can still wash it while wearing it by holding it under a faucet or cleaning it well in the shower. Finally, dry both the skin and the brace until they are completely dry.

50340.question: How To Make a Patty Melt
50340.gt: To make a patty melt, start by caramelizing some onions on the stovetop. Then, while those are cooking, mix ground beef, salt, pepper, and Worcestershire sauce in a bowl, and shape the meat into a rectangular patty. Next, cook the patty in a skillet over high heat for 2 minutes on each side. Finally, sandwich the patty in between 2 slices of rye bread with the caramelized onions and a slice of Swiss cheese, and cook it on each side until it's golden brown.
50340.pred: To make a patty melt, you will need a few ingredients such as bread, butter, onion, cheese, and minced beef. First, you will need to caramelize the onion by frying it in butter. Then, you will need to prepare the meat patty by mixing minced beef with salt, pepper, and Worcestershire sauce. After that, you will need to cook the patty in a frying pan. Once the patty is cooked, you will need to toast the bread and add cheese on top of it. Then, you will need to place the cooked patty on top of the cheese and add the caramelized onion on top of the patty. Finally, you will need to place the other slice of bread on top of the patty and cook it in the frying pan until it is crispy and brown on both sides.

50343.question: How To Make a "Grilled" Cheese Sandwich in a Toaster Oven
50343.gt: To make a grilled cheese sandwich in a toaster oven, start by preheating your toaster oven to 450 degrees Fahrenheit and putting a baking sheet inside while it heats up. Then, get 2 slices of bread and butter 1 side of each. Next, place one of the slices butter-side down on the baking sheet, followed by 2 slices of cheese and then the other slice of bread, butter-side up. Finally, toast the sandwich for 4 minutes on each side before digging in.
50343.pred: To make a "grilled" cheese sandwich in a toaster oven, you will need sourdough bread and American cheese singles. First, slice the bread and place the cheese on one slice. Fold the corners of the cheese to prevent it from melting over the sides. Then, turn the toaster oven on to 450 degrees and insert the sandwich directly onto the grill. While waiting for the sandwich to cook, you can meditate in your front yard or appreciate modern fine art. Once the sandwich is done, remove it from the toaster oven and place it on a plate. This sandwich is delicious and can be enjoyed for lunch or dinner.

50889.question: How To Make Cake Pops
50889.gt: To make cake pops, start by baking your favorite cake and allowing it to cool. Put the cooled cake in a bowl and use an electric mixer or your hands to break it into fine crumbs. Then, mix half a container of frosting into the crumbs. Once the texture is doughy, scoop out balls, round them with your hands, and place them on a cookie sheet to go into the freezer for 10 minutes. Next, dip a lollipop stick into melted chocolate, insert it into the cake ball, and dip the ball in the chocolate. Once cool, dip the pop once more before adding toppings and refrigerating.
50889.pred: To make cake pops, you will need a box of cake, frosting, chocolate, cake pop sticks, and sprinkles. First, bake the cake and crumble it into fine crumbs. Then, mix the crumbs with frosting until it is moist but not soggy. Use an ice cream scoop to form the cake mixture into balls and insert cake pop sticks into the center. Freeze the cake balls for 20 minutes. Melt chocolate in the microwave and dip the cake balls into the chocolate. Add sprinkles to the cake balls and place them in a treat bag with ribbon.

51175.question: How To Make a Diorama
51175.gt: Before you make a diorama, sketch out your concept and gather all of the materials you’ll need. Select a box or a frame that is several inches deep, like a shoe box turned on its side. Start by creating your background on the back and sides of the box, then decorate the bottom of the box to create your ground or floor. Working from the back of the box to the front, add in details to make your scene seem more realistic. For example, if you’re making a nature diorama, you could add in trees, rocks, bushes, and even animals.
51175.pred: To make a diorama, you can start by creating a base using a polystyrene board and extruded material. Then, you can sculpt a mold to build up the landform and apply plaster of Paris to smooth out the riverbed. Next, you can use Mod Podge to create a jigsaw along the riverbanks and apply a thick mix of Mod Podge and soil to create a more structured surface. You can then use acrylic paint washes to add color to the rocks and apply a bluey color to the river base. After that, you can add static grass to the river and use Mod Podge to create a base for the grass. You can also use spray adhesive to blend the edges of the static grass and add coarse turf to create a more natural look. Finally, you can use epoxy to create a body on the river and add fibers to create a sense of flow. You can also use Mod Podge to create realistic ripples in the water and add white acrylic to highlight the edges.

52238.question: How To Make an Insect Hotel
52238.gt: To make an insect hotel, pick a flat spot in your yard that gets both sun and shade, like near a large tree or hedge. Next, choose a structure for your hotel, like an old birdhouse, a wooden box, or cinder blocks. Then, fill the structure with materials that appeal to insects, such as rolled up bits of paper, straw, hay, old bark, and leaves. Finally, create small holes and crevices in the material to give the insects places to hide and take shelter.
52238.pred: To make an insect hotel, you will need four sections of wood about 15 centimeters or six inches long, some thin shingles to serve as roof tiles, some strong string, plus a plank of wood wide enough to form a backplate to your hotel. To avoid harming the insects, use untreated wood. To fill the hotel, you'll need a selection of hollow stems. Bamboo canes are ideal for this. You'll also need a drill, a screwdriver and some screws, a hammer and tax and some pruners. Begin by making the walls to your hotel, attach the four sections of wood to each other using the screws. You may need to make a pilot hole for each screw before securing it into place. Join up the four walls so that one end overlaps the other. With the walls complete, attach the backplate to create a snug seal. You can mark the footprint of the walls onto the plate as a guide before screwing it into position. Now for the roof shingles. Use the tax to simply hammer these into place, overlapping the shingles to help rain to run off and keep the inside of the hotel dry. If you wish, you can now paint the hotel with a natural non-toxic paint or wood stain to give a colorful finish. Allow the paint to dry before continuing. It's now time for the bedding materials. Cut the stems or bamboo to length. The bamboo should sit flush with the walls of the hotel like this. Pack them into place to give a good solid finish. Drill two holes into the top of the backplate, then thread some string through. Tie the ends into a knot, then hang your hotel up in a dry, sheltered place and full sun or dappled shade. In among trees and shrubs as ideal, or you could hammer your hotel into the ease of a garden shed or outbuilding. If you live in an area where termites are a problem, be sure to site your bug hotel well away from any buildings and keep it clear of the ground. A simple alternative to a bamboo cane hotel is to drill lots of holes of varying sizes into a solid block of wood. Avoid drilling all the way through the block. You can also add a shingle roof for a decorative finish. Attach a vine-eye, thread through your string, then hang up into position. As you can see, it's very easy to make a safe and secure habitat for beneficial bugs to thrive.

52691.question: How To Make Coconut Candy
52691.gt: To make coconut candy squares, you’ll need shredded coconut, white sugar, corn syrup, water, butter, salt, baking soda, and a small cake pan. Combine the sugar, water, and corn syrup in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring until the mixture boils. Then, add the butter, remove the mixture from the heat source, and stir in the remaining ingredients. Pour the mixture into the pan and let it set for a few hours. Then, just cut the solid into small squares and enjoy!
52691.pred: To make coconut candy, you will need 500 grams of sugar, 340 mils of evaporated milk, half a teaspoon of salt, one teaspoon of butter, 1 teaspoon of coloring, and about 250 grams of fresh shredded coconut. First, heat a deep pan and pour the milk into it. Wait for the milk to come to a boil before adding in the sugar, salt, and butter. Stir the mixture until everything melts and dissolves. Then, add the coconut and keep stirring until it thickens up. Test the coconut candy by dropping a blob in a glass of water. If it doesn't disintegrate, it's ready. Once the coconut candy is ready, put it into a buttered casserole or a pan and let it cool to room temperature. Cut lines into it so that the pieces can be easily removed later on. Finally, put the coconut candy into the refrigerator to cool down further.

52736.question: How To Apply Makeup (for Teen Girls)
52736.gt: To do your makeup as a teen, the first thing you'll want to do is apply a foundation that matches your skin tone. Place a few dots of foundation on your face, then blend it in with a brush or makeup sponge to even out your skin tone. If you want to emphasize your eyebrows, lightly fill them in with a brow pencil or powder that matches your natural hair color. You can also brush a natural-colored eyeshadow, like soft peach or beige, over your eyelids for an everyday look. Use a brown or black eyeliner pencil to draw a thin line on your top lid to draw attention to your eyes. If you want thicker, darker lashes, apply a little brown or black mascara to your top and bottom lashes. To bring out the color in your lips, apply some lip gloss or lipstick.
52736.pred: To apply makeup for teen girls, start by putting on a moisturizer and foundation. Use a beauty blender to blend the foundation evenly on the face. Then, apply concealer to cover any blemishes or dark circles. Use a fluffy brush to blend the concealer and foundation together. Next, apply eyeshadow to the eyelids, using a brush to blend the colors together. Use a pencil brush to apply eyeliner to the upper lash line. Finally, apply mascara to the eyelashes and use a brush to apply blush to the cheeks.

53129.question: How To Make Glitter Candles
53129.gt: To make glitter candles, start by removing the plastic wrap off of a votive, taper, or pillar candle. Then, paint the candle with a decoupage glue like Mod Podge, let the glue dry, then paint on another layer. Before the second layer dries, sprinkle glitter onto the candle, rotating as you pour to coat the whole candle evenly. Let the glue dry completely, then seal in the glitter with a clear, glossy, acrylic sealer.
53129.pred: To make glitter candles, you need to melt the wax in a pot of water, add glitter to the melted wax, and then add ice cubes to separate the water from the wax. Once the wax has cooled down, you can remove the wick and press tissue paper to remove any remaining moisture.

53182.question: How To Make a White Chocolate Mocha
53182.gt: To make a white chocolate mocha, start by melting 3 tablespoons of white chocolate chips in a double boiler with 2 tablespoons of milk. Then, pour the melted mixture into a mug along with 1 cup of heated milk. Next, add a shot of espresso or 4 shots of strong coffee to the mug and stir everything together. Finally, top your white chocolate mocha with whipped cream before serving.
53182.pred: To make a white chocolate mocha, you will need a coffee machine, a jar of white chocolate powder, a bottle of vanilla syrup, and a jar of milk. First, brew a shot of espresso using the coffee machine. Then, add one tablespoon of white chocolate powder to a jar and stir it with the hot espresso. Next, add a tablespoon of vanilla syrup to the jar and stir it again. Finally, add milk to the jar and stir it until it is well mixed. The result is a delicious white chocolate mocha that is perfect for a cozy day at home.

53405.question: How To Core a Tomato
53405.gt: To core a tomato, start by rinsing it off with fresh water to get rid of dirt and debris. Pat the tomato dry, then pull off the stem with your fingers. Place the tomato upright on a cutting board, then insert a paring knife into the top center and push the blade in about 1/2 an inch deep. Hold the tomato firmly with your other hand and use the knife to cut a small circle around the center. Once you complete the circle, pull out the core and discard it!
53405.pred: To core a tomato, you can either take the top and bottom off and make one slice, then insert the knife and roll and cut at the same time to remove the core, or you can take both ends off the tomato, stand it on its flat end, and cut off all four sides.

53433.question: How To Cube Bread
53433.gt: To cube bread by hand, simply pull off the crusts, then tear the bread apart into 1-inch squares. If you want neater cubes with clean edges, start by stacking the bread 2 slices high. Then, cut the slices into 4 strips lengthwise with a serrated knife. Next, turn the bread so that the cut lines are in a horizontal position, and straighten any strips that have gone askew. Finally, cut the bread into 4 more strips so that you end up with 16 cubes of even size and shape.
53433.pred: To cube bread, you need to cut the bread into even size cubes. A half inch is a good size. You can use practically any type of bread to make stuffing, but in the test kitchen, we like the ones that have good flavor and texture like sour dough or corn bread. A hardy country style bread is a terrific all-purpose choice and if you have a couple of different kinds on hand, feel free to use both.

53444.question: How To Cut Acorn Squash
53444.gt: In order to cut your acorn squash in half, select a sharp, study knife with an 8 to 10 inch blade. Then, place your squash lengthwise on the cutting board and cut ½ an inch off the ends of the squash. Next, place your acorn squash sliced-side down so the squash looks like it's standing up. Use a rocking or sawing motion to cut the squash right down the middle.
53444.pred: To cut acorn squash, first wash and dry the squash. Then, cut the stem off and place the squash stem side down on a cutting board. Using a sharp knife, cut the squash in half lengthwise. Scoop out the seeds and stringy parts with a spoon. The squash is now ready to be peeled, cubed, or baked.

53490.question: How To Use a Mandoline
53490.gt: To use a mandoline, unfold the mandoline's legs, place them on a cutting board, and face the mandoline perpendicular to you. Next, cut the fruit or veggie in half to create a flat surface. Then, place the food in the hand guard so the flat side faces the runway and slot the hand guard over the mandoline. Finally, hold the mandoline steady with your non-dominant hand and push the food down the runway to cut one slice. Repeat this motion with even pressure to make more slices of the same thickness.
53490.pred: To use a mandoline, first, remove the end of the vegetable you want to slice. Then, score the peel of the vegetable with a knife. Next, place the vegetable on the mandoline and slice it. You can also use a julien disc to create matchstick strips. To make thin slices, use a thin slicing disc. To make thin shavings, use a separate julienning mandolin.
