54088.question: How To Cross Hatch
54088.gt: To learn basic cross hatching, draw a series of parallel lines. Next, add a perpendicular series of lines over the first set of lines. If you want to create lighter shading, draw fewer lines spread further apart. Alternatively, make the lines thicker and add more layers closer together for darker shading. You can also add layers of cross hatching in different directions to create a subtle, rich shading.
54088.pred: Cross hatching is a technique used in drawing and painting to create shading and texture. It involves drawing parallel lines in a criss-cross pattern to create a textured effect. The lines can be drawn in different directions and at different angles to create a variety of textures. Cross hatching can be used to create shadows, highlights, and depth in a drawing. It is a versatile technique that can be used in a variety of mediums, including pencil, ink, and paint.

54096.question: How To Make a Tortillon
54096.gt: To make a tortillon, start by measuring 1 inch down the side of a piece of copy paper and marking it with a pencil. Flip the paper and mark it the same way on the other side, then connect the 2 marks with a straight line. Next, use scissors to cut along the line so you end up with 2 identical pieces of paper. Then, grasp one of the pieces by the narrowest end and roll it tightly towards the outer edge of the paper. Finally, use a piece of thick wire to push the center out so the tip is pencil-shaped, and secure the paper with a small piece of tape.
54096.pred: To make a tortillon, you will need a piece of paper, a craft knife, and some glue or tape. First, cut a piece of paper to the desired size. Then, roll the paper tightly from one end to the other, making sure it is as tight as possible. If you have a craft knife, use it to help you roll the paper more easily. Once you have rolled the paper, use glue or tape to secure the end of the roll. This will create a cylindrical shape that can be used as a tortillon.

54315.question: How To Insert a Male Catheter
54315.gt: To insert a male catheter, start by washing your hands and the area around your penis with warm water and soap. Put lubricating jelly on the first 10 inches of the catheter and get into a seated position with your legs bent. Use your non-dominant hand to hold your penis straight out in front of your body and slowly insert the end of the catheter into the opening at the top of your penis. Push the catheter in about 7 to 10 inches or until urine starts to flow through it. As soon as you are done urinating, pinch the top of the catheter closed with your dominant hand and slowly pull it out. Keep the end facing upward so no urine spills out.
54315.pred: The video demonstrates the process of inserting a male catheter. The person in the video first cleans the area around the penis with a wipe. Then, they insert a catheter into the penis. The video also shows how to attach a catheter bag to the catheter.

54361.question: How To Wash Egg off a House
54361.gt: Washing egg off your house probably isn’t how you'd like to spend your time, but fortunately you can easily remove egg stains with household items. If you can, remove the excess egg before it dries, since this will be much easier. Wipe it away with a cloth or scrape it off with a dull knife. If you have a hose in your garden, spray the egg away with water. To get rid of any dried stains, try mixing 1 cup of non-bleach laundry detergent into a bucket of warm water. Then, scrub your wall with the water and a hard-bristled brush. Alternatively, mix 1 cup each of white vinegar and warm water in a spray bottle. Then, spray the egg stains with it and scrub them off with a sponge. For tougher stains, try using a paint scraper.
54361.pred: To wash egg off a house, you need to first let the egg bake in the sun for a couple of hours. Then, fill a bucket with cold water and add a little bit of soap. Use a razor blade to scrape off the egg from the glass, and then use a steel wool to clean the egg off the vinyl. Finally, use a towel to wet the glass and rinse it off.

55245.question: How To Artificially Inseminate a Dog
55245.gt: Before artificially inseminating your dog, take it to your vet to make sure it’s in good health. If so, the vet will collect the semen and examine it to make sure the sperm cells look normal. If you don't plan on using the semen right away, ask your vet to chill or freeze it. Once the female dog is ready, the vet will use a pipette to insert the semen in to the uterus.
55245.pred: To artificially inseminate a dog, you will need a bag, lube, and a syringe. First, you will need to get the dog comfortable with the bag by placing it in the dog's mouth. Then, you will need to insert the syringe into the bag and slowly pull it up to collect the semen. Once you have collected the semen, you will need to insert the syringe into the dog's vagina and slowly push it in. You will also need to massage the area to help the dog relax and allow the semen to be deposited. Finally, you will need to hold the dog in a comfortable position for a few minutes to allow the semen to be deposited.

56361.question: How To Clean a Memory Foam Pillow
56361.gt: To remove a stain from a memory foam pillow, mix equal parts water and vinegar in a spray bottle. If you want to cut the vinegar smell, add a squeeze of fresh lemon juice to the mixture. Remove the pillowcase to directly spray the stain. After 5 minutes, use a damp cloth to blot the affected area. If the stain doesn't lift immediately, repeat the process until it does. Finally, to deodorize and disinfect your pillow, hang it on a clothesline in the bright sunlight!
56361.pred: To clean a memory foam pillow, you can use a mixture of baking soda and water to create a paste. Apply the paste to the pillow and let it sit for a few hours. Then, rinse the pillow with water and let it air dry. You can also use a vacuum cleaner to remove any dirt or debris from the pillow.

56404.question: How To Make a Simple Homemade Incubator for Chicks
56404.gt: If you want to raise chicks at home with an incubator, purchase a styrofoam cooler and cut a hole in one end. Then, slide the socket of a lamp and a 25 watt light bulb through the hole, and duct tape around the hole on the inside and outside of the container. Use chicken wire to divide the container in half, with the bulb on one side of the container to prevent the chicks from getting burned. Next, place a digital thermometer and humidity gauge in the box along with a bowl of water, and turn the light on to test the incubator.
56404.pred: To make a simple homemade incubator for chicks, you will need a few materials such as a rat, rags, a thermometer, aluminum foil, a tortilla holder, a light bulb, and fertile eggs. First, set up the rat and rags in the bottom of the room. Then, install the tortilla holder and place the aluminum foil behind the bowl. Next, place the rags on the bottom of the room and install the tortilla holder. Once that is done, you can test the temperature by placing the thermometer in the bowl and turning it on. If the temperature rises to 200 Fahrenheit, close the lid and turn on the light bulb. You can then place the eggs in the bowl and turn them two times a day. To maintain humidity, add water to the bowl using a Gatorade cap. Finally, turn off the lights and let the eggs incubate.

56653.question: How To Make French Dressing
56653.gt: To make a basic French dressing, start by pureeing ketchup, sugar, vinegar, water, garlic salt, black pepper, and salt in a blender. While pureeing, slowly pour 1 cup of vegetable oil in. Once all of the ingredients are incorporated, chill the dressing for a few hours before using. You can store the dressing in the refrigerator in an airtight container for 1 week.
56653.pred: To make French dressing, you will need 6 tablespoons of olive oil, 2 tablespoons of red wine vinegar, 1 teaspoon of Dijon mustard, 1 clove of garlic, and salt and pepper to taste. First, add the olive oil, red wine vinegar, and Dijon mustard to a jar. Then, add the garlic clove and let it sit for a few minutes to infuse the flavors. Finally, add salt and pepper to taste and shake the jar well to combine all the ingredients. This simple recipe will create a delicious and easy-to-make French dressing that can be used to enhance any salad.

57842.question: How To Make Creamy Broccoli Soup
57842.gt: To make creamy broccoli soup, start by chopping the broccoli into small pieces. In a pan, saute an onion in olive oil until it's translucent before adding the stock and a diced potato. When the mixture starts bubbling, let it simmer for 12 minutes. Then, add the broccoli and simmer the soup for another 10 minutes. Finish by pureeing the soup with a handheld blender and adding cream and seasoning.
57842.pred: To make creamy broccoli soup, start by melting butter in a pot and adding finely diced onion and celery. Cook until the vegetables are soft and translucent. Then, add flour to thicken the mixture and stir constantly to prevent burning. Next, add broccoli florets and stalks, along with broth, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium-low and let it simmer for about 20 minutes or until the broccoli is soft. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup to your desired consistency. Finally, add heavy cream and let it simmer for another 5 minutes before serving.

58304.question: How To Make Beignets
58304.gt: To make beignets, start by dissolving yeast in a bowl of warm water and then adding evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, flour, and shortening. Then, mix everything together until a dough forms and chill the dough in the fridge for 24 hours. Next, roll the dough out flat and cut it into small squares. When you're finished cutting the dough, heat some vegetable oil in a large saucepan and fry a few of the dough squares at a time for 2-3 minutes. Finally, top the beignets with powdered sugar before serving.
58304.pred: To make beignets, you need to start by activating the yeast and warm water in a mixing bowl. Then, add salt, fresh lemon zest, nutmeg, and an egg to the mixture and whisk it up. Gradually add flour to the mixture and use a stand-up mixer to make the batter. Add the butter to the batter and mix it in. Knead the dough until it becomes smooth and then let it rise in a warm draft-free spot until it doubles in size. Punch down the dough and roll it out until it's a half-inch thick. Cut the dough into squares and let it rise again. Heat oil in a medium pot or deep fryer until it reaches 350 degrees. Fry the beignets in small batches until they are brown all over. Drain the beignets on a paper towel or brown paper. Enjoy the beignets with powdered sugar or strawberry jam.

58634.question: How To Test Soil pH
58634.gt: To test your soil’s pH, first, go online or to your local garden center and buy pH test strips, which are also called litmus paper. Then, take a handful of the soil you want to test and mix it with just enough distilled water to give it the consistency of a milkshake. Next, put the test strip into the dirt mixture and hold it there for 20-30 seconds. Remove it from the dirt and dip it quickly into distilled water to clean it off. Finally, you can determine your soil’s pH by comparing the strip's coloration to the color-coded key that came with the test strips.
58634.pred: To test the soil pH, you need to take a sample of the soil and run it through a lab or use a pH meter at home. The pH meter is a device that measures the acidity or alkalinity of the soil. You can also use deionized or distilled water to help the meter get a proper reading of the soil's pH. The pH of the soil can impact the availability of nutrients within the soil and the ability of the plant to take them up.

59313.question: How To Make a Green Smoothie
59313.gt: To make a green smoothie, start by pouring liquid such as water, soy milk, or regular milk into a blender. Next, add chopped fruit and greens, and pulse the mixture a few times to break up the ingredients. Afterwards, blend on a low speed for 30 seconds, then switch to the high speed and blend until everything is smooth. At this point, add some ice cubes or frozen fruit if you want your smoothie extra cold, and blend until smooth.
59313.pred: To make a green smoothie, you will need spinach, cucumber, parsley, ginger, lemon juice, mjual dates, banana, some filtered water, almond milk, and a couple of ice cubes if you like your smoothie extra cold. In a high speed blender, you will need to throw in all your ingredients starting with the liquid first. It just helps it blend a little bit better. Once your smoothie is nice and blended, go ahead, serve it in the glass and enjoy it for breakfast, has a snack, dessert.

59726.question: How To Refinish Particle Board Cabinets
59726.gt: If your particle board cabinets are looking worse for wear, you can easily refinish them yourself. All you’ll need is painter’s tape, sandpaper, primer, paint, and a clear varnish. Use an oil-based primer and an acrylic or oil-based paint. Before you begin, cover any areas you don’t want painted with tape. You’ll need to sand the surfaces, apply a coat of primer, then paint your cabinets. It’ll take 24 to 48 hours for each coat of your primer and paint to dry. You might need more than 1 coat of paint to achieve the color you want. After your final coat has dried, apply a layer of clear varnish to protect the paint.
59726.pred: To refinish particle board cabinets, first remove all hardware and put it aside. Then, use a degreaser to wipe down all surfaces and let it dry. Lightly sand the surfaces, fill any holes with wood putty, and sand again. Wipe off any dust with a tack cloth. Use high-quality rollers and materials, including a primer and thin coats of paint. Allow the paint to dry between coats. Two coats of primer and two coats of paint are recommended. A clear coat can be added if desired.

59773.question: How To Make Curry Puffs
59773.gt: To make curry puffs, start by boiling potatoes until tender and cutting them into small pieces. Next, blanch peas and sauté onions. Add curry powder, turmeric, chili powder, black pepper, and salt to the pan with the peas and potatoes. Then, to make the pastry, mix flour, salt, and shortening in a bowl, add warm water, and knead. After allowing the dough to rest, roll it out, cut it in circles, and fill them with the potato mixture. Pinch the stuffed circles closed and fry them in oil until golden brown.
59773.pred: To make curry puffs, you will need the following ingredients: chicken, sweet potato, fish sauce, soy sauce, onion, cilantro stems, curry powder, sugar, and white pepper. First, you will need to cook the onion until it is soft and translucent. Then, add the curry powder and let it toast in the oil for 15 seconds. Next, add the chicken and cook until it is no longer clumpy. Add the sweet potato and all the seasoning, including fish sauce, soy sauce, sugar, and white pepper. Cook until the sweet potato starts to break down and the filling is creamy. Add the cilantro stems and cook until the filling is ready. To wrap the puffs, use spring roll wrappers and cut them into strips. Place a spoonful of filling in the center of the wrapper and fold it into a triangle. Brush the wrapper with egg and double wrap the puffs. Fry the puffs in hot oil until they are golden brown. Serve with si racha hot sauce.

59986.question: How To Build an Ant Farm
59986.gt: To build an ant farm, start by placing a lidded glass jar inside a larger one and filling in the area between them with a mixture of slightly damp dirt and sand. Next, find some ants in your yard and gather them up using a large spoon. Once you’ve collected about 25 ants, put them in the large jar with the dirt. Then, put the lid on the large jar and use an awl or sharp knife to poke tiny holes in it so the ants can breathe. Finally, keep the jar covered with a black cloth while you’re not watching them to encourage them to dig closer to the sides of the jar.

60376.question: How To Make a Fish Trap
60376.gt: The best way to make a fish trap depends on what you fish for. Make a smaller trap if you fish for minnows or pan fish. Make a larger trap if you fish for catfish, carp, or suckers. Arrange 12 pieces of lumber into the shape of a cube and nail them together with a hammer. Wrap wire mesh around 3 sides the frame if you fish for minnows or pan fish, and wrap poultry netting around the 3 sides if you fish for catfish, carp, or suckers. Secure the mesh or netting to the edges of the frame with snap ties. Then, create a funnel with the mesh or netting and use it to cover the open side of the cube.

Then, make a couple of small holes in the base of the bottle so that the water may come out but don't make them too big not to let the fish escape. Next, rub the thread around the neck of the bottle a few times and start your trap. Fill the bottle with bait, it's better to use bread crumbs or crunchies and we also made the gap some worms haurache grasshopper fish will bite first too. Finally, take some baits and put it into the bottle then fill the bottle with water and set your trap.

60911.question: How To Tie Dye Using Rit Powder
60911.gt: If you want to tie dye some of your fabrics, Rit powder will give you more control over mixing colors. Start by gathering your supplies, including plastic bags, newspaper, gloves, rubber bands, a large tub, hot water, and vinegar or salt. Then, bunch up and twist your fabric and wrap rubber bands around it to hold it together and create your tie-dye pattern. Place rubber bands around the twisted fabric at intervals to separate the colors. Next, fill a 3-gallon bucket with your dye solution, which you'll want to make according to the instructions on the box. To make sure your colors are vibrant, add 1 cup of salt or vinegar to your solution. Either dip your fabric into the desired colors or submerge your entire piece into the bucket for a single color. Once you’ve applied all of your colors, rinse your fabric under hot water. Then, gradually decrease the water temperature until the water runs clear.

62185.question: How To Clean Upholstery with a Steam Cleaner
62185.gt: To clean upholstery with a steam cleaner, start by filling the steam cleaner with warm water and upholstery cleaner. Then, remove any pillows and cushions on your couch and use the steam cleaner to clean those first. To use the steam cleaner, simply press the button to spray the steam onto the upholstery and then vacuum up the moisture with the hose. When you're finished with the pillows and cushions, steam clean the rest of the couch and then let it air dry.

The steam will help loosen any dirt or stains, making it easier to remove.

62187.question: How To Fix Sagging Sofa Cushions
62187.gt: To fix sagging sofa cushions, start by unzipping the cushions, or opening them with a thread cutter if they don’t have zippers. Then, if your cushions have loose stuffing, add polyester fiberfill and distribute it evenly with your hands to plump up the cushions. Alternatively, wrap quilt batting around cushions that have pillow-like stuffing to give them more body. Finally, zip your cushions back up or sew them back together, then put them back on your sofa.

Then, fill the cushion with new stuffing, making sure to avoid clumping it up. Finally, zip up the cushion and place it back on the sofa. This will help to restore the shape and comfort of the cushions.

62194.question: How To Reupholster a Couch
62194.gt: To reupholster a couch, start by removing the old fabric, starting at the bottom of the sofa and working your way up. Next, cut out pieces of fabric that correspond with each section of the couch using the old fabric as a guide. Then, sew the seams together with a sewing machine and heavy duty thread. Finally, attach the fabric to the couch with a staple gun, working from the innermost parts of the couch outward.

Finally, put the new fabric on the couch and reattach the legs.

62332.question: How To Keep Ribbon from Fraying
62332.gt: Fabric ribbons tend to fray and separate at the edges, but you can keep your ribbon from fraying by cutting it at a diagonal and applying nail polish or glue at the edges. Snip the edge of your ribbon at a 45-degree angle or cut it in an inverted “v” shape, which will help with the fraying. Apply a thin layer of clear nail polish to the edges of the ribbon to help the fabric stay together. You can also apply an anti-fraying spray or clear craft glue to the tip of your ribbon to keep the threads together.

62393.question: How To Make Grain Free Dog Treats
62393.gt: To make grain-free dog treats, remove the peel from 1 banana, put the fruit in a large bowl, and mash it with a fork. Next, add 3 tablespoons of smooth peanut butter and 1 large egg and stir until they're fully incorporated. Then, put 1¾ cup of garbanzo flour in a separate bowl, pour the banana mixture into it, and stir until the mixture forms a dough. Roll out the dough to be ¼ inch thick and use a knife or cookie cutter to cut out the individual treats. Finally, bake the treats at 300 degrees Fahrenheit for 30-40 minutes until they're golden brown.

Mix the ingredients together and place the mixture on a baking sheet. Bake the mixture in the oven for 30 minutes at 175 degrees. Once the treats are done, let them cool down for about 30 minutes to an hour before placing them in an airtight container. These treats should last for about a week.

62620.question: How To Make a Bottle Tree
62620.gt: A bottle tree is a great way to reuse old bottles and create an eye-catching sculpture. You’ll need at least a dozen wine and spirits bottles to make your bottle tree, but you can add bottles to the tree over time. You’ll also need a small dead tree, a premade bottle tree frame, or a frame you made yourself. All you need to do is remove the labels from the bottles, then slide them onto the branches so they're upside down. If you have a lot of bottles and the tree starts to waver, cement the tree into place or weigh down its base so it doesn’t blow over in a strong wind.

The bottles can be of any color, but cobalt blue is a popular choice. The base of the tree can be made from an old hollowed-out tree or a wooden post. The tree can be placed in a garden or backyard, and it can be decorated with flowers and other plants.

62635.question: How To Make Wine Bottle Accent Lights
62635.gt: For a fun, creative, and customizable way to add a gentle glow to any room in your house, make your own wine bottle accent lights. You'll need to prepare the bottles by washing them in hot, soapy water and allowing them to dry completely. Also, you'll need to find a drill spot on the bottle, preferably somewhere on the back near the bottom. Once you drill your hole, you'll want to sand it down to avoid any sharp edges. You can then feed your string of lights into the bottle through the hole you just drilled. Then, plan to use the stopper to protect the cord from being cut by the raw glass edges of the hole.

62830.question: How To Clean with Rubbing Alcohol
62830.gt: Rubbing alcohol is a great product for cleaning and disinfecting your everyday items like mirrors, keyboards, and glass. Avoid cleaning your electronic screens, delicate fabrics, or finished wood, since the alcohol can damage them. Before you apply the rubbing alcohol, wipe your item with a clean, damp rag to get rid of any dirt or grease. Then, rinse your cloth and dampen it with rubbing alcohol. Wipe your item gently with the rag to get rid of any stains and sterilize it. To get into small crevices, try using a Q-tip. If there’s any residue left from the alcohol, wipe it up with a clean rag.

You can also use it to clean stainless steel appliances, remove hairspray buildup, and remove frost from windows. Additionally, you can use it to clean sponges and cloths, clean sinks and chrome, and clean dry erase boards. It can also be used to clean microfiber sofa stains and disinfect your mouse and keyboard.

62844.question: How To Make a Natural Disinfectant
62844.gt: To make a natural disinfectant out of vinegar, mix 1 part water, 1 part vinegar, and 5-15 drops of your favorite essential oil, like lemon, chamomile, or lavender. For general cleaning, pour the mixture into a spray bottle. If you would prefer to use disinfectant wipes, pour the vinegar mixture into a large glass jar and submerge 15-20 small squares of cloth in the liquid. When you’re ready to use a wipe, remove it from the jar and wring it out, then use it to wipe surfaces clean.

63396.question: How To Make Bhatura
63396.gt: To make bhatura, start by mixing active dry yeast in warm water and allowing it to sit for 10 minutes. Next, in a large bowl, mix maida, sooji, sugar, and salt. Then, add the yeast solution, oil, and yogurt, stirring all of the ingredients together until a soft dough forms. Once everything is combined, cover the bowl and let the dough rise in a warm location for 3 to 4 hours. After the dough doubles in volume, divide it into 8 equal balls and flatten them into circles with a rolling pin. Finally, fry each bhatura in hot oil until it’s golden brown.

64009.question: How To Make Gluten Free Flour
64009.gt: To make gluten free all-purpose flour, start by pouring brown rice flour, white rice flour, sweet rice flour, and tapioca flour into a large bowl. Next, add xanthan gum as a gluten replacement and to allow for better binding. Then, use a whisk to blend the ingredients together. After 3-5 minutes of mixing, transfer your flour mix to an air-tight container. You can use your gluten free all-purpose flour as a substitute for regular flour.

64286.question: How To Clean Felt
64286.gt: To clean felt, start by dabbing a small amount of gentle dish soap, such as Ivory or Dawn, directly onto the stain and blotting it with a soft, damp cloth. Alternatively, try using diluted white vinegar for stains that are particularly stubborn. Then, rinse the cloth with cool water to remove any soap or vinegar and use it to blot the stained felt again. Repeat this process until all the soap or vinegar has been rinsed from the felt. Afterwards, firmly press a clean, dry towel onto the area to soak up any excess moisture before allowing the felt to dry in a cool place.

Then, spray the felt hat cleaner on the hat and let it soak for a few seconds. After that, use the brush or scrubbing tool to clean the hat. Finally, let the hat dry before flipping it over and setting it on anything.

64327.question: How To Clean a Ceramic Sink
64327.gt: One way to clean your ceramic sink is to use baking soda, a soft sponge, and lemon juice. Use water to moisten your sink and sponge and then sprinkle 1/2 cup of baking soda all over the sink. Scrub the sink with your sponge until all debris has been removed and then rinse the sink with water. After it has been cleaned, brighten your sink by squeezing lemon juice all over and letting it sit for 30 minutes before rinsing.

64338.question: How To Clean a Kitchen Sink
64338.gt: To clean a stainless steel kitchen sink, mix together 1 teaspoon of baking soda and 1/4 cup of lemon juice and pour this mixture all over your sink. Let it sit for 10 minutes before rinsing it with hot or boiling water. To clean the drain, mix 1/2 cup of baking soda with 1/4 cup of lemon juice. After it has soaked, pour the boiling water down the drain.

Next, use a toothbrush to clean the area where the sink meets the countertop and the drain. After that, use a sponge to scrub the sink and rinse it with hot water. Finally, use a microfiber cloth to dry and shine the sink.

64342.question: How To Clean a Meat Grinder
64342.gt: To clean a meat grinder, start by feeding bread into the machine to to soak up any oil and grease. If your grinder is electric, simply wipe everything down with a damp towel. Otherwise, take apart the grinder and soak all of its parts in a large bucket of soapy water for about 20 minutes. To maintain your meat grinder, keep the meat and the parts cold for easier clean up, and hand wash the grinder after each use.

64343.question: How To Clean a Range Hood
64343.gt: If you need to clean your range hood, make sure you use a cleaner that's appropriate for the material, such as soapy water for a plastic hood and copper cleaner for copper. Spray the cleaner onto the outside of the hood, then wipe it off and dry the hood with a paper towel. To make cleaning the inside easier, boil a pot of water so the steam loosens the grime on the hood. Next, test spray your cleaner on a small area before applying it to the hood if it causes no damage. When the hood is clean, wipe off the cleaner with a damp towel.

64430.question: How To Clean out Your Closet
64430.gt: As you start clearing everything from your closet, try on your clothes and sort them into four piles to keep, store, sell, and donate. Let go of anything that doesn’t fit or you haven’t worn in over a year. Try selling high quality clothes and accessories online or at a local consignment shop, and if you can’t, donate them to a local charity. Be sure to then organize the clothes you keep by color or type, and utilize any storage containers or racks.

Finally, you can donate the clothes in the "no" pile and put the clothes in the "yes" pile back in your closet.

64758.question: How To Use a Chocolate Fountain
64758.gt: To use a chocolate fountain, start by buying a couverture chocolate, which contains higher levels of cocoa butter, for best results. Alternatively, add a tablespoon of canola oil to every 5 pounds of chocolate you use to smooth the chocolate's texture. Next, melt the chocolate for 3 minutes in the microwave, or in a double boiler. When you're ready to set up the fountain, pour the chocolate into the fountain base and turn the fountain on.

64901.question: How To Feel Like Eating Breakfast First Thing in the Morning
64901.gt: You may find it hard to feel like eating breakfast first thing in the morning, but there are things you can do to help! Try to avoid eating anything for about 2-3 hours before you go to bed each night so you’ll be more hungry when you wake up. Set your alarm a little earlier than normal to give yourself plenty of time to eat, and do about 30 minutes of light exercise, like push-ups or sit-ups, to work up an appetite. Over time, this should help your body get used to eating in the mornings.

First, make sure you get enough sleep and avoid sleep deprivation or a bad night's sleep, as it can make you feel nauseated and bloated. Second, consider having a substantial breakfast, as the saying "eat like a king for breakfast, a queen for lunch, and a pauper for dinner" suggests. Third, check your lunch and dinner calories to ensure you are not removing your morning hunger. Fourth, exercise before breakfast to work up an appetite. Fifth, allow enough time for breakfast and prioritize sitting down for a relaxed meal. Sixth, drink a smoothie or a multi-fruit juice to give your body some vitamins and a small amount of fiber. Seventh, if you are feeling stressed or in a rush in the morning, try to prioritize sitting down for a relaxed meal. Eighth, if you are feeling too nauseated or averse to chewing down a glass of juice, try it before you take a shower. Ninth, don't snack at night, as it can make you hungry enough to eat breakfast. Tenth, drink plenty of water before bed to help keep your stomach acid in check.

64963.question: How To Make a Duck Fart
64963.gt: To make a simple duck fart, pour Kahlua into a shot glass so it’s a little less than half full. Then, hover a spoon upside down in the glass and pour Bailey’s Irish Cream over the spoon until it is near the top. Top off the drink with Crown Royal and drink the whole shot in one go so the flavors mix properly.
64963.pred: To make a duck fart, you will need a half ounce of Kahlua, a half ounce of Irish cream, and a half ounce of Crown Royal. First, pour the Kahlua into a shot glass. Then, pour the Irish cream on top of the Kahlua. Finally, pour the Crown Royal on top of the Irish cream. The drink will look like a duck fart.

65025.question: How To Make Feeding Comfortable for Arthritic Dogs
65025.gt: Even everyday activities like eating can be difficult for arthritic dogs, but you can make this a bit easier by raising your dog’s food bowl slightly off the ground on a small coffee table or cardboard box. While this makes it easier for your dog to eat, a raised bowl has a slightly higher risk of bloat, so watch for whining or excessive scratching after eating and give your dog 90 minutes to rest after eating before giving it exercise. If you feed your dog in the kitchen or another place with slippery floors, put down runners or rugs where your dog eats to lower its risk of it falling down. You might want to also consider moving your dog’s dish to a carpeted room, although this can get messy if your pup is a sloppy eater.
65025.pred: To make feeding comfortable for arthritic dogs, it is recommended to use a bowl that is easy for them to access and to place it at a comfortable height. Additionally, it is important to provide a soft and comfortable surface for the dog to eat on, such as a mat or a raised platform. It is also recommended to avoid feeding the dog from a table or a high surface, as this can cause strain on their joints. Finally, it is important to monitor the dog's eating habits and to adjust their food intake as needed to ensure that they are getting the proper nutrition for their condition.

66756.question: How To Make Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
66756.gt: To make apple cinnamon oatmeal, start by bringing a pot of water to a boil, then add the oats. Cook the oats on a medium heat until the water has been absorbed. Using a smaller saucepan, heat the bite-sized pieces of apples and brown sugar over a medium heat. When the apples are soft, stir the mixture into the oatmeal, divide it into 2 bowls, and serve immediately.
66756.pred: To make apple cinnamon oatmeal, you will need a quarter cup of peeled and diced apples, half a teaspoon of ground cinnamon, one tablespoon of maple syrup, one cup of whole milk, and one cup of old-fashioned oats. First, boil one cup of water in a saucepan. Then, add the old-fashioned oats to the boiling water and let them cook for a few minutes. Next, add the diced apples to the saucepan and cook for about 10 minutes. After that, add the maple syrup and cinnamon to the saucepan and stir well. Finally, add one cup of whole milk to the saucepan and let it cook for about 10 to 12 minutes. Once the oatmeal is cooked, transfer it to a bowl and sprinkle some cinnamon on top. Your delicious apple cinnamon oatmeal is now ready to be enjoyed.

66758.question: How To Make Baked Oatmeal
66758.gt: To make baked oatmeal, start by mixing the old fashioned oats, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, and brown sugar in a large bowl and milk, eggs, and vanilla in a separate bowl. Stir as you pour the wet mixture and melted butter into the big bowl with the dry mixture. Once all the ingredients are mixed, pour the oatmeal into a buttered baking dish and bake it at 350°F for up to 45 minutes. After 45 minutes, take the oatmeal out of the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before eating it.
66758.pred: To make baked oatmeal, you will need to soak chia seeds in milk, chop up fruits like dates, apples, and berries, and mix them with oats, baking powder, cinnamon, plant milk, water, vanilla, chopped coconut, and walnuts. Then, transfer the mixture into a baking dish and bake it in the oven. The recipe can be customized with different fruits, nuts, and seeds.

67098.question: How To Keep a Cut Apple from Turning Brown
67098.gt: To keep a cut apple from turning brown, combine 1 tbsp of lemon juice and 1 cup (240 ml) of water in a large bowl. Add your apple pieces to the bowl. Soak the apple pieces in the mixture for 3-5 minutes. Drain them and rinse them off with cool water. If you aren't serving them right away, put the apple pieces in a resealable bag and close it tightly, taking care to remove all the air. Keep the cut apples in your fridge until you're ready to enjoy them.
67098.pred: To keep a cut apple from turning brown, you can soak it in honey water. Honey water is a mixture of honey and water, and it can help prevent the apple from browning. The video shows that the apple slices that were soaked in honey water stayed bright for over 24 hours, while the untreated apple slices started to brown after a few seconds. The video also explains that browning is caused by an enzyme called polyphenol oxidase, and a peptide compound in honey stops it from activating the browning in the fruit.

67160.question: How To Pickle Okra
67160.gt: Before pickling okra, sterilize the jars, lids, and tops by submerging them in boiling water for 10 minutes, then placing them on a clean towel. Next, heat the pickling spices with water, white vinegar, sugar, and salt until it comes to a boil. At that point, reduce the heat to a simmer, pack the jars with okra, and pour in the hot pickling juice. Then, put on the lids and submerge the jars in boiling water for 10 minutes. Afterwards, remove the jars from the boiling water, and let the pickled okra sit for at least 1 week before using.
67160.pred: To pickle okra, you will need a pot of water, a jar, and okra. First, bring the water to a boil in the pot. Then, place the okra in the jar and pour the boiling water over it. Let the jar sit in the boiling water for 10 minutes. After 10 minutes, remove the jar from the water and let it cool. Once the jar is cool, you can store it in a cool, dark place.

67211.question: How To Make Your Clothes Smell Good
67211.gt: If you’re washing your clothes with detergent regularly and they still smell bad, try storing your clothes with good-smelling items like scented sachets or scented dryer sheets. Add a few drops of perfume to a piece of fabric and store the fabric with your clothes, or spray an air freshener into your closet or dresser. Place an open container of baking soda in your closet or dresser to absorb bad smells.
67211.pred: To make your clothes smell good, you can use fabric dryer sheets, cotton balls with essential oils, or sprays like Febreze. You can also use a spray bottle to freshen up your clothes.

67219.question: How To Wash a Zipper Hoodie
67219.gt: You’ll want to wash your zipper hoodie every 6 or 7 wears to keep it clean. To wash it in a machine, close the zipper so it doesn’t snag on the fabric or get damaged. Then, turn it inside out to protect the color and texture of the inside fabric. Use a mild detergent, but avoid fabric softener and dryer sheets since these can damage the fabric. Set your washer to its delicate cycle and wash your hoodie in cold water to help preserve the color and any graphics on it.
67219.pred: To wash a zipper hoodie, first, pull the sleeves and the entire hoodie inside out. Then, zip it up to prevent the print from cracking. Next, put the hoodie in the washing machine with clothes of identical colors. Add a wash pod and turn the washing machine to cold. Choose a regular program and select the quick wash option. Finally, turn on the washing machine and wait for it to finish.

67224.question: How To Wash Clothes by Hand
67224.gt: To wash clothes by hand, start by separating your lights and darks like you would if you were machine washing them. Next, fill a sink or tub with warm water and pour in some laundry detergent. Then, submerge your light clothes in the water and swish them around with your hands. After a few minutes, take your clothes out and rinse them under a faucet or in a different container filled with clean water. When you're done washing your lights, repeat the process with your darks. Finally, lay your clothes on a flat, clean surface to air dry.
67224.pred: To wash clothes by hand, you need a few things: clothes, a sink or bathtub, and soap. First, stop up the sink or bathtub with wadded-up toilet paper if you don't have a stopper. Then, turn on the water and add a cap full of soap. Squeeze the clothes in the water and let them soak for ten minutes. Drain the sink and wring out the clothes. Fill the sink with clean water and let it sit for ten minutes. Drain the sink and wring out the clothes again. You can also use a towel to roll up the clothes and wring them out to dry them faster.

67233.question: How To Wash Tulle
67233.gt: To wash tulle attached to a dress or outfit, turn the garment inside out and zip and button all of the closures. If your tulle isn't attached to an outfit, you don't need to do any prep. Next, place the tulle in a mesh laundry bag to protect the delicate fabric and place it in your washing machine. Then, add a mild detergent and wash the tulle in cold water using a gentle cycle. Finally, hang the tulle up to air-dry or tumble-dry it using low heat.
67233.pred: To wash tulle, you can run it through the washing machine on a delicate cycle with cold water. After washing, hang the tulle to dry to prevent shrinkage.

68056.question: How To Make Switchel
68056.gt: To make a refreshing batch of switchel, start by combining apple cider vinegar, maple syrup and ginger in a large jar or pitcher. Be careful not to add too much syrup, since maple syrup is very sugary. Next, add water and shake your container, or stir the mixture thoroughly with a spoon. If you’d prefer to use seltzer, add it right before serving to keep your carbonated water from going flat. Serve immediately, or let the switchel steep for 12 to 24 hours to strengthen the flavor.
68056.pred: To make switchel, you need a half gallon of clean drinking water, a half cup of unsulphured molasses, a quarter cup of apple cider vinegar, and a heaping tablespoon full of powdered ginger. Stir the ingredients well, and you can use barbados molasses or light molasses instead of blackstrap molasses. You can also use maple sugar or maple syrup as an alternative to molasses. Lemon juice or lime juice can be used instead of vinegar, and fresh ginger can be used instead of powdered ginger. You can also add rum to the drink for a variation.

68167.question: How To Build Porch Steps
68167.gt: If you want to build porch steps, measure from the top of the porch to the ground, then take the total height and divide it by the riser, which is usually between 6 and 8 inches. For example, divide 35 inches by a 7 inch riser to get 5 steps. Next, mark the steps on your stringers, cut out the steps with a saw, and attach the stringers to your porch. Connect the riser boards and treads, then finish your steps with a waterproof deck stain.
68167.pred: To build porch steps, you need to first remove the old staircase and then measure the new proposed rise and run. Cut the plywood to the desired size and attach the stringers using brackets. Then, cut the treads and risers to the correct size and attach them to the stringers. Finally, add a handrail and fill in any gaps with caulk.

68174.question: How To Clean a Composite Deck
68174.gt: To clean a composite deck, sweep it with a broom or leaf blower at least once a week to get rid of dirt and debris. If your deck is still dirty, hose it down, scrub with a brush and soap, then, rinse with a hose. For a faster cleaning option, try using a pressure washer. Just let the machine scrub the deck while it sprays out water and soap. Then, use its water function to wash away the soap and fan function to dry the deck.
68174.pred: To clean a composite deck, first, apply a chemical solution to the deck and let it dwell for a few minutes. Then, use a pressure washing gun with low to medium pressure to remove the solution and any dirt or grime. Be sure to rinse the deck thoroughly to remove any remaining solution.

68250.question: How To Cook Chorizo
68250.gt: To cook chorizo on the stove, start by putting it in a non-stick skillet on medium-high heat. Cook the chorizo for 5 minutes, turning it frequently so it browns on all sides. Then, reduce the heat to medium-low and add ½ a cup of water. Finally, cover the skillet and simmer the chorizo for 12 minutes. For oven-cooked chorizo, set your broiler on high and give it 5-10 minutes to heat up. When the broiler is ready, you can put the chorizo on a broiler pan and broil it for 11-12 minutes, turning it every 4 minutes so it cooks evenly.
68250.pred: To cook chorizo, you need to cut it into small pieces and then cook it in a pan with some oil. You can add some water to the pan to prevent the chorizo from sticking to the bottom. Once the chorizo is cooked, you can add some onions and garlic to the pan and continue cooking until the chorizo is fully cooked. You can then use the chorizo in various dishes, such as empanadas, quesadillas, or scrambled eggs.

68265.question: How To Cure Pork
68265.gt: To cure pork, start by mixing water, sugar, and salt in a large pot. Then, add bay, pepper, clove, allspice, garlic, and thyme to the pot. Once you've prepared the curing mixture, put the pork in the pot and weigh it down with a plate so it's completely submerged. Next, put the lid on the pot and refrigerate the pork for 5 days. After 5 days, remove the pork and pat it dry before cooking.
68265.pred: To cure pork, you need to tie the meat with a string, mix 500 grams of salt and 150 grams of brown sugar, and massage the meat with the mixture. Then, put the meat in the fridge for 24 hours. After that, remove the salt and sugar, and massage the meat with white vinegar. Mix one teaspoon of brown sugar, one teaspoon of salt, and two teaspoons of pepper, and cure the meat again. Finally, put the meat in a place where there is not too much wind or dust, and keep it at room temperature for 24 hours.

68285.question: How To Make Kielbasa
68285.gt: To make kielbasa, cut the meat into pieces that are small enough to fit into the grinder, mix in the spices, and grind the meat. Next, fit a casing over the stuffing tube, fill the sausage stuffer with meat, and crank the machine so the sausage fills the casing. Tie off the casing at the front end, then pinch the sausage with your thumb and forefinger every 6 inches. Lastly, hang the sausage in a cool, dry storage area for 1 hour, then smoke and cold shock your kielbasa!
68285.pred:
To make kielbasa, you will need to follow these steps:
1. Gather the ingredients, including pork shoulder roast, chuck roast, sugar, garlic powder, coarse black pepper, onion powder, mustard powder, nonfat powdered milk, ice cold water, kosher salt, and instacure #1.
2. Trim and chop the pork shoulder roast and chuck roast into smaller pieces.
3. Use a meat grinder to grind the meat into a fine consistency.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the sugar, garlic powder, coarse black pepper, onion powder, mustard powder, and nonfat powdered milk together.
5. Add the ice cold water and kosher salt to the meat grinder and mix until the salt dissolves.
6. Add the instacure #1 to the meat grinder and mix until the salt dissolves.
7. Add the mixture of sugar, garlic powder, coarse black pepper, onion powder, mustard powder, and nonfat powdered milk to the meat grinder and mix until well combined.
8. Cover the meat grinder with a lid and let the sausage cure overnight in the fridge.
9. Attach the hog casing to the meat grinder and hand crank the stuffer until the meat comes to the end of the horn.
10. Tie a knot at the end of the hog casing and continue hand cranking the stuffer until all the air is pushed out.
11. Use a sterilized straight pen to prick all of the sausages to get rid of any air pockets.
12. Cook the sausages on a grill for 2-3 hours or until they reach an internal temperature of 150°.
13. Remove the sausages from the grill and put them in an ice water bath to stop the cooking process.
14. Remove the sausages from the ice water bath and pat them dry.
15. Let the sausages rest on a cooling rack for 3 hours at room temperature to allow the flavor to intensify and the color to turn deep red.
16. Package the sausages and store them in the freezer for safekeeping.
17. Serve the sausages with grilled peppers and onions or mustard and sauerkraut.

68304.question: How To Pickle Pork
68304.gt: To quickly pickle pork to add flavor to the meat, place it in a large pot with apple cider vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, bay leaves, and garlic. Then, pour enough water into the pot to completely cover the pork. Next, let the pork marinate in the pot for 1 hour so the flavors have time to infuse with the meat. Finally, move the pot to the stove, and simmer everything over low heat for 30 minutes before serving.
68304.pred: To pickle pork, you need to first trim the excess fat from the meat and cut it into manageable pieces. Then, you need to prepare a curing brine by boiling water, salt, sugar, pepper, whole all spice, and whole coriander. After simmering the brine for 10 minutes, you need to cool it down by placing the pot in a sink of cold water. Once the brine is cooled, you need to pour it over the pork and place a plate on top of the pork to keep it submerged in the brine. After that, you need to place the container in the refrigerator and allow the pork to cure for 24 hours per 25 mm or 1 inch of meat thickness. After the curing time is up, you need to remove the pork from the brine and wrap each piece in foil. Then, you need to place the packages in a large roasting pan and bake them for 45 minutes plus 15 minutes extra for every pound in weight. Finally, you need to remove the pork from the oven and allow it to stand for 5 minutes before slicing, if you're serving it hot. If you're using it as cold cuts, allow it to cool completely before slicing thinly.

68558.question: How To Bathe a Chicken
68558.gt: To bathe your chicken, start by filling 2 large containers with warm water, and putting 5-6 drops of dish soap into 1 of them before adding the water. Then, pick your chicken up with its wings pressed against its body, and put it into the soapy water. Keep 1 hand on the bird’s wings and use the other hand to rub soapy water over its feathers. When your chicken is soaped up, move it into the clean water, and rinse it thoroughly. Finally, remove your chicken from the water and pat it dry with a towel, then use a blow dryer on the lowest setting to finish drying it.
68558.pred: To bathe a chicken, first, get the hen wet using a tub of warm water. Then, use a gentle pet shampoo to get her soapy. After that, rinse her off with water and pat her dry with a towel. Finally, use a blow dryer to dry her completely.

68569.question: How To Dye a Baby Chicken
68569.gt: To dye a baby chicken, collect eggs that are on their 11th to 14th day of incubation, and sterilize their shells using alcohol pads with 95 percent isopropyl alcohol. Then, use a clean hypodermic needle to puncture a small hole in the eggshell, about 1 half-inch from the small end of the egg. Make sure not to insert the needle too far, or you could damage the embryo, and do not reuse the same needle on different eggs to ensure sterility. From here, you should inject about .5 milliliters of vegetable food coloring into the egg, just under the shell and membrane, by inserting the tip of the needle into the hole.
68569.pred: To dye a baby chicken, you will need a toothbrush, a bowl of water, and some dye. First, wet the toothbrush in the bowl of water. Then, dip the toothbrush in the dye and gently brush the baby chicken's feathers. Be sure to brush all over the chicken's body, including the wings and tail feathers. Once you have finished brushing, rinse the toothbrush in the bowl of water and gently brush the chicken's feathers again to remove any excess dye. Finally, let the chicken dry in a warm, well-ventilated area.

68808.question: How To Make a Lavender Insect Repellent
68808.gt: To make your own lavender insect repellent, combine lavender essential oil with distilled water or apple cider vinegar. For example, mix 30 to 40 drops of lavender oil with 1.5 ounces of distilled water. Then, pour the mixture into a saucer and place it in an area where you’re seeing lots of insects. For a spray repellent you can use on your skin or clothes, combine 25 drops of lavender oil with ¼ cup of apple cider vinegar in a spray bottle. If the smell of vinegar is too strong for you, use ¼ cup of distilled water instead.
68808.pred: To make a lavender insect repellent, you will need a spray bottle, distilled water, and essential oils. First, fill the spray bottle with distilled water. Then, add 15 drops of lavender essential oil to the water. Shake the bottle well to mix the ingredients. Spray the repellent around your door frames, windows, and air vents to keep pests away.

69001.question: How To Make Your Bedroom Better
69001.gt: To make your bedroom better, try using household items to change up its look. Place a blanket over your bed, or add a couple of plants to a shelf to bring some greenery indoors. Add decoration by using pictures, vases, or other nicknacks. If you enjoy crafts, try creating your own art to decorate the walls, such as collages, drawings or paintings on paper. For the floor, put down a rug to add some color. You could also hang a curtain or sheet behind your bed to make an inexpensive headboard.
69001.pred: To make your bedroom better, you can add wall art, a desk, a speaker, an EDC tray, a watch box, fake plants, and a soft rug. These items can help create a more sophisticated and cool atmosphere in your bedroom.

69075.question: How To Make Mozzarella Sticks
69075.gt: To make mozzarella sticks, start by cutting mozzarella into small rectangles. If you want to bake them, dip the frozen sticks in flour, whisked eggs, and then breadcrumbs. Once they are prepared, bake them until the sticks are crisp. If you want crispier mozzarella sticks, consider frying them. To deep fry them, place the bread-crumb covered mozzarella in oil until it is golden brown. Once you’ve let the baked or fried mozzarella sticks cool, serve them with ketchup or sweet chili.
69075.pred: To make mozzarella sticks, you will need bread crumbs, eggs, all-purpose flour, heavy cream, thyme seasoning, granulated garlic, freshly grated parmesan, salt and pepper, and mozzarella. First, cut the mozzarella into planks or use string cheese. Then, whisk the eggs with heavy cream, salt, and pepper. In a separate bowl, mix the breadcrumbs with garlic, Italian seasoning, parmesan, and salt. Dip the mozzarella in flour, then in the egg mixture, and finally in the breadcrumb mixture. Repeat the process to create a double crust. Place the breaded mozzarella sticks in the freezer for two to three hours. Heat vegetable oil in a pan to 375 degrees and fry the mozzarella sticks in batches. Place the fried mozzarella sticks on a baking sheet lined with paper towels to absorb excess oil. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

69084.question: How To Remove the Rind from Brie Cheese
69084.gt: To remove the rind from brie cheese, wrap the brie tightly in plastic wrap, making sure the entire rind is covered. Place the brie in the freezer for at least 30 minutes so it can harden. Take the brie out of the freezer once it’s completely hardened and remove the plastic wrap. Using a serrated knife, carefully slice off both circular ends of the brie, then lay the brie flat on the cutting board and carefully slice the rind off the sides.
69084.pred: To remove the rind from brie cheese, you should start from the part of the slice that is furthest away from the rind and nibble your way outward. This method allows you to enjoy the most delicate flavors of the cheese first and then experience increasingly stronger flavors if the flavor and texture continue to be enjoyable.

69358.question: How To Make a Caesar Drink
69358.gt: To make the popular Canadian cocktail the Caesar, rim a large glass with lemon juice and celery salt and fill the glass about 3/4 of the way full of ice. Add between 1.5 and 3 oz of vodka, depending on how strong you want your drink to be, then top that with salt, pepper, hot sauce, and Worcestershire. Fill the glass almost to the top with Clamato juice, which is a mix of tomato juice and clam juice. Garnish the drink with a lemon or lime wedge or a celery stalk, then enjoy!
69358.pred: To make a caesar drink, you will need a lime, a glass, ice, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, vodka, and clamato juice. First, run the lime around the edge of the glass to create a rim. Then, add ice to the glass. Next, add two or three dashes of worcestershire sauce and hot sauce. Add one ounce of vodka and top it off with clamato juice. Garnish with a lime and olives.

69723.question: How To Make a Deco Mesh Wreath
69723.gt: The easiest way to make a deco mesh wreath is to wrap pipe cleaners around a metal wreath frame every 1.5 inches. Then, fix a deco ribbon to the frame and twist the pipe cleaner to hold it in place. For best results, use a deco ribbon that’s at least 10 inches long. Continue threading the ribbon through each pipe cleaner until the ribbon is firmly in place. Make your wreath fuller by attaching another layer, or add additional decorations like ornaments and flowers!
69723.pred: To make a deco mesh wreath, you will need a wreath form, deco mesh, and wire. First, cut the deco mesh into strips and wrap them around the wreath form, securing them with wire. Continue wrapping the deco mesh around the wreath form until it is fully covered. Once the wreath is covered, you can add embellishments such as flowers, ribbons, or other decorations. The video provides a step-by-step guide on how to make a deco mesh wreath, including tips on how to create a beautiful and unique wreath.

70482.question: How To Clean up Battery Acid Spills
70482.gt: To clean up battery acid spills, first put on a pair of rubber gloves as well as a safety mask or goggles. Place the battery in 2 plastic bags, seal the bags tightly, and inspect the battery label to see what type it is. For an alkaline battery, clean up the spill using a mild acid like vinegar or lemon juice. If the batter is a lithium battery, wipe up the spill with a paper towel soaked in water. Be sure to dispose of the batteries as soon as the spill is cleaned.
70482.pred: To clean up a battery acid spill, the first step is to identify the hazardous materials in the workplace and the areas where a spill is most likely to occur. Then, caution signs and material safety data sheets should be placed in the area. Next, select employees to be trained as the spill response team and equip them with proper personal protective equipment, acid spill absorber, and neutralizer. Once the team is trained, they should be notified promptly in case of a spill. When a spill is discovered, the team should put on personal protective equipment and begin the containment process by forming a dam around the spilled material using the acid spill absorber and neutralizer. The team should then let the acid spill absorber and neutralizer sit for five minutes before sweeping up the spill. Finally, the damaged battery should be removed from the spill location, and the waste material should be disposed of properly.

71215.question: How To Cut Strawberries for Every Occasion
71215.gt: While you may want to cut your strawberries differently depending on the occasion, always start by cleaning and hulling them. Rinse your berries under cool water and pick the green top stems off by gently twisting and pulling them. Put the tip of a paring knife into the top of the berry just outside the white center part and slide the knife around to cut out the hull, which is the most bitter part of the strawberry. For a quick snack, pie, tart, or smoothie, cut your strawberries in half vertically. If you’d prefer smaller pieces for a fruit salad, then slice them in quarters. You can also cut your berries into vertical slices if you want thinner pieces for a topping on a dessert or oatmeal.
71215.pred: The video demonstrates how to cut strawberries for various occasions. The woman in the video cuts the strawberries into different shapes and sizes, depending on the occasion. For example, she cuts the strawberries into small pieces for a party, larger pieces for a wedding, and even larger pieces for a baby shower. She also cuts the strawberries into different shapes, such as hearts and flowers, to make them more visually appealing. Overall, the video provides a comprehensive guide on how to cut strawberries for every occasion.

71239.question: How To Make Raspberry Puree
71239.gt: If you want to make raspberry puree on the stove, combine your raspberries, sugar, and lemon juice in a large saucepan. Place the mixture on the stove on medium heat for about 10 minutes. Stirring frequently. Once the raspberries are completely broken down, pour the mixture through a sieve or a strainer to remove the seeds. Serve the puree warm or chill it if you prefer a thicker puree. Raspberry puree will stay good for at least a week in the refrigerator.
71239.pred: To make raspberry puree, you will need a blender, a bowl, and a spoon. First, take a bowl and add the raspberries to it. Then, use a spoon to mash the raspberries until they are pureed. Finally, transfer the puree to a blender and blend it until it is smooth.

71250.question: How To Build a Birdhouse
71250.gt: To build a birdhouse, start by picking up some untreated wood and galvanized screws from your home improvement store. Use a bandsaw to cut your wood into several separate pieces, then paint or stain them however you'd like before assembling them to create the birdhouse structure. Once your birdhouse is complete, mount it to a pole or to the side of a building at least 5 feet off the ground!
71250.pred: To build a birdhouse, you will need a piece of wood, a hammer, nails, a marker, a tape measure, screws, a saw, and a drill. First, measure and mark the wood according to the diagram provided. Then, cut the wood using the saw. Next, drill a hole in the front of the birdhouse for the birds to enter and exit. After that, assemble the birdhouse by nailing the pieces together. Finally, add finishing touches such as a nail for the birds to stand on and a hook or screw to hang the birdhouse from a tree.

72399.question: How To Kill Fleas With Dawn Dishsoap
72399.gt: If your pet has fleas, a Dawn dishsoap bath is a gentle remedy that can help get rid of them. Fill a bathtub or basin with lukewarm water that’s only about as deep as your pet’s belly, then put your pet in the water. Use your hands to wet your pet’s fur through to the skin, but be careful to avoid its eyes and ears. Next, use a little dish soap to lather up your pet’s fur. For most dogs and cats, 2 or 3 tablespoons of soap are a good starting point, but you can use more for a larger pet or a severe flea infestation. Work the soap into its fur with your fingers or a brush and make sure it gets all the way down to the skin. Let the dish soap sit for about 5 minutes, then rinse your pet thoroughly with clean water and rub it dry with a towel. If you still notice fleas on your pet after the bath, repeat the process.
72399.pred: To kill fleas with dawn dishsoap, you need a lamp, a plate, and dish soap. First, fill the plate with water and add a few drops of dish soap. Then, place the plate on the floor and turn on the lamp. The fleas will be attracted to the heat and jump onto the plate, where they will drown in the soapy water. This method is effective in getting rid of fleas in your home.

72464.question: How To Make Pralines
72464.gt: To make traditional southern pralines, butter the sides of a saucepan and pour in sugar, salt, corn syrup, milk, and butter. Stir the ingredients together and cook them over medium heat until the sugar dissolves and the ingredients boil. Then, remove the saucepan from the heat and allow it to cool for 10 minutes. Once cooled, add pecans and vanilla and beat the mixture with a spoon for 2 minutes. Finally, use your spoon to drop the candy onto parchment paper, let it cool, and enjoy!

72919.question: How To Make Fairy Cakes
72919.gt: To make fairy cakes, start by beating 110 grams of softened, unsalted butter until it’s light and fluffy. Then, add 110 grams of caster sugar and continue mixing until combined. 73357.question: How To Dry Figs

Next, set your oven to the lowest temperature setting and put the figs inside of it. Let the figs dry in the oven with the door propped open for up to 36 hours. Once the figs are dry, let them cool completely before serving or storing them for later.

73392.question: How To Clean a Marble Shower
73392.gt: To clean a marble shower, start by filling a spray bottle with warm water and a teaspoon of mild, pH-neutral dish soap. Finally, dry your marble shower off using a rag or squeegee.

73418.question: How To Clean Soap Scum from Glass Shower Doors
73418.gt: If you have soap scum on your glass shower doors, you can easily clean it off with a homemade cleaner. Alternatively, you can mix 1/2 cup baking soda and 1/4 cup white vinegar into a paste and rub this on your shower doors. Leave it for 15 minutes to work its magic, then wipe it off. You can also use toilet bowl cleaner instead if you have this on hand, although it's not as effective as the other cleaners.

73788.question: How To Make Turkey Cupcakes

73856.question: How To Care for Poinsettias
73856.gt: To care for a poinsettia, first, choose a spot where your poinsettia can get 6 hours of indirect sunlight each day. For example, set it near a sunny window facing east or west. Try to keep the temperature around 70°F (21°C), and make sure it never gets colder than 50°F (10°C) since it's leaves could fall off if it gets too cold. Poinsettias don’t need a lot of water, but you should water your plant when the soil feels dry. As you water the poinsettia, stop as soon as you see water leak through the holes at the bottom to the pot. This will prevent overwatering. Poinsettias only bloom from November to March, so most people prefer to buy a new one every year for the holidays. If you’d prefer to keep your poinsettia year round, fertilize it with an all-purpose fertilizer in early January.

The plant should be kept away from cold or drafty areas and should not be placed near fruit or vegetables, as this can cause wilting. Poinsettias should be watered every other day during flowering, and any excess water should be drained out of the pot. The plant does not need any fertilizer after flowering, but a conventional liquid fertilizer can be added to the watering can once a month if necessary. By following these tips, you can enjoy your poinsettia for a longer period.

73887.question: How To Get Wisteria to Bloom
73887.gt: If you want to help your wisterias bloom, prune the branches on a mild day in February, then again to tame unruly growth in July. Use garden shears to prune long shoots so there are only 3-5 buds per shoot, and aim to cut away about half of the previous year’s growth. However, avoid cutting the woody frame of the plant. In the early spring, around April, add phosphate fertilizer to the ground around the tree, then add compost to the soil, topped by a 2-inch layer of mulch.

73925.question: How To Grow Daylilies
73925.gt: Before growing daylilies, soak bare root plants in a water-soluble fertilizer the night before you plan on planting them. Then, plant the lilies 2 feet apart in a sunny, well-draining spot. 74328.question: How To Make a Moscow Mule

75279.question: How To Use a Dehumidifier
