Once outside, they’ll need 2-3 months of warm weather to grow. You’ll also want to place cages in the garden or planter to help support the plant’s weight. Water your tomato plant every few days to keep the soil moist, and fertilize once a week to give the plant nutrition to grow.
76558.pred: To grow cherry tomatoes, you will need a 10-gallon container, garden soil, fertilizer, and a cherry tomato plant. First, fill the container with garden soil and add fertilizer. Then, plant the cherry tomato in the soil and water it. You can also add mulch to the top of the soil to help retain moisture. Once the plant has grown, you can use a water-soluble fertilizer to feed it every 10-14 days.

76655.question: How To Clear a Clogged Waste Pipe
76655.gt: One way to clear a clogged waste pipe is by using chemicals. To use an at-home mixture, start by pouring a pot of boiling water down the drain, and then pour ½ cup of baking soda down the drain. Let the baking soda sit for 5 minutes, and then pour 1 cup of vinegar and 1 cup of hot water down the drain. Let it sit for 10 minutes, and then pour another pot of boiling water down the drain to flush away the clog that has been loosened by the chemicals.
76655.pred: To clear a clogged waste pipe, you can use a drain cleaning machine. First, attach the machine to the pipe and turn it on. The machine will use a spinning mechanism to break up the clog and clear the pipe. If the clog is particularly stubborn, you may need to use a plunger or a drain snake to help dislodge it. Once the clog is cleared, turn off the machine and check the pipe to make sure it is clear.

77721.question: How To Make Irish Coffee
77721.gt: To make Irish coffee, start by filling a mug with hot water and letting it sit for a few minutes to warm the mug. Then, dump out the water, fill the mug 3/4 full with freshly brewed coffee, and stir in 1 tablespoon of sugar. Once the sugar has dissolved, add 1 jigger of Irish whiskey and gently stir until it’s fully incorporated. Finally, top the coffee with a dollop of whipped cream.
77721.pred:
To make Irish coffee, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of strong brewed coffee
- 1/2 cup of Irish cream liqueur
- 1/4 cup of brown sugar
- 1/4 cup of whiskey
- Whipped cream and chocolate shavings for garnish

Instructions:
1. Brew a strong cup of coffee and pour it into a mug.
2. In a small saucepan, heat the Irish cream liqueur and brown sugar over low heat until the sugar dissolves.
3. Pour the Irish cream mixture over the coffee.
4. Add a splash of whiskey to the mug.
5. Top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings for garnish.
6. Serve and enjoy your delicious Irish coffee!

78446.question: How To Make a S'more
78446.gt: If you want to make a S’more over a fire, break a graham cracker in half. Place a piece of chocolate on one half of the graham cracker, then place your marshmallow on a clean skewer. Carefully hold the marshmallow over the fire, turning it slowly until it’s evenly roasted. Once your marshmallow is nicely toasted, place it on top of the chocolate, then place the plain graham cracker on top of the marshmallow, remove the skewer, and enjoy your S’more!
78446.pred: To make a s'more, you will need graham crackers, chocolate, and marshmallows. First, break the graham crackers in half and place a piece of chocolate on one half. Then, place a marshmallow on top of the chocolate. Finally, place the other half of the graham cracker on top to complete the s'more.

78977.question: How To Get Rid of Centipedes
78977.gt: To get rid of centipedes, try sprinkling some cayenne pepper around the entryways to your home, which will deter the centipedes so they don't come inside. You can also try setting up some sticky traps on the floors around your home to catch the centipedes when they walk on them. If the centipedes persist, sprinkle a natural pesticide, like boric acid or diatomaceous earth, over the areas where you usually spot them.
78977.pred: To get rid of centipedes, you can try to kill them by using a jar to trap them and release them outside. You can also use mothballs to repel them, but be careful as they are unsafe for youngsters and pets. Additionally, you can use herbal repellents like indica, mongoose urine, or kingsnake, which are effective and available at herbal shops or garden care shows. To prevent centipedes from entering your home, you can reduce humidity by using a dehumidifier, keeping the grass dry, and using door-sealing products. Finally, you can remove organic materials from the side of your house and compost bins if feasible.

78979.question: How To Get Rid of Silverfish
78979.gt: To get rid of silverfish, vacuum your home thoroughly to remove eggs that might be hiding in carpets, floorboards, and hard-to-reach corners and crevices. For an easy, non-toxic way to kill silverfish, sprinkle some diatomaceous earth in places where you’ve seen them, like under the sink, in the basement, and in the back of cabinets. Diatomaceous earth is a powder that will dry out and kill silverfish when they come into contact with it. Though it is non-toxic, make sure to keep it away from children and pets. Place commercial silverfish traps throughout your home to catch even more silverfish. To prevent silverfish from entering your home, seal up any cracks around doors and windows with caulk. Use a dehumidifier if your home is humid since silverfish thrive in wet environments. You should also keep dry foods like pasta, rice, and cereal in sealed containers to cut off their food source. Finally, remove any stacks of papers, books, or magazines around your home since silverfish like to hide in them.
78979.pred: To get rid of silverfish, you can use a spray bottle, water, and orange essential oil. Make sure to use 100% undiluted, therapeutic grade oil. If you don't want to dilute the oil yourself, you can buy a pre-made orange oil spray for pest control.

78985.question: How To Use Home Remedies to Get Rid of Gnats
78985.gt: To get rid of gnats using home remedies, start by filling a jar halfway with apple cider vinegar. Then, cover the top of the jar with plastic wrap and secure it with a rubber band so there are no gaps between the plastic and glass. Next, use a toothpick or fork to poke a few small holes into the plastic wrap so the gnats can smell the vinegar and fly into the jar. Finally, place the jar where there are a lot of gnats, then empty and refill the jar every couple days until they’re gone.
78985.pred: To get rid of gnats using home remedies, you can use a honey trap by cutting pieces of yellow plastic and applying honey on it to attract and trap the gnats. Another option is to use apple cider vinegar by putting it in a bowl or a mason jar with a funnel to attract and kill the gnats. Cinnamon can also be used as a natural fungicide to control the growth of fungus gnats by sprinkling cinnamon powder on the plantation area. Lastly, baking soda can be used as a natural repellent by mixing it with liquid dishwash and water and spraying it on the affected areas.

79178.question: How To Make Homemade Chalk
79178.gt: To make homemade chalk using cornstarch, line a toilet paper roll with a piece of wax paper, making sure the waxed side is exposed. Cover the bottom of the tube with masking tape so the chalk can’t leak out. Next, mix equal parts cornstarch and water in a bowl, and add food coloring if you want to make colored chalk. Use a spoon to transfer the chalk mixture into the tube, then cover the whole tube with wax paper. Let the chalk dry for 12 hours, then remove it from the molds and have fun with your new creation!
79178.pred: To make homemade chalk, you will need to crush eggshells and mix them with flour and water to create a paste. You can add food coloring to the mixture to create different colors. Once the mixture is ready, you can shape it into chalk and let it dry for a few days. After that, you can test the chalk to see if it works on a chalkboard or other surface.

79262.question: How To Make a Fuzzy Navel
79262.gt: To make a basic fuzzy navel, start by filling a highball glass with ice. If you don’t have a highball glass, use a tall, skinny glass or plastic cup. Next, pour in 2 fluid ounces of peach schnapps, then fill the rest of the glass with orange juice. Alternatively, shake the ice, peach schnapps, and orange juice in a cocktail shaker. Then, pour the contents into a glass without the ice.
79262.pred: To make a fuzzy navel, you will need a tall glass, ice, peach snaps, and orange juice. First, fill the glass with ice. Then, add 1 oz of peach snaps to the glass. Next, fill the glass with orange juice. Stir the drink with a long straw and enjoy.

79281.question: How To Make an Amaretto Sour
79281.gt: To make an easy amaretto sour cocktail, half-fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Then, add 1 and 1/2 fluid ounces of amaretto and 3/4 to 1 and 1/2 fluid ounces of sweet and sour mix -- the less sweet and sour mix you use, the nuttier your cocktail will be. To finish, simply shake and pour. You can garnish your drink with orange or lemon slices or a maraschino cherry.
79281.pred: To make an amaretto sour, you will need a rock glass full of ice, two shakers, 2 ounces of amaretto, one full ounce of freshly squeezed lemon juice, and about a 1/4 ounce of simple syrup. You will also need some bitters and an egg white to build the froth. First, crack the egg and rock the yolk back and forth about four or five times until the egg white separates itself. Then, dispose of the yolk and wipe your hands. Next, put in the lemon followed by a little simple syrup and shake. Shake until you can hear and feel when the white has whipped. Let that set for a minute while you build the rest of your drink. Then, add the amaretto and a couple dashes of bitter. Chill the drink and strain the amaretto into a rocks glass. Finally, strain the egg whites and pour the top. You can add one more dash of bitters on top for beauty sake.

79968.question: How To Make a Chinese Hot Pot
79968.gt: To make a Chinese hot pot, start by preparing your favorite broth in a large pot or wok so that everyone can easily dip their ingredients into it. Next, thinly slice your choice of meats, like beef, pork, or fish, or protein-rich meat substitutes, like tofu. Then, select and chop up a variety of vegetables like watercress, bok choy, mushrooms, cabbage, lettuce, and snow peas. Finally, prepare plenty of noodles or rice and serve the array of ingredients alongside the hot pot.
79968.pred: To make a Chinese hot pot, you will need to start by heating up a pan with oil and adding spicy bean paste. Then, add chicken stock and bring it to a boil. Add spices like star anise seeds, rock sugar, cinnamon stick, dried chili peppers, Sichuan peppercorns, black peppercorns, fennel seeds, garlic, and ginger slices. Mix them together and let it simmer for 30 minutes. After that, assemble the hot pot with a divider to have a non-spicy and spicy side. Add vegetables, seafood, and other ingredients to the hot pot and cook them. Serve with a dipping sauce made of minced garlic, green onions, cilantro, salt, and sesame oil. Enjoy your homemade Chinese hot pot with your family and friends.

79985.question: How To Make Chinese Brown Sauce
79985.gt: To make Chinese brown sauce, combine 4 tablespoons of soy sauce, 3 tablespoons of sugar, 1 tablespoon of ginger, 1 1/2 cups of broth, and 1 tablespoon of cornstarch in a mixing bowl. Next, add a tablespoon of oil to a wok and position the wok over medium heat. Then, stir fry 1-3 cloves of garlic for 10-15 seconds before whisking in the soy sauce mixture. Finally, let the mixture come to a boil, add your favorite meat or veggies, and continue cooking the sauce for 5-10 minutes until it thickens.
79985.pred: To make Chinese brown sauce, you will need the following ingredients: 2 teaspoons of minced ginger, 1 to 2 teaspoons of minced garlic, 1 green onion root, 2.5 tablespoons or 37 grams of sugar, 3 tablespoons of 45 milliliters of soy sauce, 2 tablespoons or 30 milliliters of cooking wine, 1 tablespoon or 15 milliliters of mushroom flavored dark soy sauce, 1 tablespoon or 15 milliliters of hoisin sauce, 2 tablespoons or 30 milliliters of oyster sauce, 1 teaspoon or 5 milliliters of sesame oil, and 1.5 cup 355 milliliters of heated chicken or vegetable stock. Once you have all the ingredients, you can mix them together in a bowl and let the sauce cool down. After it has cooled, you can use a sieve to drain the sauce and discard the roots. The resulting sauce can be stored in the fridge for up to a week or in the freezer for future consumption.

81724.question: How To Get Rid of Aphids on Roses Organically
81724.gt: To get rid of aphids on your roses organically, try watering them more thoroughly. Spray your roses with water in the morning to rinse the aphids off as well as give your plant time to dry in the sun to avoid fungus. When watering, make sure to get the underside of the leaves too since aphids tend to hang out there to stay out of the sun. Repeat this process daily for 1 to 2 weeks. You can also try making your own organic repellent spray using garlic a garlic. First, crush a full head of garlic and steep it in 2 cups of hot water for 24 hours. Add 1 tablespoon of dish soap to the garlic-infused water before spraying it on your plants.
81724.pred: To get rid of aphids on roses organically, you can use a mixture of water and peppermint oil. Spray the mixture on the leaves of the rose plant. The peppermint oil will help to kill the aphids without harming the plant.

81892.question: How To Fold a Spring Roll
81892.gt: To fold a spring roll, try using the burrito method. First, lay the wrap out flat on a plate. Then, place the fillings near the bottom of the wrap in a line that’s approximately ½ to ⅔ inches tall. Fold each side of the wrap over the filling and bring the bottom of the wrap up over the filling. Roll the wrap upward to the opposite edge and then use an egg mixture to hold the wrap together.
81892.pred: To fold a spring roll, you should start by placing a tablespoon of filling on the top 1/3 of the wrapper closest to you. Then, roll about 1/3 forward and gently fold in the edges while keeping the side straight. Continue rolling to the end, leaving a little space left to seal. Finally, add a bit of egg wash and finish off the roll.

81932.question: How To Make Lumpia
81932.gt: If you want to make lumpia, or a Filipino spring roll, brown your ground beef in a skillet, then drain the meat and add your vegetables and seasonings to the skillet and remove from heat. Place a lumpia wrapper on a flat surface, then spoon in the mixture, leaving 1.5 inches of space at both ends of the wrapper. Grab the corner nearest the filling, then fold it over the filling and roll the wrapper about halfway. Tuck in the ends, then continue rolling tightly. Add a little water to the edge of the wrapper to seal it, than cook in hot oil for 1-2 minutes.
81932.pred: To make lumpia, you need to mix ground pork with water chestnuts, carrots, garlic, and onion. Then, cover the mixture and put it in the refrigerator for an hour. After that, peel the lumpia wrapper and cut it in half. Take two tablespoons of the mixture and spread it horizontally at the end of the wrapper. Secure the meat by folding the wrapper and tucking in the ends. Roll it up and secure it with egg yolk. Finally, fry the lumpia in vegetable oil or canola oil on medium to high heat.

81987.question: How To Make Parmesan Crisps
81987.gt: Before baking your Parmesan crisps, preheat your oven to 400 degrees F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Then, place tablespoon-sized mounds of coarsely-grated Parmesan cheese on the baking sheet. Using the back of a spoon, flatten the mounds gently until they’re about 2 to 4 inches wide. Bake your crisps in the center rack of your oven for 3 to 5 minutes, adding 1 to 3 more minutes if they’re not golden or crunchy enough.
81987.pred: To make parmesan crisps, preheat the oven to 350° F. Place the parmesan cheese on a cookie cutter or parchment paper in a circle shape. Bake the cheese in the oven for 4-6 minutes until the cheese has melted and the edges begin to brown. Let the cheese cool before taking it off and eating it.

82298.question: How To Set Spider Traps
82298.gt: The easiest way to trap spiders in your home is by setting up a sticky trap. All you need to do is put something sticky on top of a flat object, like some double-sided tape on a piece of card. Alternatively, you can buy ready-made sticky traps from a hardware store. Place your traps in dark places where spiders may hide, like under the utility sink or the water heater. You can also place a bottle lid filled with water next to your trap, since spiders are attracted by water. Another good place for your traps is beside baseboards, since spiders and insects like to walk along them.
82298.pred: To set spider traps, you need to break off a piece of duct tape and put it together. Then, pick a place to put it, such as a window, closet, or cabinet. You can line your closet, cabinets, or countertop with it. You can also put it under the bar or the refrigerator. The man in the video puts the duct tape in the window to catch spiders.

82719.question: How To Make Pho
82719.gt: To make your own pho, cut your choice of beef into bite-sized pieces. If you like, you can fry it lightly, but it should still be rare. For the best pho, make your own beef broth by simmering bones and cuts of beef for several hours, although if you’re in a hurry you can use a premade broth. Add charred onions and ginger to your broth. In a separate pan, boil your rice noodles, then steam your choice of vegetables and add them to the broth. Serve with cilantro, sriracha, and hoisin sauce.
82719.pred: To make pho, you will need 12 quarts of water, 2 racks of beef ribs, 2 beef tendons, 1 char ginger, 8 star anise, 2 tbsls coriander seed, 1 cinnamon stick, 1 clump rock sugar, and 1 tbsl salt. You will also need 6-8 tbsls fish sauce. Add the ingredients to a pot and let it simmer for 5 hours. While the broth is simmering, prepare the toppings, which include bean sprouts, basil, lime, chili pepper, and green onions. To make the noodles, boil them for 30 seconds and then add them to the broth. Serve the pho with the toppings and enjoy!

83198.question: How To Build a Japanese Garden
83198.gt: Building a Japanese garden can be a great way to create a space to relax in your yard. If you want to create a zen garden, you’ll need to flatten out a square piece of land and surround the area with rocks. Then, cover the square with sand and gravel. You can add a few simple plants, like moss and small trees. Rake through your sand or gravel surface to create grooves that look like water, which creates a relaxing feel. Alternatively, try building a tea garden, which is used for performing tea ceremonies. Tea gardens are divided by a wall of rocks or a small gate into 2 areas, known as the inner and outer garden. The outer area of your garden should have a pathway to your inner garden, and contain a few shrubs and plants. You should also place a water basin between the 2 gardens, which visitors use to cleanse themselves before entering the inner garden. In your inner garden, you’ll want to build a tea house and have natural plants, such as ferns, mosses, and shrubs.
83198.pred: To build a Japanese garden, you will need to start by gathering materials such as rocks, gravel, bamboo, and plants. You can then begin by digging a hole in the ground and placing the rocks in it. Next, you can use the bamboo to create a structure, such as a bench or a water feature. You can also use the gravel to create a path or a bed for the plants. Finally, you can plant the plants in the garden and enjoy the peaceful and relaxing atmosphere it creates.

83918.question: How To Level Your Refrigerator
83918.gt: Levelling your refrigerator will help improve its efficiency and only takes a few minutes if you have the right tools. All you’ll need is a bubble level and a screwdriver or wrench. Start by removing the grille at the bottom of your fridge to expose its legs or rollers. Depending on your fridge, you’ll need to adjust these with a screwdriver or wrench. Generally, you’ll need to turn the legs or rollers clockwise to raise them. You want your front legs to be ¼-inch higher than the back to help the coolant drain. Place your bubble level on top of the fridge behind the door to measure the angle.
83918.pred: To level your refrigerator, you need to ensure that the back of the unit is aligned horizontally. If the floor is uneven, you can use a shim to adjust the horizontal alignment. Whirlpool sells a shim with the part number 4387828. To install the shim, you need to remove the cover of the tape on the back of the unit and fix the shim to the floor. Then, push the refrigerator back onto the shim. After that, you need to adjust the front of the unit. The doors of the refrigerator are designed to be uneven when the refrigerator is empty. However, if the doors are still uneven after loading the refrigerator, you can adjust the leveling legs on the front to access the leveling legs. To adjust the leveling feet, you need to open both doors to 90 degrees and remove the front toe piece with the two Phillips head screws. Then, remove the plastic kick plate and use a quarter-inch open-end wrench to adjust the leveling feet. It's important to ensure that the leveling feet are lowered sufficiently to raise the wheel off the floor. After adjusting the leveling feet, you can perfectly align the freezer and refrigerator door.

83937.question: How To Make a New York Egg Cream
83937.gt: To make a New York egg cream, start by adding 1 inch of chocolate syrup to a tall, chilled glass. Then, pour 1 inch of whole milk over the syrup, followed by enough cold soda water to fill the glass to about 1 inch below the rim. Finally, stir everything together with a long spoon and sip on your drink with a straw.
83937.pred:
To make a New York egg cream, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of water
- 1 cup of sugar
- 1/2 cup of cocoa powder
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract
- 1 cup of whole milk
- 1 cup of seltzer water
- 2 ounces of chocolate syrup

Instructions:
1. In a pot, combine the water, sugar, cocoa powder, and salt. Stir until the sugar and cocoa powder are fully dissolved.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil and let it simmer for 1-2 minutes. Remove from heat and let it cool to room temperature.
3. Add the vanilla extract to the cooled mixture and stir well.
4. In a separate container, combine the whole milk and seltzer water. Stir well.
5. Pour the chocolate syrup into a glass and add the milk and seltzer mixture. Stir well.
6. Pour the egg cream mixture into the glass and stir well.
7. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious New York egg cream!

83939.question: How To Make Cultured Buttermilk
83939.gt: To make cultured buttermilk, start by adding 6-8 ounces of active, fresh cultured buttermilk to a jar. Then, fill the rest of the jar with fresh milk, seal it, and shake it thoroughly. Next, let the jar sit out at room temperature until the milk has thickened, which should take about 24 hours. Finally, once the milk has thickened and is coating the edge of the jar, transfer it to the fridge for storage.
83939.pred: To make cultured buttermilk, you need to start with a packet of culture and a quart of cold 2% milk. First, open the packet of culture and pour it into the milk. Then, shake the mixture well to ensure that the culture is evenly distributed. Next, let the mixture sit out for about 24 hours, or until it has thickened and has a tangy smell. Once the buttermilk is ready, you can use it in recipes or store it in the refrigerator for later use.

83995.question: How To Make Cashew Milk
83995.gt: To make cashew milk, start by soaking some raw cashews in water for 2 hours, which will make your cashew milk creamier. Then, drain the cashews and add them to a blender with some fresh water. Next, blend the cashews and water on high for 1-2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and creamy. Finally, strain the cashew milk through a cheesecloth and store it in the fridge for up to 3 days.
83995.pred: To make cashew milk, you need to soak one cup of raw cashews in water for at least 4 hours or overnight. After soaking, drain the cashews and rinse them. Then, add the cashews to a blender with 4 cups of water, 1 to 2 tablespoons of sweetener, a little vanilla extract, and salt. Blend everything together on high for a minute or so until milky and creamy. Finally, transfer the cashew milk to a storage container and place it in the refrigerator.

84228.question: How To Use a Waffle Maker
84228.gt: To use your waffle maker, first plug it in to preheat it, and put cooking spray, butter, or oil on it if it’s not non-stick. When the indicator light shows your waffle maker is hot, pour about ¾ of a cup of batter onto the plate in a spiral, starting from the outside edges. Then close the lid and wait until steam stops coming out before you check your waffles. When your waffles are done, use a plastic, rubber, or silicone utensil to remove them. Finally, let your waffle maker cool completely before you clean it with a soft, damp cloth.
84228.pred: To use a waffle maker, first unbox the waffle maker and remove the plastic cover. Then, spray the inside of the waffle maker with cooking spray. Pour the batter into the waffle maker and close the lid. Wait for the waffle maker to heat up and the light to turn on. Once the light turns off, open the waffle maker and remove the cooked waffle. Serve the waffle with your favorite toppings.

84836.question: How To Clean Headlights
84836.gt: To clean headlights, start by washing them with warm water and soap, then dry them off. Apply painter's tape around the edges of both headlights to protect your car's paint job and wipe down the surface once more with alcohol. Next, wet a piece of coarse grit sandpaper, spray the headlight with water, and sand the entire surface until it looks dull and even. Then, switch to fine grit sandpaper and repeat the process. Finish up by adding a buffing compound to a microfiber cloth and working it in a circular motion until the headlight looks clear.
84836.pred: To clean headlights, you can use bug spray or toothpaste. First, spray the bug spray on a paper towel and wipe the headlight. The Deat in the bug spray will melt the plastic and fill the pores, making the headlight clear. However, this method is not recommended as it can damage the paint and plastic. Toothpaste is a safer alternative. Apply toothpaste to the headlight and rub it in. The abrasive nature of the toothpaste will remove the haze. Rinse the headlight with water and dry it with a clean cloth. This method is safer and will not damage the paint or plastic.

85109.question: How To Get Whites White
85109.gt: To get your discolored white clothes white again, start by applying a liquid enzyme detergent to the stains 15 minutes prior to washing. If the clothing is yellow from perspiration, pour baking soda onto the discolored area, cut a lemon in half, and rub the cut side onto the same spot. Next, start your washer with only detergent, then pour in bleach after 5 minutes and add your clothes after a few more minutes. Alternatively, for a more natural solution, use distilled white vinegar along with your detergent.
85109.pred: To get whites white, you can use bleach, borax, vinegar, and powdered dish washer detergent. You can also use charcoal soap, but it can stain white towels. If you have a high efficiency washing machine, you should not use powdered detergent. You can also use lemons to bleach and fade towels. If none of these methods work, you can give the towels to your husband to use in the garage.

85445.question: How To Repair Electric Car Windows
85445.gt: If the power isn’t working for your electric car windows, you might be able to fix it yourself with a multimeter and a little electrical know-how. If all your windows have stopped working, you might just need to replace the fuse. You can locate your car’s fuse box underneath or near its dash. If only one window doesn’t work, check around the seal for any small objects that might be stuck inside. If you can’t find anything, take off the window switch and test the wiring with a multimeter. If the wiring’s fine, test the window with another switch from your car. You might need a new switch. Otherwise, you might have to replace some of the wiring. If the wiring’s fine but it still doesn’t work, you might have to replace your window’s motor or regulator.
85445.pred: To repair electric car windows, you will need to remove the door panel and locate the window regulator. You will then need to remove the old regulator and replace it with a new one. Make sure to clean the window and reinstall it properly. Finally, reattach the door panel and test the window to ensure it is working properly.

85457.question: How To Make a Roman Shade
85457.gt: To make a Roman shade, cut a piece of wood to fit across the top of your window opening. Then, select a decorator weight fabric to make the shade out of. Measure, cut, and pin the fabric to ensure it is the right size. After you have checked your measurements, sew your shade together and glue thin strips of stiffening material to attach the fabric to the wood. You'll then want to add plastic loops to the battens and attach a cord so you can open and close the shade.
85457.pred: To make a roman shade, you will need to gather the necessary materials, which include drapery fabric, drapery lining, wood dowels, a metal rod or slat of wood, blind cord, thread, a cord lock or a cord cleat, pulleys or eye screws, rings, 5/8" stitch witchery, a hand sewing needle, pins, a ruler, scissors, a fabric marker, a pull end which is optional, and also a staple gun, iron, drill, and screws. Once you have all the materials, you will need to cut the drapery fabric to be 3 inches wider than the finished width of the roman shade and 5 inches longer. Cut the drapery lining 1 inch shorter than the finished width and the same height as the drapery fabric. With right sides facing, pin one side of the drapery fabric and lining together. Sew down the length with a 1/2 inch seam allowance. Line up the other side, pin, and sew. Center the lining on the back so there's an inch of the drapery fabric on either side and pin the bottom. Sew across, again with a 1/2 inch seam allowance. Center the drapery lining again on the top and pin down the sides. Next, figure out the spacing for the dowels. This will differ based on the height of your window, but generally 8-12 inches between the dowels works well. The amount below the bottom dowel should be half the distance between dowels plus 1 inch. The amount above the top dowel is less important, but it should be at least as much as the spacing between dowels. With the wrong side of the drapery fabric facing up, measure up from the bottom for the location of the first dowel. After the dowels are added, the bottom will be hemmed up 2 and 1/2 inches so add that amount to the bottom, plus the seam allowance. For me, that's a total of 8 and 1/2 inches. Measure and mark the distance for the rest of the dowels. Fold the fabric in half and mark the other side as well. To make pockets for the dowels, cut 2 inch strips of the lining that are the width of your shade. Cut enough for each dowel. Fold the pieces in half and iron. Then sew the raw edges together with a 1/4 inch seam allowance. Take the stitch witchery and lay it on top of the strip. With the iron on the steam setting, hold it above the stitch witchery so it melts slightly and sticks to the fabric. Extend the markings for the dowels to the edges. Lay the strip across the fabric so the area between the fold and seam is centered on the markings. You can use a straight edge to straighten the strip before pinning it in a couple of places. Iron to bond the stitch witchery to the fabric. Next, insert the dowels. Clip the bottom corners and turn the shade right side out. Starting with the bottom, carefully pull the dowels up through the top opening. Poke out the corners and iron the edges. Fold the bottom up 2 and 1/2 inches and iron. You can sew across with a regular straight stitch, but if you don't want the thread to be visible on the front, use the blind hem stitch on your machine. Pin so the points are facing down and the other end is overhanging the edge. Fold the hem under so the end of the fabric is showing about 1/4 of an inch. Attach the blind hem foot which has an extra dividing piece to guide the fabric. Position the fabric so the fold is against the left side of the guide. Find the blind hem stitch on your machine. There may be several variations. I'm using number 11 on this machine. When you start sewing, it will stitch on the right side for a number of stitches, and then jump over to the left side for 1 stitch. This way most of the stitches will be hidden on the back, and the few that are on the front won't be noticeable as long as the thread matches. Next I'm going to sew on the rings that will guide the cord. There will be a ring near the ends of each dowel. You'll need to leave enough room on the edges so the last cord can go through the pulley and cord lock if you're using them. Put the pulley and cord lock together with them sharing a screw hole. Measure from where the cord will come up through the pulley to the end of the cord lock base. This is 2 and 1/2 inches for me, so mark this distance from the edge of the shade on both sides. For most shade widths, you may need more rings per dowel. Thread a hand stitching needle and go through the lining and the ring a couple of times.

85661.question: How To Make Pita Bread
85661.gt: To make pita bread, first prepare the dough by mixing yeast, flour, water, salt, and olive oil and kneading the mixture for several minutes. Then, shape the dough into a ball and cover it in a greased bowl, letting it rise for 2 hours. Next, cut the dough into several equal-sized pieces and let them rise for an additional 30 minutes before rolling them into flat, 1/4 inch thick discs. Finally, cook the discs in a pan with some olive oil for 1-2 minutes on each side.

Knead the dough for six to eight minutes until it becomes soft and elastic. After kneading, place the dough in a bowl, cover it with plastic wrap, and let it rest for one and a half to two hours until it doubles in size. Once the dough has risen, deflate it and shape it into small balls. Roll each ball into a circle and place them on a floured surface or parchment paper. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rest for 30 minutes. Then, cook the pita bread on a hot skillet for 30 seconds on each side until it puffs up. Finally, cover the cooked pita breads with a dry towel to keep them warm and soft.

85893.question: How To Make Dr. Pepper
85893.gt: Although the exact recipe for modern Dr. Pepper is a closely-guarded secret, you can make a similar version yourself. Open a bottle of regular cola, and pour it into a chilled glass or mix your drink directly in the bottle. Pour in 1/2 teaspoon of almond extract and 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract, and then let the drink rest for a few minutes so the ingredients can combine. If you want a sweeter or a stronger flavor, add more of each extract.

Then, strain the mixture and add the mint. Next, add carbonated water to the mixture and stir. Finally, pour the mixture into a glass and enjoy your homemade Dr. Pepper.

85948.question: How To Make Leftover Turkey and Stuffing Casserole
85948.gt: To make leftover turkey and stuffing casserole, start by beating together mashed potatoes and raw eggs in a large bowl. Then, spread out half of the mixture in a greased baking dish, and add bite-sized pieces of turkey over it. Next, add the rest of the potato mixture to the baking dish, as well as some leftover stuffing. Finally, cover the dish with foil and bake it for 30 minutes covered and 10 minutes uncovered at 350 degrees Fahrenheit.

Cover the casserole with aluminum foil and bake it in a preheated oven at 350°F for 40 minutes. After 40 minutes, remove the foil and sprinkle a generous layer of cheddar cheese on top. 86047.question: How To Make a Snow Globe
86047.gt: To make a snow globe using household items, start by finding a glass jar with a tight-fitting lid. Next, choose items to put inside, like toys, figurines, or cake-toppers made of plastic or ceramic. Take the lid off the jar and cover the underside with a layer of hot glue, superglue, or epoxy, then build your scene on the underside of the jar by sticking the items into the wet glue. Finally, fill the jar almost to the brim with water, add 2-3 teaspoons of glycerin, and glitter. Screw the lid back on tightly and flip your globe over to watch it snow!

86054.question: How To Make Mercury Glass
86054.gt: To make mercury glass, start by spraying some glass with a light coat of mirror-finish paint. Then, let the paint dry for 2 minutes, and fill up a spray bottle with equal parts water and white vinegar. Next, spray the glass with the diluted vinegar so the mixture beads on the glass but doesn't drip. Finally, blot the glass with a paper towel, and let it dry for 10 minutes before applying a final coat of paint.

86066.question: How To Decoupage on Glass

86131.question: How To Fold a Plastic Bag

86439.question: How To Remove Lint from Clothes
86439.gt: One way to remove lint from clothes is by using a sticky material to pull the lint off. 86498.question: How To Remove Clothing Labels
86498.gt: Clothing labels can be a nuisance to deal with, but luckily there are a few easy ways to remove them which won’t damage your clothes. The best way to remove an entire label is to use a seam ripper. First, check that the seam attaching the label to the garment isn’t sewn into the same seam that’s holding the garment together. If this is the case, use scissors to cut the label off instead. If the label isn’t attached to the seam holding the garment together, then push the tip of the seam ripper underneath one of the top stitches. Next, gently pull the seam ripper to loosen and remove the stitch, before continuing the process along the whole seam until the label is free.

Once the old label is removed, insert the new label and make sure it is evenly lined up in the proper position to be permanently sewn in. 86542.question: How To Wash Your Clothes With Dish Liquid

86870.question: How To Make a Turducken
86870.gt: To roast your own turducken, lay a deboned turkey skin-side down and spread a layer of stuffing across the top. Place a boneless duck skin-side down on top of the stuffing-covered turkey, then cover it with stuffing as well, and repeat with the chicken. Roll up the chicken, then wrap the duck around it, and finally, roll the turkey around the duck and sew it closed with butcher’s twine. Set the turducken on a roasting rack and rub the skin with seasoning, then cover the pan and roast the turducken for 5 hours at 400°F, uncovering the turducken for the last hour.

87698.question: How To Make Coconut Cake
87698.gt: To bake a classic coconut cake, cream together softened butter and white sugar until the mixture is light yellow and fluffy. Add the eggs 1 at a time, scraping the sides of the bowl after you mix in each one, then stir vanilla and almond extract into the bowl. In a separate bowl, mix together all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Alternate adding the dry ingredients and milk to the butter and sugar mixture, mixing well after each addition. Fold in the coconut, then divide the batter into lined cake pans and bake for 25-30 minutes at 350°F.

Next, add in a quarter cup of sour cream, two teaspoons of coconut extract, and one and a half cups of coconut milk. Mix these ingredients together and then add in four teaspoons of baking powder, half a teaspoon of salt, and three and a half cups of cake flour. Mix until the batter is just combined. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit and grease two or three nine-inch cake pans. Divide the batter among the pans and bake for 25 to 30 minutes until the cakes are cooked through. While the cakes are baking, make the coconut cream cheese frosting by beating 16 ounces of softened cream cheese, one cup of softened salted butter, and one teaspoon of coconut extract together. 88019.question: How To Make Filo Pastry
88019.gt: To make filo pastry, start by combining flour, salt, olive oil, vinegar or lemon juice, and warm water to make the dough. Knead the dough for 15 minutes, then let it rest for 2 hours. Afterwards, cut the dough in 8 or 10 pieces, and roll them as flat as possible. Then, wrap each sheet of dough around the dowel of the rolling pin, and flatten it by rolling the pin forward on the work surface. Layer the sheets on a piece of parchment paper, and make sure to brush each one with olive oil to keep them from sticking to each other.

Then, you need to run the mixture for 60 seconds until the liquid is well distributed in the dough. Once the dough is ready, you need to turn it out into a large mixing bowl and compress it together into a single mass of dough. Then, you need to knead the dough for 10 minutes, and wrap it tightly in cling wrap and allow it to rest in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. After that, you need to remove the dough and divide it into 10 pieces using a scale. Working with one piece at a time, you need to slightly flatten the dough and pass it through the pasta roller on its widest setting. Then, you need to fold the dough in half and pass it through again, and repeat this another four or five times until the dough is silky smooth. Finally, you need to reduce the width of the roller to number two, pass it through again, then number three, and so on, by the time you reach number five or six, the dough will begin to feel damp. You can then lie it on the work surface and rub a little flour into both sides of the pastry, trim the end square, and cut the length in half.

88034.question: How To Make Sopaipillas

88539.question: How To Make Green Tea Latte

Finish by slowly pouring the milk into the mug and stirring everything together with a spoon.

88595.question: How To Grow Ginseng
88595.gt: To grow ginseng, start by sprinkling the stratified seeds in loamy, quick-draining soil in a cool, shaded area. Then, cover the area with mulch to keep the ground moist. As the plants grow, thin them out each year to give them room to grow and discourage the spread of disease. After three years, start picking the red berries that will appear on the plant. If you want to harvest the roots, wait at least 7 years before carefully digging them up.

88611.question: How To Grow a Chilli Plant from a Seed
88611.gt: To grow a chilli plant from a seed, start by sandwiching your seed between two damp paper towels in a sealable bag. Leave it in a warm room for 2-5 days until it wells or sprouts. At this point, plant it in a tray filled with a light compost or potting soil. Cover the tray with plastic wrap to lock in the heat and moisture. Once your seedling has 5-6 leaves, replant it in a pot with about a 3-inch diameter. Place the pot outside or near a window so it gets plenty of sunlight. When your chili plant grows too big for its pot, you can either replant it in a bigger pot or plant it in your garden. Either way, make sure it gets 6-8 hours of sunlight a day and give it plenty of space to grow.

Once the plants are 5-6 inches tall, transplant them outdoors to a sunny area and leave at least 18 inches between plants. 89960.question: How To Get Rid of Gophers
89960.gt: If you’re looking for a non-lethal way to get rid of gophers, place fish scraps, coffee grounds, mothballs, or hot sauce into their holes. Gophers hate the smell of these objects and they will relocate. You can also drive vibrating stakes into the ground near where the gophers have been spotted. If you’re still having problems with the gophers, try setting up a trap.

90009.question: How To Get Rid of Onion Weed
90009.gt: To get rid of onion weed, pull the weeds out with your hands, removing as much of the roots as possible. 90057.question: How To Prevent Spider Mites on Tomato Plants
90057.gt: Spider mites can infest and damage your outdoor tomato plants, but you can keep them away with a few simple tricks. Tomato plants need at least 7 hours of sunlight every day, but keeping them out of the afternoon sun will help keep spider mites away. If your plants are in pots, move them into the morning sun but out of the afternoon sun, or plant your tomatoes in a spot where they’ll mainly get the less drying morning heat. Another way to deter spider mites is to place hot pepper or garlic in the soil. Spray the soil under the plants with a mixture of cayenne pepper flakes and water or mashed garlic cloves and water. When watering your plants, soak the soil around them every 7 to 10 days. When hosing down the soil, spray the undersides of the leaves too to remove any mites that may have started to infest the area.
90057.pred: To prevent spider mites on tomato plants, it is recommended to use a hard stream of water to knock the spider mites off the plant. Insecticides are not effective in killing spider mites, so other options such as insecticidal soaps, horticultural oils, or neem oil can be used. It is important to make sure that the spray is applied to the undersides of the leaves where most of the spider mites are living and eating.

90448.question: How To Use a Yo Yo
90448.gt: If you want to use a yo-yo, wind the string around the yo-yo and slide the loop over your middle finger near your first knuckle.
