Once the yo-yo is fully extended, tug sharply upwards with your middle finger so the yo-yo climbs its string again.
90448.pred: To use a yo yo, you need to put it on your finger, hold it with your palm facing up, and throw it. When it comes back, you need to pull it up and catch it. If you have problems, you can try setting your hand at the same height as your belly button, or you can try lifting your elbow and dropping it as you throw. You can also try to wind the yoyo back up by holding the string with your first finger and winding it over and under your finger. If you have string tension, you can try to remove it by letting the string hand. If your yoyo is not sleeping, you can try to line up your shoulder, elbow, and wrist, and you can also try to use the technique of slapping your other hand to keep your throw straight.

90463.question: How To Make Fried Okra
90463.gt: To make fried okra, start by heating vegetable oil in a deep skillet over medium-high heat. Then, while that's heating up, cut some okra up into 1/2-inch pieces. Next, combine cornmeal, flour, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, and garlic powder in a bowl, and whisk some eggs in a separate bowl. Once you've done that, dip the okra pieces in the egg mixture and then the flour mixture, and add them to the skillet. Finally, fry the okra pieces in the oil for 3-6 minutes, or until they're golden brown.
90463.pred: To make fried okra, you will need a cup and a half of self-rising cornmeal, a cup of all-purpose flour, one fourth teaspoon of pepper, one half teaspoon of kosher salt, one tablespoon of water, one egg, one cup of whole milk, and okra pods. First, whisk the egg and add a cup of whole buttermilk. Then, add a tablespoon of water and set it aside. In a plastic bag, add the self-rising cornmeal, all-purpose flour, pepper, and salt. Toss the dry ingredients well combined. Cut the ends off the okra pods and cut them into fourths of an inch slices. Remove the caps and add the okra to the buttermilk mixture. Let it soak for about five minutes. Remove the okra from the buttermilk and shake it in the dry cornmeal mix. Lightly dry the okra on a cooling rack. Heat oil in a skillet until it reaches about a half an inch up the sides. Add the okra to the skillet and fry for about three minutes. Shake off the excess oil and serve.

90922.question: How To Clean a Tile Roof
90922.gt: To clean a tile roof, use a pressure washer to spray the roof with plain water to dislodge any loose dirt or debris. When spraying, start at the top of your roof and work down toward the gutters so the debris is headed in the right direction. Once your roof dries, fill the pressure washer with an anti-moss or fungicide solution and spray the tiles with the treatment. After the solution seeps into the pores of the tile, rinse the entire roof with clean water.
90922.pred: To clean a tile roof, you will need safety goggles, protective gloves, a high-pressure cleaner, and some chemical to remove moss and lichen. First, put on your safety equipment and apply the chemical to the roof. Wait for the recommended time before using the high-pressure cleaner to remove the chemical. Always work backwards to stay on dry tiles and have guard rails around the roof. Wear sturdy, non-slip footwear and have someone with you to pass up the pressure cleaner.

90931.question: How To Install Corrugated Roofing
90931.gt: To install corrugated roofing, start by cutting your panels to length with an angle grinder. Next, pre-drill holes on the end and side ridges of the panels, spacing the holes 6 to 8 inches apart. Beginning at the outside edge of your roof, place each panel directly onto the purlins that are attached to the roof trusses. Screw down the panels using the pre-drilled holes, then continue across the roof until it is completely covered.
90931.pred: To install corrugated roofing, first measure the length of the PVC sheets and cut them to the desired size. Then, install an apron flashing to create a weather-tight seal. Next, use a handy bar to open up the join between the weather boards and insert the roofing underneath. After that, use a screwdriver to fix the roofing in place, making sure to overlap the sheets and nail off the weather board through the flashing. Finally, install guttering to complete the installation.

90969.question: How To Clean Broccoli
90969.gt: To clean broccoli, start by filling a bowl with cold water and submerging the broccoli inside. Swirl it in the water a few times to loosen large pieces of dirt. Then, let it soak. After 5-10 minutes, remove the broccoli and put it in a colander. Run the broccoli under some cold water, using your hands to rub away dirt and debris. Then, shake the broccoli dry before serving or cooking! To clean broccoli with a vinegar solution, fill a large bowl with 3 parts water and 1 part white vinegar. Swirl the broccoli in the solution then let it soak. Finally, after 15-20 minutes, remove the broccoli and rinse it under cool water.
90969.pred: To clean broccoli, first, trim the untidy parts of the broccoli. Then, cut the florets and put them in water. After that, add vinegar to the water and let the broccoli rest for a few minutes. Discard any floating insects or debris. Finally, wash the broccoli twice to remove any remaining dirt or sand.

91046.question: How To Make an Origami Wolf
91046.gt: To make a simple origami wolf, start with a piece of square origami paper. Fold the paper in half from corner to corner to form a triangle. Fold the triangle in half again, then unfold it to leave a crease down the middle. With the top point facing you, fold the right corner to the bottom point of the triangle. Then, fold the left side down in the same way. Flip the paper over and fold the left corner over to the right corner to give you a diamond shape. After that, turn the paper so the longest angle of the triangle faces away from you and fold the left corner over to the right to make the wolf’s tail. Fold the right side of the paper so it overlaps the tail. Finally, fold the top middle triangle down to make the wolf’s nose.
91046.pred: To make an origami wolf, you will need 3D origami pieces in black, white, and cream colors. The model has 57 rows, with the third row having 41 pieces and the next one having 40 pieces. The rows alternate between 41 and 40 pieces. You can make the model from small pieces, such as 64 pieces from an A4 sheet of paper, or bigger pieces, such as 32 pieces from an A4 sheet of paper. The model is made from above 2000 pieces. You can find a link in the left corner of the screen to learn how to make the 3D origami piece. After putting 10 rows, you will have something like the first 5 rows. After putting 15 rows, you will have something like the next 5 rows. After putting 20 rows, you will have something like the next 5 rows. After putting 25 rows, you will have something like the next 5 rows. After putting 30 rows, you will have something like the next 5 rows. After putting 35 rows, you will have something like the next 5 rows. After putting 40 rows, you will have something like the next 5 rows. After putting 45 rows, you will have something like the next 5 rows. After putting 50 rows, you will have something like the next 5 rows. After putting 57 rows, you will have something like the last 6 or 7 rows.

91081.question: How To Cook Fiddleheads
91081.gt: If you want to eat fiddleheads, you must cook them to avoid food-borne illness. Rinse the fiddleheads thoroughly under cold water, and remove any of the brown papery coverings. To steam the fiddleheads, place them in a steamer basket and add water to the saucepan or steamer. Bring the water to a boil and steam the fiddleheads for 10-12 minutes, or until they are tender.
91081.pred: To cook fiddleheads, you need to first wash them in cold water and then trim the stems. After that, you can blanch them in boiling water for two minutes, saute them with butter, salt, and pepper, and finish with lemon juice.

91090.question: How To Julienne
91090.gt: To julienne a vegetable, start by cutting off any rounded ends with a knife to make the vegetable rectangular. Then, cut the vegetable into bite-size segments. Next, take each segment and slice it into thin strips lengthwise. Finally, re-stack the strips and cut them again to make long, thin sticks.
91090.pred: To julienne, first, peel the carrot and cut off the top and bottom. Then, slice the carrot into thin matchsticks. Repeat the process with the ginger and capsicum. For the beetroot, peel it and cut off the top and bottom. Then, slice the beetroot into thin matchsticks.

91152.question: How To Cook Dandelion Greens
91152.gt: To cook dandelion greens, start by boiling them in salted water for 3 to 4 minutes to get rid of bitterness. Then, blanche the greens in cold water to stop the cooking process. Next, fry onions and red pepper flakes in olive oil for 5 minutes before adding garlic. After 30 seconds, add the greens and fry them for 3 to 4 minutes, making sure to stir them as they cook.
91152.pred: To cook dandelion greens, first wash them in a sink and chop them into small pieces. Then, heat up a pan with coconut oil and add garlic, pepper, and salt. Add the chopped dandelion greens to the pan and cook them for 5-10 minutes. Finally, add coconut milk and cook for another 5-10 minutes.

91163.question: How To Cook Pig Feet
91163.gt: To make Southern style boiled pig feet, start by placing the pig’s feet, celery, onion, garlic, bay leaves, salt, pepper, and vinegar in a large stock pot or Dutch oven. Next, cover the ingredients with water and set the pot on the stove over a medium-high heat until the water reaches a rolling boil. Then, cover the pot and allow the meal to simmer for 2-3 hours. Before you serve the pig’s feet, heat the barbecue sauce in a small saucepan. After you remove the pig’s feet from the water, toss them in the sauce and serve them warm.
91163.pred: To cook pig feet, first, place the frozen pig feet in a bowl of salt water, then wash and rinse them. Next, chop the vegetables you will use, such as green and red bell peppers, onions, and celery. Add minced garlic, butter, and seasonings like salt, onion powder, Italian seasoning, parsley flakes, black pepper, and crushed red peppers to the pot. Pour in a slurry made of cornstarch and water, and add additional water to create a thin gravy. Cook the pig feet for 3 to 4 hours over medium heat, covered with a lid, and stir occasionally. Finally, add hot sauce and crushed red peppers to taste. The result should be tender and flavorful pig feet.

91184.question: How To Cook With Thyme
91184.gt: If you're unsure how to use thyme, make a thyme and lemon dry rub by combining dried thyme, grated lemon zest, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Press the dry rub into your meat, then cook it as normal. Alternatively, incorporate thyme into your cooking by mixing softened butter, thyme, salt, and pepper in a bowl to create thyme butter. If your recipe calls for fresh thyme but you only have dry thyme, convert the amount you need by using the formula 3/4 of a teaspoon of dried thyme for 6 fresh thyme sprigs.
91184.pred: The given videos do not provide any information on how to cook with thyme. The first video focuses on how to chop fresh thyme, while the second video is a general cooking tutorial that does not specifically mention thyme.

91188.question: How To Deep Fry at Home
91188.gt: To deep fry at home, fill a pot with enough canola or vegetable oil to submerge the food you're frying halfway. Next, turn the burner to high, heat the oil to about 350 °F, and carefully place your food in the oil using tongs. Then, use tongs or a slotted spoon to remove the food once it turns golden brown and crispy. Finally, place the fried food on stacked paper towels to drain before you serve it!
91188.pred: To deep fry at home, you need to follow a few steps. First, you need to preheat the oil to the correct temperature. You can do this by dropping a cube of bread into the oil and checking if it sizzles in 20 seconds, which means the oil is around 190°C. If it sizzles in 40 seconds, the oil is around 180°C, and if it takes 60 seconds, the oil is around 160°C. Once the oil is at the correct temperature, you can add the food to the oil. Make sure to use a pan with deep sides and fill it no more than half full with a flavorless oil such as vegetable or sunflower oil. You should also leave at least a 10 cm gap from the level of the oil to the top of the pan to allow for the oil rising and bubbling during cooking. When frying, make sure to use long tongs or a slotted deep fry spoon and remove the food carefully. Smaller pieces of food will cook faster and more evenly than larger pieces. If you are deep frying larger pieces of raw meat, make sure that the oil isn't so hot that the outside burns before the inside is thoroughly cooked. Cook in small batches, adding too much food at once will lower the temperature of the oil. Allow the oil to return to the correct cooking temperature each time before adding the next batch. Once the food is cooked, drain it on a kitchen towel to absorb the excess oil and keep the food crisp. Season with sea salt while still hot and serve immediately.

91197.question: How To Flambe
91197.gt: To create a successful flambé, you'll need to use a liquor that is 80-proof or 40% alcohol by volume. When the food is ready, remove the pan from the burner and slowly add the warm liquor. Touch a long match or a barbecue lighter to the edge of the pan to ignite the food. Then, put the pan back on the burner and shake it gently so that the flames coat the food evenly. You can let the fire burn out naturally or cover the pan with a lid to preserve some of the alcohol flavor.
91197.pred: To flambe safely, you should use a pan with a long handle and heat the food until it is hot. Do not flambe over the stove or under the kitchen hood. Never place your head or any part of your body over the pan and always be prepared for the blaze. Use a small amount of alcohol and pour it from a container, never directly from the bottle. Always ignite with long match sticks or with a long reach lighter. Flambe burns off the alcohol but leaves great flavour from the liquid. Normally, let the flames go out by themselves but if the flambe gets out of hand then simply place a metal lid on top to stop it.

91202.question: How To Fry Chips
91202.gt: To fry chips, start by cutting some potatoes into thin slices or wedges. Then, rinse the potatoes with water and pat them dry with a paper towel, which will help make them crispier. Next, spread the potatoes out in a deep pot, and pour at least 1 inch of oil into the pot so the potatoes are covered. Once you've added the potatoes and oil, heat everything over medium heat for 40 minutes, stirring the chips halfway through. Finally, increase the heat to medium-high, and cook the chips for 20-30 more minutes.
91202.pred: To fry chips, start by boiling the potatoes in water for 5 minutes. Then, drain the water and dry the potatoes as much as possible. Next, heat up a pan with oil and fry the potatoes for 5 minutes. Finally, remove the chips from the pan and place them on a paper towel to absorb any excess oil.

91232.question: How To Make Dahi
91232.gt: To make dahi, start by warming 4 cups of whole milk in a saucepan. When the milk is lukewarm, add 1½  teaspoons of plain yogurt and mix well with a spoon or whisk. Next, transfer the dahi to a glass or metal container with an airtight lid, and leave it to set on the counter for 8 hours. Alternatively, heat the oven to 180 degrees F, then turn it off and place the dahi inside the oven for 6 to 7 hours. Once the dahi sets, store it in the refrigerator to prevent it from becoming sour.
91232.pred: To make dahi, you need 500 grams of milk and 1 teaspoon of curd. First, boil the milk and let it cool down to room temperature. Then, add 1 teaspoon of curd to the milk and mix well. Cover the container and keep it aside for 5-6 hours. The curd will be ready and have a thick consistency.

91474.question: How To Make Mason Jar Candles
91474.gt: To make mason jar candles, start by securing the wick to the bottom of the jar with hot glue, then place 2 pencils over the mouth of the jar on either side of the wick. Next, fill a saucepan with 2 inches of water and position a candle-making pouring pot in the pan. Then, add the wax to the pouring pot and use medium heat to melt the wax evenly. Finally, let the wax cool to 130 to 140°F, fill the jar with the wax, and give it 24-48 hours to set before lighting your candle!
91474.pred: To make mason jar candles, you will need a mason jar, a lid, a wick, and lamp oil. First, measure the center of the lid and punch a hole in it. Then, take a piece of wood and a 16 D drill bit and punch a hole in the wood. Next, take a wick and push it through the hole in the wood. Finally, pour the lamp oil into the mason jar and light the wick.

91517.question: How To Make Scotch Pancakes
91517.gt: To make scotch pancakes, starr by stirring together flour, cream of tartar, bicarbonate of soda, salt, and butter in a bowl. Next, make a hole in the center of the ingredients, then add an egg and break the yolk. Then, add a cup of buttermilk and quickly stir. Finally, place a large dollop in a frying pan or on a griddle, and cook for a few minutes on each side.
91517.pred: To make scotch pancakes, you will need 150 grams of flour, baking powder, salt, three eggs, 75 ml of water, 120 ml of buttermilk, and a non-stick pan with sunflower oil. First, whisk the eggs into the flour and add half of the buttermilk. Then, add the rest of the buttermilk and whisk until the batter is smooth. Heat the non-stick pan with sunflower oil and pour half a ladle of batter into the pan. Cook for a minute and a half on each side. Once the pancakes are cooked, you can serve them with caramelized bananas and vanilla ice cream.

91559.question: How To Make Great "Just Add Water" Pancakes
91559.gt: To make great just-add-water pancakes, start by preheating a large skillet for 5-10 minutes. While that's heating up, mix together your boxed pancake mix and some water to make the batter, following the instructions on the box. Don't overmix the batter or else your pancakes won't be as fluffy. Next, grease the preheated pan with some butter and pour some of the batter into it. Finally, flip the pancake once you see bubbles start to rise and cook the other side until its brown.
91559.pred: To make great "just add water" pancakes, you can follow the instructions provided in the video. First, you need to mix self-raising flour or plain flour with baking powder, castor sugar or super fine sugar, and tapioca flour. This mixture will thicken and bind the batter instead of adding eggs. Then, add milk powder and a pinch of salt to the dry mixture and mix well. Next, prepare a shaker container by using a plastic juice cuton funnel to pour the dry mixture into it. Make the waterline with a permanent marker and pour in the water. Finally, shake the shaker container to mix the dry and wet ingredients together. The resulting mixture can be used to make pancakes by simply adding water and shaking the shaker container.

91597.question: How To Make Vegan Pancakes
91597.gt: To make vegan pancakes, start by mixing flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl. Then, in a separate bowl, mix vegetable oil and soy or almond milk. Next, pour the wet ingredients into the bowl of dry ingredients, and stir everything together until the batter is only a little lumpy. Finally, cook 1/4 cup of the batter at a time in a skillet for 2 minutes on each side.
91597.pred: To make vegan pancakes, you will need three ingredients: oats, almond milk, and a ripe banana. First, pour half a cup of oats into a high bowl and blend them with a blender stick until they form a flour-like texture. Next, pour the almond milk into the bowl and mix it with the oats. Then, add a ripe banana to the mixture and blend it all together until it forms a smooth batter. You can add cinnamon, brown sugar, cacao, or coconut flakes to the batter if you like. Heat up a pan and add some coconut oil or use a non-stick pan. Pour the batter onto the pan and cook the pancakes until bubbles form on the surface. Flip the pancakes and cook them until they are golden brown. Serve the pancakes with your favorite toppings, such as maple syrup, coconut flakes, or berries.

91795.question: How To Remove Onion Smell From Hands
91795.gt: To remove the onion smell from your hands, combine 1 tbsp (15 ml) of liquid soap and 1 tbsp (17 g) of salt in a small bowl. Scoop up some of the mixture and scrub your palms, wrists, the back of your hands, in between your fingers, and under your nails with it, then rinse your hands under cold water. Then, while your hands are still wet, grab a stainless steel item, like a pot or utensil. Hold the item under running water and rub it on your hands for 1 minute to eliminate any lingering onion smell.
91795.pred: To remove onion smell from hands, you can wrap your hands against stainless steel metal under cold running water for about a minute. Rubbing with a large metal spoon also works. Another method is to place a small f-sized amount of toothpaste on your palm and rub vigorously. Wash your hands with the paste and rinse off afterward. Be sure to use the paste type toothpaste and not the gel ones. Simply squeeze the juice from a lemon quarter over each hand and rub gently to cover evenly. Wash it off after a minute. Place a tablespoon of table salt on your palms and add enough water to make a paste. Wrap all over your hands and rinse off the salt. This will help in getting rid of the odor and also exfoliate your hands making them soft.

91802.question: How To Boil Lobsters
91802.gt: To boil lobsters, fill a 6-gallon stock pot with 4-5 gallons of water. Add 12 tbsp of salt for each gallon of water, along with thyme, bay leaves, and the juice from a lemon, and bring the water to a boil. Once the water is boiling, use tongs to grasp your live lobsters by the tail and gently dip them into the water one at a time. When the lobsters are in the water, clamp the lid onto the pot tightly and let them boil 8 minutes for each 1 pound of lobster. Stir the lobsters about halfway through the cooking time. The lobsters are ready when the shell is bright red and the meat inside is opaque and white.
91802.pred: To boil lobsters, first, take the lobsters out of the refrigerator and remove the rubber bands from their claws. Then, fill a large pot with water and add salt to taste. Place the lobsters in the pot, head first, and cover with a lid. Cook for about five to six minutes, or until the lobsters are done. To test if they are done, pull on the antenna and if it comes out easily, they are ready. Once the lobsters are done, remove them from the pot and place them in a strainer to drain off any excess hot water. Serve with melted butter and seasoning.

91813.question: How To Clean Leeks
91813.gt: To clean leeks, start by cutting off the part with the roots as well as the dark green, stalky portion on the top, leaving the white and light green portions of the leek. Next, slice the remaining portion of the leek in half lengthwise from the light green top down to the white base, and chop the 2 halves according to your recipe. Then, place all the pieces into a large bowl of water, and swish them around with your hand to get any dirt off. Finally, after soaking the leeks for 5 minutes, drain them and rinse them with fresh water.
91813.pred: To clean leeks, first trim the root end and remove the dark tops. Cut the leeks into sections about 4 inches long and slice them in half lengthwise. Clean the leeks by slicing them into sections, rinsing them, and lifting them out of the water. You can also clean after cutting by slicing, rinsing, and lifting.

91845.question: How To Garnish Food
91845.gt: If you want to garnish food, use edible garnishes, like fruits, veggies, or seeds whenever you can. To garnish an appetizer or entrée, sprinkle on some sesame seeds for texture or add a lemon wheel to fish and chicken dishes. When garnishing a dessert, try adding little squares of kiwi or orange. If you want something fancier, make a strawberry fan by cutting a clean dry strawberry in half lengthwise. Then, make 4-5 slices from the tip most of the way to the stem and fan them out on the plate for a lovely effect.
91845.pred: To garnish food, you can carve a tomato into a rose and a red onion into a mum. You can also make scallion brushes by cutting off the ends of the scallions and making cuts to create a brush-like shape. These garnishes can be used to add a decorative touch to your dishes.

91870.question: How To Make Hot Water Cornbread
91870.gt: To make hot water cornbread, stir the cornmeal, salt, and sugar together in a mixing bowl. Next, add the shortening and water and stir thoroughly until the shortening melts and the mixture is evenly combined. Then, scoop up heaping tablespoons of the dough and shape it into flattened balls or patties. Finally, fry the patties in hot oil until they're golden brown and let them drain on paper towels before serving them.
91870.pred: To make hot water cornbread, you will need a cup and a half of cornmeal, a half a cup of flour, a teaspoon of baking powder, a little salt, a teaspoon and a half of sugar, and a couple of tablespoons of butter. Mix all the ingredients together, then add water and stir until the butter is melted. Once the mixture is ready, you can cook it in a pot of hot water. It's important to have cold water handy to cool down the mixture, and you can also use gloves to protect your hands. The video also shows how to make fried chicken and how to cook cornbread on both sides until it's golden brown.

91907.question: How To Remove Cheesecake from a Springform Pan
91907.gt: To remove cheesecake from a springform pan, make sure to chill the cheesecake overnight so that it will be more solid and easier to remove from the pan. If you haven't baked your cheesecake yet, you can line the springform pan with parchment paper to help prevent it from sticking. If you've already baked your cheesecake, run a butter knife under hot water and then run the knife around the edges of the pan. Then, you can unlatch the pan and slide the cake onto a platter.
91907.pred: To remove a cheesecake from a springform pan, you need to use a long knife with a blunt edge and tip, which is also known as a spatula. First, hold your left hand on the side of the cheesecake and slip the spatula under the cheesecake and on top of the pan bottom. Then, slide the spatula all the way under the cheesecake and out. Next, set a cardboard circle on the left side and place your left hand on the side of the cheesecake again. Insert the spatula under the cheesecake and slide it all the way under the cheesecake except this time stop just short of removing the spatula from under the cheesecake. Lift the cheesecake up just a little bit and place the cardboard circle underneath as much as you can about a 1/8 to 1/4 under the cheesecake with your right hand. Finally, slide the cheesecake over onto the cardboard cake circle, remove the pan bottom, remove the spatula, and it's done.

91911.question: How To Roast a Duck
91911.gt: Before roasting a duck, preheat the oven to 300 degrees Fahrenheit while you remove the giblets and use a sharp paring knife to score the fat. Then, place the duck on the second lowest rack in the oven, breast-side up, for 1 hour. After 1 hour, flip the duck over, prick it to release the fat, and roast it for another hour. Repeat this process 4 times, then turn the oven up to 400 degrees. Roast the duck for 10 more minutes at this higher temperature to crisp the skin.
91911.pred: To roast a duck, start by scoring the duck with a sharp knife to allow the fat to escape. Then, cut down a little bit on the leg to allow the heat to get in quicker and prevent overcooking the breast. Rub the duck with salt and any desired seasoning, and place it in a roasting pan with a tray underneath to keep the skin off the bottom. Roast the duck in a preheated oven at 425 degrees for about an hour, then check the temperature to ensure it reaches 155-165 degrees. Baste the duck with its own juices and add wine to deglaze the pan. Once the duck is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before carving it.

91946.question: How To Make Turon (Bananacue Wrap)
91946.gt: To make turon, start by chopping fresh jackfruit, then cutting a sweet plantain into spears. Roll the sweet plantain pieces in brown sugar, then place your fillings in a lumpia wrapper. Next, roll the wrapper like an egg roll, then seal it by brushing egg whites along the edges. Now that your rolls are ready to be fried, heat oil in a frying pan, then add your rolls, turning them over with tongs halfway through. When both sides are golden brown, take them out of the oil and put them on a paper plate.
91946.pred: To make turon, you will need to start by boiling water in a pot and adding brown sugar to it. Then, slice the bananas and wrap them in lumpia wrappers. After that, you can fry the wrapped bananas in oil until they are golden brown. Finally, you can serve the turon with vanilla ice cream and drizzle some syrup on top.

91947.question: How To Cook Adobong Manok
91947.gt: To cook adobong manok, start by cooking garlic and onion in oil over medium heat until it’s golden brown. Next, add chicken, soy sauce, vinegar, pepper, salt, sugar, water and bay leaves and stir it all together. Bring the dish to a boil, then lower the heat and let it simmer for 30 minutes. When the chicken is tender, remove the chicken from the heat and serve it with rice or potatoes.
91947.pred: To cook adobong manok, you will need chicken, bay leaves, garlic, vinegar, soy sauce, salt, sugar, water, and cooking oil. First, marinate the chicken in soy sauce, garlic, and bay leaves for a few hours. Then, heat the cooking oil in a pot and add the marinated chicken. Cook until the chicken is browned. Add the vinegar, water, and sugar, and let the mixture simmer. Add the bay leaves and garlic, and cover the pot. Cook until the chicken is tender. Finally, serve the adobong manok.

91970.question: How To Make Kwek Kwek
91970.gt: If you want to make kwek kwek, boil a dozen quail eggs, then remove the eggs from the pan. Rinse or soak the eggs in cold water until they are cool to the touch, then peel off the shells using your fingers. Dredge the eggs in flour, then dip them in a batter made of flour, baking powder, and diluted annatto powder. Fry 4-6 of the eggs in vegetable oil over high heat until the batter turns golden-brown and crisp, then transfer them to a plate lined with paper towels until they’re cool enough to eat.
91970.pred: To make kwek kwek, you will need the following ingredients: iodized salt, corn starch, black pepper, anatto powder, boiled quail eggs, flour, water, and cooking oil. First, mix the corn starch, salt, and black pepper in a container. Then, roll the boiled quail eggs in the corn starch mixture. Next, make the batter by mixing flour, salt, and black pepper in a bowl. Dissolve the anatto powder in warm water and add it to the batter. Mix well. Heat the cooking oil in a pot. Once the oil is hot, dip the quail eggs in the batter and fry them in the oil. Once they are cooked, place them in a container. Repeat the process for all the quail eggs. Enjoy your delicious kwek kwek!

91972.question: How To Make Longganisa
91972.gt: To make longganisa, start by mixing ground pork with soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, paprika, brown sugar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Then, refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours so it gets firm and flavorful. Next, roll the meat into sausage links and stuff it into casing or leave it as is. Finally, fry the sausages in a pan with 1/2 a cup of water until they're golden brown.
91972.pred: To make longganisa, you will need to mix ground meat with various ingredients such as black pepper, minced garlic, water, soy sauce, salt, corn starch, and sweet paprika. After mixing, you will need to wrap the mixture in plastic wrap and freeze it for two hours. Once frozen, you can take out the mixture and cut it into small pieces. Then, you can fry the pieces in a pan with oil until they are browned. Finally, you can serve the longganisa with rice and fried eggs.

91977.question: How To Make Puto (Steamed Rice Cake)
91977.gt: If you want to make puto, or a Filipino steamed rice cake, start by sifting together your rice flour, sugar, and baking powder into a bowl. Add butter, coconut milk, egg, and water, and mix all of the ingredients thoroughly with a wooden spoon or whisk. Pour the mixture into molds or small cupcake pans, then put a little square of cheese on top of each mold. Steam the molds for about 20 minutes, then remove the puto from the molds and serve.
91977.pred: To make puto, you need to soak the rice in water for five hours, then grind it in a blender with a little water. After grinding, you need to add sugar and baking powder to the mixture. Then, you need to steam the mixture for ten minutes. Finally, you can serve the puto with butter or cheese.

91979.question: How To Make Taho
91979.gt: To make taho, simmer the sago pearls until they get translucent and drain them. Next, combine the sugar, vanilla, and water in a saucepan and bring the mixture to a boil. Then, reduce the heat to low and let the syrup simmer for 1-2 minutes before removing it from the heat. Finally, steam the tofu, cut it into chunks, and place the chunks in cups. Dish the sago pearls over the tofu, pour the syrup on top, and stir the mixture gently.
91979.pred: To make taho, you will need to boil water in a pot and add tapioca pearls. Once the tapioca pearls are cooked, add brown sugar and extra soft tofu. Mix everything together and let it sit for a while. Finally, pour the mixture into a glass and enjoy your homemade taho.

92085.question: How To Build a Fence
92085.gt: To build a fence, start by inserting your posts into the holes and stabilizing them with braces. Next, tamp down dirt or concrete into the holes to fix the posts in place. Then, nail a top and bottom rail running horizontally from the posts, and add center rails and boards, depending on your chosen fence style. Finish by adding several coats of wood sealer to protect your fence from the weather, and painting it in a color of your choice.
92085.pred: To build a fence, you need to start by digging holes for the fence posts. You can use an auger to make the holes and then use a level to ensure that the posts are straight. Once the posts are in place, you can use a drill to attach the fence panels to the posts. It's important to make sure that the fence is level and that the panels are securely attached to the posts. You can also add string lights to the fence to make it look more decorative. Finally, you can paint the fence to make it look more finished.

92121.question: How To Remove Mildew and Algae from a Wooden Fence
92121.gt: If you want to remove mildew and algae from a wooden fence using bleach, start by covering the plants with tarps or inverted buckets so they aren’t harmed by the solution. Then, mix 1 part bleach with 2 parts warm water. Next, add 1 teaspoon of mild soap per gallon of water, if it is safe to mix with bleach. Scrub that solution onto the stained areas of the fence and rinse it off with a hose.
92121.pred: To remove mildew and algae from a wooden fence, you can use a pressure washer with a 40-degree tip to clean the fence. 92371.question: How To Make Mahamri
92371.gt: To make mahamri, start by combining yeast, water, sugar, and flour to make the dough. Then knead the dough and leave it to rise until it’s doubled in size. When the dough is ready, divide it into 5 equally sized balls. Let them rise before you roll out each ball and shape it into a circle. Cut the circles into quarters, and fry the pieces in a deep, wide frying pan. Be sure to use very hot cooking oil, and cook the mahamri on both sides so it's golden brown all over.
92371.pred: To make mahamri, you need to mix flour, sugar, and yeast in a bowl. Then, add coconut milk and mix until you get a soft dough. If the dough is too sticky, add a little flour. Cut the dough into four pieces and roll each piece into a disc shape. Cut the discs into triangles and let them rise for an hour. Heat oil in a pot and fry the triangles until they are golden brown. Remove the fried triangles from the oil and place them on a paper towel to drain excess oil.

92381.question: How To Stop a Dog's Quick from Bleeding
92381.gt: To stop a dog's quick from bleeding, try to remain calm so you don't stress out your dog and remember that your dog isn't at risk from the minor blood loss. First, find a bar of soap and press the bleeding nail into the soap at a 90-degree angle so it's 3-4 millimeters deep. Then, hold your dog's paw still in this position for 3-4 minutes. After a few minutes, gently twist and pull the soap off your dog's nail. If your dog's nail is still bleeding, repeat the process until you've successfully formed a plug with the soap.
92381.pred: To stop a dog's quick from bleeding, you can use a tea bag and dip it in water. Then, place the tea bag on the bleeding claw and hold it on for about half an hour. This method has worked for the woman in the video.

92404.question: How To Cook a Frozen Pie
92404.gt: To cook a frozen pie, start by preheating the oven to 425°F. Next, place the pie on a foil-lined baking sheet to catch any filling that might drip over the sides of the dish. Once the oven is hot, place the pie on the bottom rack of the oven, so that the top of the pie doesn’t cook faster than the bottom. Bake the pie for 15 minutes before reducing the oven temperature to 350°F. Then, bake it for another 45 minutes, rotating the pie halfway through so it cooks evenly. Finally, remove it from the oven when it’s golden brown and let it cool slightly before serving.
92404.pred: To cook a frozen pie, you need to preheat the oven to 400 degrees and place the pie in a tin covered with aluminum foil. Bake the pie for 32 to 34 minutes, then remove the foil and bake for another 8 to 10 minutes. Let the pie rest for 5 minutes and check the temperature with a thermometer. The temperature should be between 155 to 165 degrees.

92770.question: How To Color Sand
92770.gt: To color sand using food coloring, start by placing ¼ to 1 cup of sand into a plastic zippered bag. Next, add 3 to 4 drops of food coloring, close the bag tightly, then shake and squeeze the bag until the color is evenly distributed. Afterwards, spread the sand evenly along the bottom of a baking sheet and let it dry overnight. Alternatively, place it in a 200 degree F oven for 5 to 10 minutes, then take it out of the oven and let it finish drying for a few more hours.
92770.pred: To color sand, you will need a good sponge, a hard rubber squeegee, a double-sided wet sanding block, and sand paper. Start by folding the sand paper onto the block, using the soft side. Then, dip the sponge in water and pour it onto the piece you are wet sanding. Use the hard side of the block to break down the shiny, glistening ice skating feel of the paint. Look at the door as a pattern and concentrate on three sections at a time. Use your fingers as a guide to stay away from burning the edge. Lift the sand paper and bring it up on the top ridge, using your thumb as a guide. Squeegee the water off the door to see the highs and lows of the paint. Repeat the process with the soft side of the block and the sand paper.

93208.question: How To Clean a Driveway
93208.gt: To clean a driveway using household products, start by covering any stained areas with a natural absorbent, like cat litter, baking soda, or cornstarch. If the stain is dry, add some water as well. Then, let the absorbent sit on the stain for 1 hour before sweeping it off. You can also clean stains on your driveway by pouring cola over them, letting it sit overnight, and then blotting and rinsing the area in the morning.
93208.pred: To clean a driveway, you should first stretch out your hose and make sure there are no kinks in it. Then, drain your hose by spraying it and make sure all the air is out. Attach your garden hose and turn it on. Hold the nozzle down until all the popping sounds go away. Remove the nozzle and attach the surface cleaner. Fill the surface cleaner with water and attach it to the pump. Turn on the pump and spray the driveway. Use a brush to scrub the driveway and remove any dirt or grime. Rinse the driveway with water to remove any remaining dirt or grime.

93220.question: How To Make Stepping Stones
93220.gt: To make stepping stones, choose a mold, like a cake pan or a plastic tub, then coat the mold with petroleum jelly or cooking oil to make removing the stone easier. Prepare concrete according to the instructions on the package, then pour around 2 inches into the mold. Next, choose decorative mosaic pieces, like tiles, sea glass, and seashells, and press them into the concrete so no jagged edges stick out. Allow to set for 2 days, then remove by flipping the container over onto a soft surface.
93220.pred: To make stepping stones, you will need a mold, chicken wire, stained glass, concrete, and a screwdriver. First, put the chicken wire in the mold and add concrete to the bottom. Then, add the momentos, such as horseshoes, helm, wrench, and initials with a heart in the middle. Place the stained glass around the momentos and use a screwdriver to adjust any items that are too far below the concrete. Tap the pieces with a screwdriver to make sure they are firmly embedded in the concrete. Wait 24 hours before taking the stone out of the mold. Clean the stone with a hairdryer and a toothbrush to remove any residue. Once the stone is dry, you can spray it with water or use a hose to clean it.

93229.question: How To Use a Power Washer
93229.gt: Before you use a power washer, put on protective clothing, including goggles, long-sleeved clothing, boots, work gloves, and non-slip shoes. If your power washer is gas powered, make sure to wear ear protection as well. Then, fill it up with fuel. Alternatively, connect it to a grounded power source if it’s an electric model. Next, connect your garden hose to the washer and a spray tip to the nozzle. Position the tip at least 2 feet away from the surface you want to clean. Point the nozzle at a 45 degree angle to the surface, which will help direct flying debris away from you. Once you’re in position, pull the trigger to spray the water. Spray from side to side, taking care not to stay on one spot for too long.
93229.pred: To use a power washer, first, unscrew the lid off the gas tank and fill it up. Then, attach the garden hose and pressure hose securely. Turn on the water supply and squeeze the trigger to purge air from the pump. Once all the air has escaped, attach the nozzle and let water start coming out. Choose the appropriate nozzle for the job and start the engine. Be careful not to hit the hose or your feet, and always wear safety goggles. After pressure washing, turn off the engine, water supply, and squeeze the trigger to relieve system pressure. Remove the garden hose, turn off the fuel valve, remove the nozzle, and drain the water from the hose. Finally, rinse off the pressure washer and store it.

93306.question: How To Blacken Fish
93306.gt: To blacken fish, start by seasoning it with salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, basil, and oregano. Then, heat some olive oil in a stainless-steel pan over medium heat. Next, add the fish and cook it for 5-6 minutes over medium-high heat, flipping it over halfway through. For the last 2-3 minutes, reduce the heat to medium-low. Once the edges of the fish have blackened and it has a smoky color, take it off the heat and serve.
93306.pred: To blacken fish, you will need to season the fish with salt, sugar, garlic powder, black pepper, cayenne pepper, onion powder, cumin, and paprika. Then, heat up a nonstick skillet with oil and cook the fish on both sides until it is done. Finally, remove the fish from the skillet and place it on a cooling rack.

93344.question: How To Cook Rainbow Trout
93344.gt: To cook rainbow trout in a pan, start by rinsing fillets under cold water and patting them dry with a paper towel. Then, use a basting brush to brush both sides of the fillet with olive oil, and sprinkle with a little salt for flavor. Brush more olive oil into a frying pan and heat it to medium-high before adding fillets skin-side down. Cook each side for about 5 minutes, remove fillets from the pan, and serve with a flavorful topping, like fennel and lemon.
93344.pred: To cook rainbow trout, first, gut and clean the fish. Then, make an incision from the head to the tail and remove the internal organs. Next, season the fish with lemon pepper and butter. Wrap the fish in foil and place it on a grill. Cook the fish for 23 minutes. Finally, peel the skin off the fish and enjoy the meal.

93350.question: How To Cook Smoked Haddock
93350.gt: To poach smoked haddock, bring it nearly to a boil on the stove with some milk and pepper, then simmer it for about 10 minutes. You can also pan-fry smoked haddock by dredging it in a flour-and-herb mixture before frying it in hot oil for about 8 minutes on the first side and a little less on the second. Want to bake your smoked haddock, instead? Season it with butter and whatever spices you like, wrap it in foil or parchment, and bake it in a 350°F oven for 15-20 minutes or until it’s done.
93350.pred: To cook smoked haddock, you need to first heat a pan and add milk. Then, add parsley, peppercorns, bay leaves, and mace to the milk. Let the milk infuse for 30 minutes. After that, remove the milk from the heat and add the fish to the pan. Cook the fish for 6-8 minutes, skin side up. Finally, remove the fish from the pan and serve it.

93370.question: How To Grill Fish
93370.gt: To grill fish, start by cutting it up into small fillets so it's easier to cook. Then, season or marinate the fillets while your grill is preheating to around 550 degrees Fahrenheit. Once the grill is hot enough, place the fillets directly on the grill grate, reduce the heat to medium, and let them cook for 3-5 minutes. Next, flip the fillets over and let them cook for 3-5 minutes on the other side. Finally, take the fillets off the grill once they're firm and opaque all the way through.
93370.pred: To grill fish, you should first choose fresh fish and season it with salt and pepper. Then, preheat your grill to medium heat and brush the grates with oil to prevent sticking. Place the fish directly on the grill and cook for 3 to 5 minutes on each side. For less firm fish, use a wire fish basket or foil packet to protect the fish while grilling. You can also make kabobs with fish and vegetables for a colorful and easy-to-serve presentation.

94075.question: How To Make Sunny Side up Eggs
94075.gt: To make sunny side up eggs, start by heating about 1 tablespoon of butter in a skillet over low heat. Then, break a couple eggs into the pan, keeping the yolks intact and whites separated. Next, cover the pan and cook the eggs for 2-3 minutes or until the whites are firm and cooked on the top. Finally, use a spatula to transfer the eggs to a plate before serving.
94075.pred: To make sunny side up eggs, you need to crack the eggs into a bowl first, then add butter to a pan and melt it. Once the butter is melted, add the eggs to the pan and cook them until the whites are set. You can add salt and pepper to the eggs for seasoning.

94170.question: How To Make Macaroni Salad
94170.gt: To make a classic macaroni salad, start by cooking a pound of macaroni in boiling water for 8 minutes. Then, drain and rinse the pasta with cool water and set it aside. Next, whisk together mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing. After that, add chopped or diced celery, pepper, onion, carrots, and parsley to the pasta and mix everything together. Finally, toss the macaroni and vegetables with the dressing, and serve immediately or keep it in the fridge for up to 24 hours.
94170.pred: To make macaroni salad, you will need to cook the macaroni and then mix it with mayonnaise, sugar, and salt. You can also add other ingredients like chicken, celery, carrots, and cucumbers to the salad. Once the salad is ready, you can serve it in a bowl and garnish it with parsley.

94655.question: How To Clean Tile with Vinegar
94655.gt: To clean a tile floor with vinegar, first get rid of any loose dirt by sweeping or vacuuming the floor. Then, mix equal parts hot water and white vinegar in a bucket that’s big enough to hold a mop. After you’ve made your vinegar solution, dip a mop in the bucket and wring out any excess liquid before mopping. Once you’ve gone over the floor with the vinegar and water solution, rinse out your mop and mop the floor a second time with plain, hot water.
94655.pred: To clean tile with vinegar, you can use a bottle of vinegar and spray it on the tile. Let it sit for about 5 minutes, then use a cheap brush to scrub the area. You can also use a wet mop to clean the area. This method is effective in removing dirt and grout from the tile.

94902.question: How To Make Muesli
94902.gt: To make muesli, start by mixing 4 cups of grains, such as rolled oats or wheat flakes, and 1 cup of your favorite chopped nuts in a large bowl. Then, stir in 1 cup of dried fruit, like dates, raisins, dehydrated berries, and dried mango. Be sure to store your muesli in an airtight container in a cupboard, where it can stay fresh for up to 2 months. When you're ready to have some of your muesli, serve it with some milk or yogurt in a bowl and enjoy!
94902.pred: To make muesli, you will need rolled oats, brown sugar, walnuts, dried cranberries, oil, honey, warm water, and salt. First, mix the oats, brown sugar, and walnuts in a large bowl. Then, add the oil, honey, warm water, and salt to the bowl and mix well. Transfer the mixture to a baking tray lined with parchment paper and spread it evenly. Bake the mixture in the oven at 160 degrees Celsius for 40 to 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes. Once the mixture is browned and crispy, remove it from the oven and add the dried cranberries. Let the muesli cool before storing it in an airtight container.

95181.question: How To Touch up Scratches on Your Car
95181.gt: To touch up scratches on your car, purchase the correct color of paint for your car, and clean the area with the scratch using automotive soap and water. Be sure to dry the area completely and sand off any rusted areas. Carefully apply a coat of primer if there are any bare sections of metal, and then apply the first coat of paint once the primer dries. Dab the paint onto the scratch to allow it to settle in with a smooth finish. Once the paint dries, spray on a layer of clear coat to protect the paint, and add a coat of polish to make the paint shine.
95181.pred: To touch up scratches on your car, first, you need to clean the area with a microfiber cloth. Then, apply a high-quality urethane paint from Car Scratch Remover.com, which is not reduced and has a better consistency than typical online touch-up paint. Use a gloved finger to dab and smear the paint along the scratch, being careful not to play with it too much. After that, use a paint leveling solvent to remove excess paint on either side of the scratch without touching the scratch itself. Finally, reapply the paint and smear it in again, and repeat the process if necessary.

95445.question: How To Make Chantilly Cream
95445.gt: To make Chantilly cream, start by mixing 1 cup of cream with 1/3 cup of milk in a large mixing bowl. Then, whip the mixture with a large balloon whisk until it's frothy and soft peaks start to form. Next, add 5-6 tablespoons of caster sugar and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract to the cream. Finally, continue to whip the cream until stiff peaks start to form.
95445.pred: To make chantilly cream, you will need heavy or whipping cream, powdered sugar, and vanilla extract. First, put the bowl and whisk in the refrigerator for 20 minutes. Then, add the cream, sugar, and vanilla extract to the bowl and whisk until it becomes thick and forms stiff peaks.

95483.question: How To Use Different Types of Cream
95483.gt: To use different types of cream, use light cream for things like scrambling eggs, mixing coffee, or sweetening up some fresh fruit. If you have heavy cream, use it to make cream-based soups, make whipped cream, or prepare ice cream. You can also use heavy cream in milky cocktails, like a White Russian. To use crème fraîche, add it to creamy sauces or use it as a substitute for yogurt or mayonnaise in your recipes.
95483.pred: The given videos showcase various types of ice cream and how they are made. The first video shows a person making ice cream by pouring a liquid mixture on a freezing plate and using knives to agitate and flatten it until it's firm. The second video shows a person making snow cream by freezing ice cream into cylindrical blocks and using a machine to shave off the bottom layer, creating thin fluffy ribbons. The third video shows a person making mochi ice cream by pounding sticky rice dough several times before adding ice cream to it. The fourth video shows a person making coffee ice cream by using condensed milk as one of the main ingredients. The fifth video shows a person making dawn derma ice cream by using a natural ingredient called salad, which gives it a thick and elastic texture. The sixth video shows a person making granita ice cream by scraping ice and creating a grainy texture. The seventh video shows a person making el arroz de paella ice cream by spinning a large shallow metal pan or bowl and using a vessel of ice under the bowl to solidify the ice cream mixture.

95560.question: How To Make Hoppers
95560.gt: To make hoppers, mix the yeast, sugar, and warm water. Let the mixture sit until foamy, which can take 5-15 minutes. Measure the rice flour and salt into a bowl, then add the yeast mixture and stir. Next, add the coconut milk and stir until smooth. Cover the bowl and let it sit for 2 hours. When the dough has expanded, spread a little oil in a medium-hot pan and add 1/3 cup of the batter, tilting the pan to cover the bottom and sides. Your hopper is done when the edges are brown and the center isn’t runny.
95560.pred: To make hoppers, you will need 2 cups of thick coconut milk, 1 tsp of salt, and 1 and 1/2 cups of thick coconut milk. Mix the ingredients well and let it ferment for 35 minutes. After that, add another 1 and 1/2 cups of thick coconut milk and let it ferment for another 5 minutes. Preheat the pan and apply some sesame oil on it. Add the batter to the pan and cook on high flame for 2 minutes. Loosen the hopper and reduce the flame. Let it cook until it is well cooked.

95759.question: How To Make Iced Tea You Can Drink Immediately
95759.gt: To make iced tea you can drink immediately, start by filling a pitcher with 3 cups of cold water and placing it in the fridge. Then, bring 1 cup of water to a boil, and pour it into a heat-proof glass with 4 tea bags. Next, steep the tea for 3-5 minutes before pouring it into the pitcher of cold water. Finally, sweeten your iced tea with honey or simple syrup and enjoy.
95759.pred: To make iced tea that you can drink immediately, you can follow the steps in the first video. First, add four cups of water and 1 and 1/2 tablespoons of tea leaves to a pot. Boil the water for 4 to 5 minutes, then turn off the flame and let the tea cool down. Once the tea is cooled, strain it to remove the tea leaves. Add 1/4 cup of lemon juice and 1/2 cup of sugar to the tea and stir well. Let the tea cool down to room temperature, then chill it in the fridge for 4 to 5 hours. Finally, add ice cubes and lemon slices to a serving glass, pour the tea into the glass, and fill it halfway with cold water. Your iced tea is now ready to drink immediately.

95760.question: How To Make Sun Tea
95760.gt: To make sun tea, start by filling a clean, sanitized container with 4 cups of cold water. Next, add 5 teabags of your preferred variety, such as black or herbal tea. Then, place the tea in direct sunlight for 4 hours. Once the tea has brewed, remove the tea bags and add some sugar if you want a sweeter tea. Finally, fill some glasses with ice, then pour in the tea.
95760.pred: To make sun tea, you need to fill two glass jugs with water and add tea bags to each jug. Place the jugs in the sun for three hours. After three hours, remove the jugs from the sun and place them in the refrigerator for an hour. Once the tea is chilled, you can add ice and lemon slices to the tea and enjoy.

96074.question: How To Make an Ice Cream Cake
96074.gt: To make an ice cream cake, start by making the cake batter, then bake the cake for 35 minutes. Slice the cooled cake crosswise to create 2 thin discs and place them in the freezer for several hours. Next, soften the ice cream for a few minutes at room temperature, then stir it until it has the consistency of spreadable icing. Place 1 cake disc on the plate and spread half the ice cream on top. Then, add the second cake disc and spread on the remaining ice cream. Freeze the cake for 2-4 hours before adding the whipped topping.
96074.pred: To make an ice cream cake, you will need to make vanilla ice cream and chocolate cake. First, make the vanilla ice cream and spin it in an ice cream machine until it is soft. Then, cut the chocolate cake into layers about a third of an inch thick and line a cake pan with paper. Place a layer of vanilla ice cream in the pan, spread it evenly, and add a layer of cake on top. Repeat this process until all the layers are used up. Freeze the cake for about three hours or overnight until it is set. Unmold the cake and ice it with buttercream icing. Sprinkle the cake with sprinkles and add some buttercream piping decoration on top.

96144.question: How To Make Vegan Ice Cream
96144.gt: To make vegan ice cream, start by adding bananas, almond milk, and cocoa powder into a food processor. Blend the mix until its smooth and creamy, keeping in mind that you may have to use a spatula to stir the mixture occasionally. Once it’s fully mixed, add vegan chocolate chips before pouring the mixture into a freezer safe container, like a plastic tub. To turn it into ice cream, just set the tub in the freezer for 2 hours to let it harden.
96144.pred: To make vegan ice cream, you can use a food processor to blend frozen bananas with almond milk. You can add various flavors such as berries, chocolate, or pistachios to the mixture. The resulting mixture can be frozen to create a creamy and delicious vegan ice cream.

96233.question: How To Set up a Fish Tank (for Goldfish)
96233.gt: To set up a fish tank for goldfish, choose an aquarium that holds at least 20 gallons. Use smooth gravel as your substrate, and decorate the tank with plants, rocks, and other decor. Goldfish produce a lot of waste, so include a filtration system in your tank. Fill the aquarium with water that’s been treated with a conditioner to remove chlorine and chloramine, and let the water sit for about 2 weeks before you add the goldfish so it can build up beneficial bacteria.
96233.pred:
To set up a fish tank for goldfish, you will need to follow these steps:
1. Purchase a fish tank and a filter.
2. Fill the tank with water and add dechlorinator to remove chlorine.
3. Add gravel to the bottom of the tank and place the filter on top.
4. Add plants to the tank for decoration and oxygenation.
5. Purchase goldfish food and feed the goldfish.
6. Add the goldfish to the tank and let them acclimate to the new environment.
7. Turn on the filter and let the tank run for a few days before adding decorations or other fish.
8. Enjoy your new goldfish tank!

96244.question: How To Press Leaves
96244.gt: To press leaves, start by finding a heavy book that you don't mind getting a little wrinkled or stained. Then, cut out a piece of paper that's the same height as the book and twice the width. Next, fold the piece of paper in half and place your leaf inside of it. Slip the folded paper inside of the book and then set a few other heavy books on top of it. Finally, place the pile of books in a dry place and check on your leaf regularly until it's completely dry.
96244.pred: To press leaves, you will need flowers or leaves, newspaper sheets, heavy weights, wax paper, and a large book. First, collect some interesting flowers or leaves. Then, place the flowers or leaves between two sheets of newspaper and let them flatten and dry under some heavy weights for at least one day. After that, remove the partially dried flowers or leaves when they are free of any surface moisture. Next, insert each flower or leaf, separately sandwiched between two sheets of wax paper, in the pages of a large book. Leave about 100 pages, or 0.125 inches, between pressings. Choose a book that you no longer use or need. This will prevent any damage to books you want to keep. Place heavy weights on the book. Leave the flowers or leaves in the book for a couple of weeks before removing them. Insert labels of where you found the leaves or flowers, or if you were given the flowers, include the card in the pressing. Finally, store the pressed leaves or flowers in an album. Enjoy looking at them and capturing the memories of nature.

96247.question: How To Dry Leaves
96247.gt: To dry leaves, start by placing the leaves in between 2 paper towels with none of the leaves overlapping. Then, open a large book and place the paper towels in between its pages. Once the leaves are in place, close the book and stack something heavy on top of it. Check on the leaves once per week until they're dry.
96247.pred: To dry leaves, you can use a wax wrap and a tea towel. First, place the leaves on the wax wrap and then cover them with the tea towel. Next, use a hot iron to press the leaves and dry them. This method is quick and easy, and it works well for preserving leaves.

96316.question: How To Fix a Washer That Won't Drain
96316.gt: If you need to fix a washer that won’t drain, pull the washing machine out from the wall and remove the drain hose from the back of the washer. Run a strong stream of water, like from an outdoor hose, through the drain hose to clear any clogs that might be trapped. Replace the hose on the machine and run it on a rinse/drain cycle to see if the problem is fixed. If it isn’t, remove and clean the pump from on your washer.
96316.pred: To fix a washer that won't drain, you should first check for a malfunctioning drain pump. You can do this by using a multimeter to test for continuity in the pump motor. If the pump motor does not have continuity, it will need to be replaced. Next, check the drain hose for any obstructions or damage. If the hose is obstructed, you may need to replace it. Finally, check the lid switch to ensure it is functioning properly. If the lid switch is defective, it will need to be replaced.

96317.question: How To Fix a Washing Machine That Stops Mid‐Cycle
96317.gt: To fix a washing machine that stops mid-cycle, try a master reset by first unplugging the washing machine to reset the computer. After 1 minute, plug your machine back in, then open and close the door 6 times in 12 seconds to signal the computer to reset. To see if the machine is fixed, set it on “small load” with nothing inside, and see if it runs through the entire cycle with no problems.
96317.pred: The video provides a step-by-step guide on how to fix a washing machine that stops mid-cycle. The first step is to check the lid switch, which is located on the top of the washing machine. The lid switch is responsible for controlling the machine's operation. If the lid switch is not engaging properly, it can cause the machine to stop mid-cycle. To fix this issue, you can try bending the lid switch over a little bit. This will help the switch engage properly and allow the machine to continue running. However, it is important to note that this is not always a lasting fix and sometimes the lid switch may need to be replaced. The video also provides information on how to replace the lid switch. Additionally, the video advises viewers to remove any coins that may be clogging the drain, as this can also cause the machine to stop mid-cycle. Overall, the video provides a helpful guide on how to fix a washing machine that stops mid-cycle.

96409.question: How To Bend Sheet Metal
96409.gt: To bend sheet metal in a vice, start by marking a line on the metal where you want to bend it. Next, put your wooden or metal form blocks in the vice and clamp your sheet of metal between the forms. If your sheet metal is long, ask a friend to stabilize the part hanging out from the form blocks so it doesn't affect the bend. Then, tap your metal along the bend line with a rubber or plastic mallet until the sheet bends to the angle you want. If you're working with a thick sheet of metal, apply heat from a blowtorch along the bend line to soften it.
96409.pred: The video provides a step-by-step guide on how to bend sheet metal using different methods. The first method involves using a sheet metal brake, which is a machine that applies pressure to the metal to create a bend. The second method involves using a hammer to bend the metal by applying force to the metal. The third method involves using a roller to bend the metal by applying pressure to the metal. The fourth method involves using a score and bend method, which involves scoring the metal and then bending it. The video also provides safety tips and considerations to keep in mind when bending sheet metal.

96766.question: How To Make Focaccia
96766.gt: To make focaccia, start by mixing yeast, salt, flour, olive oil, and water to make the dough. Then, knead the dough before covering it and proofing it for 2 hours. Next, split the dough in half and flatten each half on a baking sheet drizzled with olive oil. Next, top the focaccia with any herbs, seasonings, or cheese you'd like, and then let it rest for 1 hour. Finally, bake the focaccia for 20 minutes at 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
96766.pred: To make focaccia, you will need 500 grams of flour, 7 grams of yeast, 325 milliliters of tepid water, a pinch of salt, and a tablespoon of olive oil. Mix the flour and yeast in a bowl, then add the water and salt. Stir the mixture until it comes together, then knead the dough for 10 minutes. Let the dough proof for 40 minutes, then shape it into focaccia. Place the focaccia in a tray and brush it with olive oil. Add toppings such as potatoes, cheese, and herbs, then let it proof for another 45 minutes. Bake the focaccia in the oven for 20-25 minutes, then let it cool for 10 minutes before serving.

97035.question: How To Make Catsicles
97035.gt: To make catsicles, first mix goat’s milk, wet cat food, and tuna in a bowl. You can also mix in some cat treats to make your catsicles extra special. Next, pour the mix into individual containers, like Dixie cups, ice cube trays or popsicle molds. Then, cover them with plastic wrap or Tupperware and place them flat in your freezer for at least 24 hours before serving.
97035.pred: To make catsicles, you will need a popsicle maker, a blender, and some watermelon. First, blend the watermelon in the blender until it is smooth. Then, pour the blended watermelon into the popsicle maker. Place the popsicle maker in the freezer and let it freeze for a few hours. Once the watermelon is frozen, remove the popsicle from the maker and enjoy your refreshing catsicle!

97458.question: How To Make KFC Original Fried Chicken
97458.gt: To make KFC original fried chicken, start by blending salt, thyme, basil, oregano, celery salt, black pepper, dried mustard, paprika, garlic salt, ground ginger, and white pepper in a food processor. Then, combine the seasoning with some flour in a bowl. Once you've made the breading, dip the chicken into an egg-buttermilk mixture and then the breading. Finally, fry the chicken in vegetable oil until it's cooked through and crispy.
97458.pred: To make KFC original fried chicken, you will need to follow these steps. First, combine paprika, onion salt, sage, garlic powder, oregano, chili powder, black pepper, basil, marjoram, and coriander in a bowl and mix it together. Then, divide the spice mix in half and pour 2.5 liters of filtered water into a pot. Add half of the spice mix, whole allspice, whole black peppercorns, salt, saltpeter, sugar, and bicarbonate of soda to the pot. Bring the pot to a boil, stirring frequently, and then reduce the heat and allow the pot to simmer for 5 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and let the brine cool completely. Using a carving fork or similar tool, poke holes through the skin of the chicken pieces, then place them in a large sterilized container. Pour the cooled brine over the chicken pieces, put the lid on, and let this cure in your refrigerator for a full 24 hours. After 24 hours, remove the chicken from the brine. Combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour with the other half of the spices, and lightly beat 4 eggs. Dredge the chicken in the flour mixture, then dip it in the egg making sure to wet all of the flour. Dredge the chicken in the flour again making sure to get a good solid coating. Sprinkle a layer of the flour mixture onto a platter, transfer the coated chicken pieces to the platter, and allow the coating to set for 20 minutes. Half fill your wok or pot with oil. Heat the oil to 160c or 325f. Fry the chicken pieces for 20 minutes, turning over halfway. Remove the chicken from the oil, drain on kitchen paper, and serve.

97467.question: How To Make Fried Chicken in the Oven
97467.gt: To make oven-fried chicken with breadcrumbs, start by whisking egg and milk together in a shallow prep bowl and setting aside. In another bowl, whisk together flour, breadcrumbs, baking powder, and seasonings to make a dry coating. Next, cover the chicken in the egg mixture and dip each piece into the dry coating twice. Then, bake the chicken in a heated, buttered pan at 410°F for 10 to 12 minutes. Finally, flip the chicken over and bake for another 5 to 10 minutes.
97467.pred: To make fried chicken in the oven, you will need to start by brining the chicken overnight in a sugar and salt solution. Then, mix hot sauce and an egg together and coat the chicken with the mixture. Next, mix all-purpose flour, plain breadcrumbs, and seasonings in a bowl. Coat the chicken with the flour mixture and place it on a cookie sheet with a cooling rack on top. Spray the chicken with oil and bake in the oven at 400 degrees until it is golden and crispy.

97602.question: How To Make Bread Sauce
97602.gt: To make bread sauce, first cut a loaf of bread into thick slices and place them on a drying rack to become stale overnight. The next day, peel and cut a white onion into quarters, then stud each quarter with one clove. Next, pour 4 cups (1 liter) of milk into a saucepan, and add the quartered onion along with 2 bay leaves. Add 1 teaspoon (5 mL) of white peppercorn, 2 mace blades, and 1 teaspoon (5 mL) of table salt, and bring the mixture to a near boil over medium heat. Remove the saucepan from the heat, cover it, and let the ingredients infuse for 1 to 2 hours. While you're waiting, break up the bread slices into small cubes, about the size of a crouton. Once the milk mixture is ready, heat it over low heat, and add the bread cubes. The bread will absorb the sauce and thicken it. Cook the sauce for 15 minutes. Just before serving, mix in 2 tablespoons (30 grams) of butter. Add a splash more milk or cream and sprinkle in some nutmeg if you would like. Pour the sauce into a gravy boat or bowl, and enjoy!
97602.pred: To make bread sauce, you will need the following ingredients: 110 grams of bread crumbs, 1 large onion, 12-15 whole cloves, 8 black peppercorns, 500 milliliters of full fat milk, 50 grams of butter, 2 tablespoons of double cream, and salt and pepper. You will also need a knife, chopping board, medium saucepan, bowl, sieve, and a wooden spoon. First, cut the onion in half and study each half with cloves. Then, add the onion to the milk, peppercorns, and milk to a pan and bring to a boil. Remove the pan and let it infuse for two to three hours. Strain the milk through a sieve into a bowl, and discard the onions. Pour the strained milk back into the pan and add half of the butter. Place the pan on a low heat and add the breadcrumbs. Stir together with a wooden spoon and let the breadcrumbs swell for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the remaining half of the butter, cream, salt, and pepper, and stir for a further minute. Remove the pan from the heat and serve the sauce in a sauce boat while still warm. This bread sauce is best served with roast chicken or turkey.

98111.question: How To Keep Guacamole Fresh
98111.gt: To keep guacamole fresh, start by transferring it to a small bowl. The less extra space, the better. Then, pour some lime juice or olive oil over the top of the guacamole to protect it from the air so it doesn't turn brown. After that, just cover the top of the bowl with plastic wrap and put the guacamole in the fridge until you're ready to eat it!
98111.pred: To keep guacamole fresh, you can use a pit, plastic wrap, or sour cream. Place the guacamole in a top wire, cover it with plastic wrap, or add a layer of sour cream on top. This will prevent air from getting to the guacamole and keep it nice and fresh.

98128.question: How To Make Artichoke Dip
98128.gt: Before making artichoke dip, preheat your oven to 350°F, and coat a large oven-safe dish with cooking spray or olive oil. Next, cut artichoke hearts into pieces about the size of quarters, finely chop the spinach and garlic, and add everything together. In a separate bowl, mix mayonnaise, cream cheese, and sour cream, and add the vegetables, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper. Spoon the mix into the dish, cook it for about 30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown, and let it cool for about 10 minutes before serving.
98128.pred: To make artichoke dip, you need to cook artichokes in a pot of water, remove the leaves, and dice them. Then, you need to make a roux by adding butter and flour to a pan, and cook it for 3-4 minutes. After that, add the diced artichokes, milk, Parmesan cheese, and English cheddar cheese to the pan and cook for another 3-4 minutes. Finally, add garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper, and stir in the sliced baby spinach. The mixture should be transferred to a baking dish and baked in the oven for 10-15 minutes.

98206.question: How To Build a Storage Shed
98206.gt: To build a storage shed, start by choosing a location for the shed and designing the building according to the dimensions you have in mind. Next, level the ground as much as possible and lay down the foundation. Then, construct the walls, add the ceiling rafters, and cover the roof frame with decking material. Finally, paint or stain the shed's exterior to protect it from the elements.

Then, you will need to dig a hole for the shed and place cinder blocks in the corners. After that, you will need to mark out the boards for the shed and cut them to the appropriate size. You will also need to mark the crown on each board to ensure that it is level. Once you have all the boards cut and marked, you can start assembling the shed by nailing the boards together.
