98218.question: How To Paint a Garage Floor
98218.gt: To paint a garage floor, start by degreasing and cleaning the surface, repairing any cracks, and lining the bottom of the walls where they meet the floor with painter’s tape. Next, prime the floor so the paint will adhere better. Once the primer is dry, prepare to apply your paint. You can choose a latex acrylic, which will last about 2 years, or an epoxy, which can last 4 years. Then, pick a corner to start and work strip by strip from one end of the garage to the other. After 24 hours, decide if you want to deepen the color with a second coat.
98218.pred: To paint a garage floor, you need to first clean the floor thoroughly to remove any dirt, grime, or stains. Then, apply a coat of primer to the floor to create a smooth surface for the paint to adhere to. After the primer dries, apply the paint using a roller or brush, making sure to cover the entire surface evenly. Allow the paint to dry completely before applying a second coat if necessary. Finally, add decorative elements such as color flakes to enhance the appearance of the floor.

98724.question: How To Grow Broccoli
98724.gt: If you want to grow your own broccoli, choose an area of your garden that receives full sun. Space your rows about 36 inches apart, and dig holes for your seeds every 12 to 24 inches. Place a few seeds in each hole and cover with soil, then water the seeds thoroughly. When the seedlings reach 1 inch, remove smaller or unhealthy-looking plants to prevent overcrowding. Give your broccoli plants about 1 inch of water every week, and fertilize your broccoli once a week starting about 3 weeks after planting.
98724.pred: To grow broccoli, you need to plant it in a location that gets plenty of sunlight, but if you live in an area with hot weather, you may want to grow it in partial shade to prevent it from bolting too early. It's also important to know that broccoli prefers cool days and cool nights, so if you live in a location where it gets hot early, you want to get a variety that is short, such as a cultivar that takes 45 days to 85 days to harvest. When transplanting your broccoli, it's important to do so when the starts are about six inches tall or have about two to four true leaves to avoid premature heading. After transplanting, it's recommended to put some wood chips back, put some black leaf mulch down, or add some compost or fish emulsion to feed the broccoli and continue its accelerated growth. Broccoli also loves water, so it's important to make sure it's getting enough moisture, especially during dry spells. Finally, it's important to harvest broccoli at the right time so it's not too small and to make sure you come out and harvest it before it starts to flower.

99800.question: How To Make Orzo
99800.gt: To make a simple orzo, brown 1/2 a pound of orzo over 4 tablespoons of olive oil (or butter) for 4 minutes. Then slowly add 2 cups of chicken broth until the liquid boils.
99800.pred: To make orzo, you need to preheat the stove top to medium-high heat and add two tablespoons of olive oil to a pot. Then, add two cups of orzo pasta and stir it until it takes on a darker color. After that, add two quarts of water and a couple of pinches of salt. Cook the orzo for about 12 minutes until it is done. To finish it off, sauté the orzo in a pan with butter, olive oil, garlic, shallot puree, and diced tomatoes. You can also add shredded Parmesan cheese and fresh herbs to the dish.

100901.question: How To Make Papaya Salad
100901.gt: To make papaya salad, start by crushing yardlong beans, chilies, garlic, shrimp, and peanuts to release their flavors and then mix them together. Next, cut papaya into matchstick-size shreds and cut carrots, sprouts, tomatoes, scallions, cilantro, and basil. After that, combine them all together. To mix the dressing, whisk together lime juice, sugar, fish sauce, and salt until it forms into a thin liquid. Then, add the crushed ingredients to the salad, drizzle the dressing over the top, and toss. If you’d like, you can top with cilantro or basil before serving.
100901.pred: To make papaya salad, you will need to start by cutting up the ingredients, including green papaya, green beans, cherry tomatoes, and roasted peanuts. Then, you will need to mix the ingredients together in a clay mortar, adding in the dressing made from fish sauce, lime juice, and palm sugar. After mixing, you can serve the salad on a bed of lettuce or cabbage.

100949.question: How To Make Kulfi (Indian Milk Ice Cream)
100949.gt: To make a quick Kulfi, add condensed milk, evaporated milk, and heavy cream to a wide pot. Bring this mixture to a boil and then reduce the heat, letting it simmer for 5 minutes. During this time, stir constantly so it doesn't burn. After 5 minutes, add your cardamom and other spices you like, and let the milk cool on your counter or in refrigerator for 2 hours. Then, add pistachio crumbles to your molds, if you like, before pouring in your milk. Cover and freeze your Kulfi for at least 6 hours before serving.
100949.pred: To make kulfi, you will need 500ml of boiled milk, 1 tablespoon of corn flour, 150 ml of condensed milk, 100 grams of mawa, 1/2 tablespoon of nutmeg powder, and 1/2 tablespoon of cardamom powder. First, mix the corn flour with a spoon of milk and add it to the milk in a deep pan. Stir the mixture well and let it boil for 8 minutes. Then, add the condensed milk and mawa to the pan and mix well. Let the mixture boil for another 4-5 minutes. After that, add the nutmeg and cardamom powder and mix well. Let the mixture cool down to room temperature. Pour the mixture into molds and freeze for 8-10 hours. Once frozen, remove the kulfi from the molds and serve.

101033.question: How To Make Bread and Butter Pudding
101033.gt: To make bread and butter pudding, first preheat your oven to 180°C (355°F), and grease a baking dish with softened butter. Then, cut 8 slices of bread in half diagonally, and cut each half in half again. Spread softened butter onto one side of each piece. Place 8 of the pieces into the baking dish with the buttered sides facing up. Next, sprinkle a handful of sultanas or raisins over the bread, followed by a liberal amount of cinnamon. This completes the first layer. Repeat the process to add more layers until you run out of pieces of bread, then set aside. To make the custard, first add 1 1/2 cups (350 mL) each of whole milk and double cream to a small saucepan. Place the saucepan on the stove and heat on low until it starts to steam. While that's heating up, crack 2 eggs into a bowl, and add 2 tablespoons (25 grams) of granulated sugar. Whisk the eggs and sugar until fully blended. Finish the custard by slowly pouring the milk and cream mixture into the egg and sugar mixture, then whisking everything together. Put a strainer inside of another bowl, and pour the custard into it to catch any bits of cooked egg which you can discard. Now, pour the custard evenly over the bread in the baking dish. Sprinkle some nutmeg, cinnamon, and  a bit more sugar over the top of the bread and custard. Let the bread sit for 30 minutes to soak up the custard, then bake it in the oven for 30 to 40 minutes. You'll know it's done when the bread pudding has a golden brown color and the custard has thickened.
101033.pred: To make bread and butter pudding, you will need four slices of bread, 600 milliliters of warm milk, 5 eggs, 200 grams of sultana or raisins, 1 tablespoon of sugar, and 100 grams of sugar for the pudding. First, cut the bread into half lengthways and spread some butter or jam on it. Then, whisk the eggs and add a drop of vanilla or nutmeg. Add the sugar and whisk again. Add the warm milk and whisk again. Pour the mixture over the bread and let it soak for about half an hour. Then, bake the pudding in the oven at 170-180 degrees Celsius for about 1 hour. After baking, let the pudding settle for a bit and sprinkle sugar on top. You can also add a little bit of cream or half-half milk to the mixture before pouring it over the bread.

101038.question: How To Make Caramel Pudding
101038.gt: To make custard caramel pudding, start by melting the sugar over a medium heat in a dry pan. Once the sugar turns brown, add the water and swirl the pan to mix the caramel. Pour the caramel into ramekins, then heat the milk over a medium heat. When the milk starts to boil, remove it from the heat and beat the eggs and sugar. Finish by mixing the milk into the egg mixture and pouring the pudding through a strainer into the caramelized ramekins. Place the puddings in a tray of water and bake them at 375 degrees F for 35 minutes.
101038.pred: To make caramel pudding, you will need a bowl, sugar, water, condensed milk, eggs, vanilla essence, and a nutmeg. First, add sugar and water to a bowl and heat it on low flame until the sugar dissolves. Then, add condensed milk, eggs, vanilla essence, and nutmeg to the bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture into a pudding mold and cover it with aluminum foil. Place the pudding mold in a pot of boiling water and steam for 15 minutes. Once the pudding is steamed, remove it from the pot and let it cool down. Finally, flip the pudding onto a plate and serve with caramel sauce.

101059.question: How To Make Instant Pudding
101059.gt: To make homemade vanilla instant pudding, mix dry milk, cornstarch, sugar, and salt together in a bowl. Next, slice open some vanilla beans and scrape the seeds out. Mix the seeds into the dry ingredients, and cut the remainder of the vanilla beans into small pieces and place them in a jar. Then, add the dry ingredients to the jar as well for a rich vanilla flavor. When you’re ready to make your pudding, add milk and cook in a saucepan until the mixture thickens, which should take 3-5 minutes.
101059.pred: To make instant pudding, you need to follow these steps. First, measure one cup of milk and add it to a bowl. Then, open the instant pudding packet and pour it into the bowl. Set the timer for two minutes and stir the mixture with a wire whisk. Keep stirring until the bell rings. Finally, pour the pudding into small bowls and enjoy.

101089.question: How To Make Yorkshire Pudding
101089.gt: To make Yorkshire pudding, start by mixing 3/4 cup of flour and 1/2 teaspoon of salt together in a bowl. Then, in a separate bowl, whisk 3 eggs and 3/4 cup of milk. Next, combine the dry and wet ingredients, and pour 2 teaspoons of beef drippings into each cup of a muffin pan. After you add the drippings to the pan, heat it in the oven for 5 minutes at 450 degrees Fahrenheit before dividing the egg and flour batter among the cups. Finally, put the pan back in the oven for 15-20 minutes before serving.
101089.pred: To make Yorkshire pudding, you will need a big bowl, four eggs, 200 milliliters of whole milk, 200 grams of plain flour, and a pinch of salt. Whisk the ingredients together until the batter is smooth and coats the back of a spoon. Then, pour the batter into a jug and add a little bit of oil to each mold. Preheat the oven to 190 degrees Celsius and pour the batter into the molds. Bake the puddings for 20-25 minutes until they are golden and crispy. Serve with smoked salmon, sour cream, and horseradish sauce.

101167.question: How To Clean a Candle Jar
101167.gt: To clean a candle jar, start by using a knife to break up and remove the leftover wax in the jar. Then, wipe out the inside of the jar with a paper towel, and place it on top of a folded dishcloth at the bottom of a pot. Next, fill the jar with water so it overflows at the top, and keep pouring water in until the water in the pot comes up to the sides of the jar. Finally, heat the water over medium heat until the remaining wax floats to the surface of the water.
101167.pred: To clean a candle jar, first, remove the wax from the jar using a knife. Then, wash the jar with hot water and detergent. Use a sponge to scrub the inside of the jar, and make sure to rinse the sponge well. After washing, dry the jar and it's ready to use.

101612.question: How To Make Friends With a Stray Cat
101612.gt: To make friends with a stray cat, leave strong smelling food, like tuna or canned cat food, in the area where you’ve seen the cat to encourage it to return. After you've done this for a few days, wait beside the food and see if the cat still comes to eat it. If it does, try sitting down on the ground and moving slightly closer to the food each day so the cat gets accustomed to your presence. Additionally, try engaging in a non-threatening activity, like reading or gardening. Once the cat appears comfortable being near you, hold a treat, like a cube of chicken, in your hand to see if it will eat it. When the cat eats from your hand, try reaching out with the other hand and petting it.
101612.pred: To make friends with a stray cat, it is important to start with small steps and gradually build trust. Begin by offering treats and gentle pets to the cat, allowing it to become comfortable with your presence. Gradually increase the amount of time you spend with the cat, and try to create a safe and comfortable environment for it. It is also important to be patient and not force the cat to interact with you if it is not ready. With time and patience, the cat may become more comfortable and willing to interact with you.

101940.question: How To Clean a Stainless Steel Water Bottle
101940.gt: To clean a stainless steel water bottle, first fill the bottle halfway with a mixture of warm water and soap. Next, apply the cap and shake the bottle for a few seconds, then empty it out. After the bottle is empty, wash it with warm water to remove any remaining soap. After you’ve rinsed your bottle, place it upside down in your dish rack to dry. If you can’t get inside your bottle to clean it, use a bottle brush, which is a long, thin brush, to get into the corners. Remember to carefully clean any ridges around the mouth of your bottle with a sponge, since this is where debris can gather.
101940.pred: To clean a stainless steel water bottle, first fill it with a mixture of water and vinegar and let it sit overnight. Then, pour out most of the liquid and add 2 teaspoons of baking soda. Mix the liquid and baking soda around to make a paste. Use a bottle brush or kitchen scrubby to scrub stains away. Rinse well, and your clean canteen is ready to use.

101972.question: How To Clean Oil Rubbed Bronze Fixtures
101972.gt: To rub down oil-rubbed bronze fixtures, start by wiping the fixture down with a damp, soft cloth, then drying it with another cloth right away so you don’t leave water spots. Alternatively, you can use a non-abrasive sponge to gently scrub away any hard water stains. If you still can’t get rid of the water stains, make a mixture of equal parts vinegar and water and rub it onto the fixture with a soft cloth or paper towels.. Then, let it sit for 15 minutes before wiping it off and drying the fixture with a soft, dry cloth.
101972.pred: To clean oil rubbed bronze fixtures, you can use a mixture of vinegar and salt to create a paste. Apply the paste to the fixture and let it sit for an hour. Then, rinse off the paste and scrub the fixture with a toothbrush or sponge. You can also use a black marker to cover up any spots that are difficult to remove.

102484.question: How To Install Crown Molding
102484.gt: To start installing crown molding, nail the first piece in place with finishing nails. You might want to have somebody help, since it’s easier to have one person hold the molding while the other hammers it down. Then, if your room is longer than your molding and you had to make scarf cuts to join 2 pieces, put a thin layer of glue on the cut of the first piece, fit the joint snugly, and fasten the second piece with nails, wiping away any glue. Keep going around the room in one direction until you’re done.
102484.pred: To install crown molding, you need to first measure the room and mark the corners with a chalk line. Then, cut the molding to the desired length and install it on the wall, making sure to align it with the chalk line. Use a nail gun to secure the molding to the wall and ceiling. If you need to make a corner joint, use a coping saw to cut the molding at a 45-degree angle. Finally, fill any gaps or holes with wood filler and sand the molding before painting it.

102549.question: How To Make Healthy Muffins
102549.gt: Before you start making healthy oatmeal muffins, preheat the oven to 350 °F and grease a muffin pan with oil. As the oven preheats, blend the oatmeal until it looks like coarse flour. Then, mix together the oatmeal and the rest of the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl with a wooden spoon. In a separate bowl, mash bananas and stir in the eggs, honey, milk, and vanilla. Next, combine all the ingredients and mix it thoroughly with a whisk. Once the batter has set for 10 minutes, scoop it into the muffin tin and bake the muffins for 20 to 23 minutes.
102549.pred: To make healthy muffins, you can follow the recipe provided in the video. First, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit and grease a muffin tray with coconut oil. In a medium mixing bowl, mash the right bananas using a fork or a potato masher. Add an egg and vanilla extract and stir to combine. In a separate mixing bowl, combine the whole wheat, spelt flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, and kosher salt and mix well. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and stir until just incorporated. Fold in the chocolate morsels. Pour the mix into the prepared muffin tins, filling the cups approximately two thirds of the way full. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean and the tops are nice and golden brown. Let the muffins cool on a cooling rack.

102810.question: How To Clean Hedgehog Quills
102810.gt: Before you clean your hedgehog’s quills, you’ll need a toothbrush, clean hand towels, and a sink with 2 to 4 inches of lukewarm water. To begin, lower your hedgehog face up into the water. Keep a gentle but firm hold on your hedgehog until it settles and you can put it down. Then, fill a cup with water and pour it over your hedgehog’s body, but be careful to avoid its face, ears, and eyes. Dampen the toothbrush, then clean its quills gently in the direction of growth starting at the front of its body. Then rinse it in clean water.
102810.pred: To clean hedgehog quills, you should first remove all the toys and bedding from the cage. Then, take out the fleece liner and shake it off outside. Next, use a baby wipe to clean the cage. After that, put the new fleece liner back in the cage and place the toys and bedding back in. Finally, wash the wheel and hut with an old toothbrush and soap and water.

103941.question: How To Make Tomato Chutney
103941.gt: Before you make tomato chutney, make sure you have all of the ingredients, like tomatoes, mustard seeds, cider vinegar, and scallions. Then, add your vinegar and spices to a pan and bring this to a boil while you chop your vegetables. Once your mixture is boiling, toss in your tomatoes, peppers, and scallions and reduce the heat to a simmer. Let this reduce uncovered for 75 minutes and you should end up with about 1.5 cups of chutney.
103941.pred: To make tomato chutney, you need to start by heating oil in a pan and spluttering mustard seeds. Then, add cumin seeds, chopped garlic, chopped onions, green chili, and curry leaves. Cook until the color changes. Next, add chopped tomatoes, red chili powder, turmeric powder, and salt. Mix well and cover the lid. Cook for 5 minutes on low flame. After that, add a little water and allow it to boil. Finally, put off the flame and your tomato chutney is ready.

103985.question: How To Bathe a British Shorthair
103985.gt: To bathe a British Shorthair, start by filling a clean sink with 6-10 inches of warm water. Next, grasp the cat gently by its scruff and slowly lower it into the water. Stay calm and speak in a soothing voice until the cat relaxes into the water. Then, drizzle water over the cat's back, shoulders, and neck until the fur is thoroughly wet and massage a small amount of cat shampoo into its coat. Finally, rinse the shampoo from the cat's fur until the water runs clear.
103985.pred: To bathe a british shorthair, you should first fill a tub with warm water and add a small amount of mild shampoo. Then, gently wet the cat's fur and massage the shampoo into their coat. Rinse the cat thoroughly with warm water and dry them with a towel. It's important to be gentle and patient when bathing a british shorthair, as they can be sensitive to water and may not enjoy the experience.

104001.question: How To Clean Kittens
104001.gt: To clean a kitten, note that there are certain parts of their bodies that kittens can't reach to clean themselves, including their head, back, and behind. Therefore, you should clean these areas for them using a damp cloth. You should also wipe its body with a damp cloth after its eaten as many kittens are messy eaters. As you wipe your kitten, move in the direction of the fur to avoid irritating it, and pay special attention to the area under the tail, which can get dirty. When you wipe its face, work from the front to the back so you don't get water in its eyes. Alternatively, if your kitten doesn’t seem that dirty, use a brush to clean its coat.
104001.pred: To clean a kitten, you need to fill up a sink with water and let the kitten roam around until it gets comfortable with the situation. Then, play with the water and show the kitten that it's water. Put some water on her paw or body, but don't let her jump off. If the kitten decides to scratch and run, grab her behind the neck and hold her in a comfortable position. Once the kitten is fully wet, you can let it sit in the sink and examine the situation again. Use Dawn dish soap to wash the kitten, and avoid getting any water into the ears, mouth, or eyes. After washing, pour the water to get all the soap off the kitten. Finally, wrap the kitten in a towel and dry it off.

105231.question: How To Clean and Maintain Your Flute
105231.gt: You should clean and maintain your flute after each use. To clean it, gently unscrew the head-joint and foot-joint from the body of the flute, then wrap a soft cotton or microfiber cloth around your cleaning rod. Gently pass the cloth through each section of the flute, twisting the rod to ensure any moisture inside of the flute has been absorbed. Carefully polish the outside of the flute, including the keys, with a clean microfiber cloth. Avoid touching the key pads while you are cleaning, since they are easy to damage.
105231.pred: To clean and maintain your flute, you will need a dollar or some paper, a cleaning cloth, a polishing cloth, a cleaning wand, and a flute. First, remove any excess accessories from the flute. Then, take the body of the flute and thread the cleaning cloth through the cleaning wand. Fold the cloth around the top of the wand to prevent any wood from sticking out. Clean the body of the flute by twisting it and taking it out. Make sure there is no residue or condensation inside the flute. Clean the head joint and foot joint in the same way. Use the dollar to slide under the keys and press down to remove any sticky noise. Clean the inside of the flute with the polishing cloth to remove any fingerprints and oil. Clean the mouthpiece and the body of the flute. Put the flute back together and make sure everything slides in smoothly.

105243.question: How To Clean a Ferret's Ears
105243.gt: To clean a ferret's ears, start by getting a ferret-safe ear cleaning solution from your local pet store. Then, place the bottle in warm water for 10 minutes so the solution isn't cold when you use it. Next, pick up your ferret by the scruff, which is the loose skin on the back of its neck, and gently wipe its ears with the cleaning solution using a cotton swab. Avoid pushing the swab down into your ferret's ear canal, and just focus on the outer folds of the ear.
105243.pred: To clean a ferret's ears, you will need cotton tips and water. First, dip the cotton tips in water and squeeze out any excess moisture. Then, hold the ferret in your lap and gently pull its ear back to access the ear canal. Use the cotton tips to clean the ear canal, being careful not to go too deep. After cleaning, give the ferret a treat to make the experience positive.

105269.question: How To Make Relish
105269.gt: To make relish, start by dicing cucumbers, red and green bell peppers, and a yellow onion. Then, soak the vegetables in a bowl of water for 6 hours, changing out the water after 5 hours. Next, simmer vinegar, sugar, minced garlic, dill seeds, mustard seeds, celery seeds, and turmeric in a saucepan for 5 minutes before adding the diced vegetables. Finally, bring everything to boil, and reduce the heat to a simmer for 10 more minutes.
105269.pred: To make relish, you will need to start by washing and chopping the cucumbers and red bell peppers. Then, you will need to add canning salt to the mixture and let it sit for 18 to 24 hours. After that, you will need to drain and rinse the mixture and add it to a container. Next, you will need to make the sweet pickle relish syrup by adding sugar, apple flavored cider vinegar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, celery seed, mustard seed, ground turmeric, and ground clove to a large pot and heating it on medium heat. Once the sugar is dissolved, you will need to pour some of the syrup into another pot and add green food color to it. After that, you will need to sanitize the jars and lids in a pot of water and bring them to a boil. Once the jars and lids have reached 180 degrees, you will need to pour the mixture into the jars, leaving about 1/2 inch of head space. Then, you will need to place a lid on the jar and tighten it using a ring. Finally, you will need to process the relish in a canning pot by filling it with jars and bringing the water to a boil. Once the water is boiling, you will need to maintain the boil for 10 minutes. After that, you will need to raise the rack and allow the jars to set for 10 minutes before removing the jars. Place the jars on a towel or a rack and allow them to cool for 24 hours in a draft-free area.

105386.question: How To Make Bhel Puri
105386.gt: To make dry bhel puri, start by blending green chili, lemon zest, and salt in a food processor. Then, toast some puffed rice in the oven for 10 minutes at 250 degrees Fahrenheit. While the rice is in the oven, chop up some unripe mango and red onion. Next, once the rice is done, transfer it to a serving bowl and top it with the chopped mango and onion, the green chili seasoning you blended earlier, and some cilantro, shelled peanuts, bhel sev, puris, and lemon juice. Finally, mix everything together before serving.

105393.question: How To Make Indian Egg Curry
105393.gt: To make Indian egg curry, start by hard boiling and peeling some eggs. Then, cook black mustard seeds and onions in a pan over medium heat for 2-3 minutes, add cinnamon and green chilies and cook for 2 more minutes, and then add chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 more minutes. Next, add ginger, turmeric, red chili, coriander, tamarind paste, coconut milk, salt, and curry leaves to the pan and simmer everything for a few minutes. Finally, add the eggs to the pan and cook the curry over low heat for 5 minutes before serving it.
105393.pred:
To make Indian egg curry, you will need the following ingredients: 4 eggs, 1 onion, 1 tomato, 1 green chili, 1/2 tsp ginger garlic paste, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp coriander powder, 1/2 tsp garam masala powder, 1/2 tsp salt, and 1 tbsp oil. Here are the steps to make the curry:

1. Boil the eggs and peel them.
2. Chop the onion, tomato, and green chili.
3. Heat the oil in a pan and add the chopped onion. Fry it until it turns golden brown.
4. Add the ginger garlic paste and fry for a few seconds.
5. Add the chopped tomato and green chili and fry until the tomato is soft.
6. Add the red chili powder, coriander powder, garam masala powder, and salt. Mix well and fry for a few seconds.
7. Add the boiled eggs and mix well.
8. Cover the pan and let the curry simmer for 5-7 minutes.
9. Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve hot with rice or bread.

Enjoy your delicious Indian egg curry!

105604.question: How To Make Citronella Candles
105604.gt: To make citronella candles, begin by melting cubed candle wax in a double boiler. Once it’s melted, mix in 1/2 a teaspoon of citronella essential oil per pound of wax. You can also add in any other essential oils, such as lemon or lavender, for scent. Next, cut a pre-waxed candle wick so it’s a few inches longer than the container and affix it to the bottom of your container. Secure the wick so it stands straight up in the container, and then pour in the wax.
105604.pred: To make citronella candles, you will need wax, wicks, sticks, and essential oil. First, place the pennies at the bottom of the pots to cover the holes. Then, place the wicks in the pots and wrap them around the sticks. Melt the wax in a pot with hot water and add the essential oil. Pour the melted wax into the pots, being careful not to spill. Let the candles cool and harden.

105767.question: How To Make Shrimp Alfredo
105767.gt: To make shrimp alfredo, start by peeling and deveining some shrimp. Then, cook garlic and butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat for 5 minutes before adding the shrimp. Next, cook the shrimp for 1-2 minutes, and then add half-and-half, salt, pepper, Parmesan, milk, and cornstarch, stirring everything until it thickens. Finally, cook pasta and broccoli, and mix them into the sauce with the shrimp before serving.
105767.pred: To make shrimp alfredo, start by cooking fettuccine noodles in salted water according to the package instructions. While the pasta is cooking, pat dry a pound of shrimp and season with salt, paprika, and black pepper. Cook the shrimp in a large pan over medium-high heat with a tablespoon of oil for about 2 minutes per side or until cooked through. Remove the shrimp from the pan to prevent overcooking. Chop half of a medium onion and sauté it in the same hot skillet with two tablespoons of butter for about five minutes or until soft and golden. Mince one garlic clove and add it to the pan, stirring for about a minute or until fragrant. Add 1/3 cup of white wine, such as Chardonnay, and cook until the liquid has mostly evaporated. Add two cups of cream and bring to a simmer, cooking for another two minutes. Sprinkle 1/3 cup of Parmesan cheese on top and stir until the cheese melts and the Alfredo sauce is smooth and comes to a light simmer. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Add the cooked pasta and shrimp to the sauce and stir until the noodles are well coated. Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.

106081.question: How To Make Vanilla Coke
106081.gt: To make your own vanilla Coke, pour a 12 oz can of Coke or a similar cola drink into a tall glass. Stir in 3/4 of a tablespoon of vanilla syrup, then taste the Coke to see if you like it. If you want more vanilla flavor, you can use as much as 2 tbsp of the vanilla. Add 2 tbsp of half-and-half if you want to turn your drink into a Polar Bear.
106081.pred: To make vanilla coke, you will need a glass, a bottle of Coca-Cola, and a bottle of vanilla extract. First, pour the Coca-Cola into the glass. Then, add a capful of vanilla extract to the glass. Finally, use a spoon to mix the ingredients together. The result is a delicious homemade vanilla coke.

106090.question: How To Wash a Car by Hand
106090.gt: To wash a car by hand, start by spraying the entire car with water and washing the wheels. Then, soak a large mitt in soapy water and wash the car in sections, starting from the top and working to the bottom. Use a car cleaning spray to carefully remove bugs and bird droppings. After you’ve washed the car, rinse it thoroughly with water from top to bottom, and use clean, dry towels to soak up the excess moisture.
106090.pred: To wash a car by hand, start by cleaning the wheels with a brush and water. Then, use a sponge to wash the car from the top down, making sure to rinse the sponge frequently. After washing, use a chamois to dry the car, and apply a spray detailer to remove any scuff marks. Finally, use a microfiber cloth to polish the car and remove any remaining dirt.

106150.question: How To Polish Stones
106150.gt: To polish a stone, start by dipping it in water before rubbing it all over with 60-grit sandpaper. For the best polish, regularly wet the stone as you use the sandpaper to wear down any sharp edges. Once the stone is rounded, use 160-grit sandpaper to rub out the scratches from the rougher sandpaper. Finish sanding the rock using 360-grit sandpaper, then polish the stone using stone polish and a damp denim cloth.
106150.pred: To polish stones, you need to soak them in water and oil for an hour, then scrub them with a toothbrush for two days. After that, dip them in oil and roll them around for five minutes. Finally, leave them out to dry overnight.

106333.question: How To Ice a Cupcake
106333.gt: To ice a cupcake, make sure the cupcake is completely cool before you get started or else the icing will melt off. Once the cupcake is cool, scoop up some icing with a butter knife and carefully spread it over the top of the cupcake. Keep spreading the icing around until it's in an even layer and the entire top of the cupcake is covered. When you're finished, store the cupcake in an airtight container in the fridge.
106333.pred: To ice a cupcake, you can use a piping bag and a piping tip to apply the frosting. First, fill the piping bag with the frosting and attach the piping tip. Then, place the cupcake on a surface and start piping the frosting in a circular motion, starting from the center and working your way outwards. You can also use different piping tips to create different designs and patterns.

106389.question: How To Make Cream Cheese Icing
106389.gt: To make cream cheese icing, start by beating some butter until it’s smooth and creamy. Next, stir vanilla extract and cream cheese into the creamed butter. Then, slowly add powdered sugar while you continue to mix the ingredients. If your icing come out too thick, add a splash of milk to thin it out. Additionally, if your icing tastes too sweet, squeeze a little lemon juice to bring back the tanginess of the cream cheese.
106389.pred: To make cream cheese icing, you will need 1 8 oz package of cream cheese, 1/2 cup of butter, 1 teaspoon of vanilla, and 2 cups of powdered sugar. First, add the cream cheese and butter to a mixer and mix until they are soft and well combined. Then, add the vanilla and mix until it is fully incorporated. Finally, add the powdered sugar slowly, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed, until the icing reaches the desired consistency.

106443.question: How To Roll Fondant
106443.gt: Before you roll fondant, sprinkle a flat surface with icing sugar to prevent it from sticking. Then, knead the fondant for between 5-8 minutes, or until it's smooth. Next, roll the fondant into a thick, even disk with a rolling pin, taking care to apply steady pressure so the fondant rolls evenly. You should aim to make the disk as thick as a piece of cardstock if you're planning to cover a cake with it. If you're trying to make a circle, turn the fondant 90 degrees every few rolls and roll it out away from you.
106443.pred: To roll fondant, you need to flatten it on a work surface, use a plastic rolling pin to roll it out to 1/8" thickness, and keep it from sticking to the surface by lifting and rotating it as you roll.

106577.question: How To Add Rice to a Crock Pot Recipe
106577.gt: To add rice to a crock pot, select the kind of rice you'd like to use, like white, brown, or wild. Next, create your meal in the crock pot and let it cook for several hours. Then, add the rice to the pot 2-3 hours before the dish has finished cooking to prevent mushiness. For white or brown rice, pour in an additional 1 1/2 cup of water or stock when you add the rice to the pot. If you're using wild rice, add 2 cups of water. Finally, let the dish cook for the remaining 2-3 hours at low heat.
106577.pred: To add rice to a crock pot recipe, first, you need to rinse the rice in a mesh strainer under cold water to remove any starch and impurities. Then, you can add the rice to the crock pot along with the other ingredients. It's important to use the right type of rice, such as long grain or brown rice, and to check the rice regularly to ensure it doesn't become mushy.

106589.question: How To Cook Black Eyed Peas
106589.gt: Before you cook black-eyed peas, place them in a colander and rinse them with cool water to remove any dirt. Fry about 2 cups of chopped ham in a little hot oil, then stir the beans into the ham. Next, add chopped onions, tomatoes, garlic, and bay leaves to the pan and stir the ingredients together. Pour about 4 cups of cold water over the beans, then cover the pot and boil for 10 minutes. Reduce the heat and cook for another 1-2 hours. After the beans are cooked, add salt and pepper to taste.
106589.pred: To cook black eyed peas, you need to soak them in water overnight. Then, remove any bad beans and add them to a pot with water. Add butter, green peppers, onions, minced garlic, chicken broth, and various seasonings. Cook the mixture for a while, and you will have a delicious black eyed peas dish.

106609.question: How To Cook Red Split Lentils
106609.gt: To cook red split lentils, also known as Egyptian lentils, place the lentils into a sieve or colander and rinse them well, then pour them into a saucepan and add 2.5 cups of water. Bring the water to a boil, then turn it down to low heat and simmer the lentils, stirring occasionally, for about 25 minutes or until they turn into a thick puree. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
106609.pred: To cook red split lentils, you will need to start by heating up a frying pan and adding coconut oil, garam masala, bay leaves, garlic paste, curry powder, salt, and onion powder. Stir the ingredients together and add soaked lentils to the pan. Cook the lentils until they become pale orange and then add water to the pan. Cover the pan and let the lentils simmer for 30 minutes. Finally, add ghee and chopped coriander to the lentils and stir gently.

106611.question: How To Cook Rice with Chicken Broth
106611.gt: To cook rice with chicken broth, decide how much rice you want to make, and pour the rice into a large pot with 1 box of chicken stock. Then, bring the rice to a boil over medium heat, and then lower the temperature to medium-low. Place a lid on the pot so that it's tilted to let some steam escape, and check on the rice every 2-3 minutes. When you can see holes in between the grains of rice, put the lid on completely and let the rice simmer for 15 minutes on low heat before serving.
106611.pred: To cook rice with chicken broth, first, boil some water in a pot. Then, add chicken stock cubes to the water and let it simmer. Next, add brown rice to the pot and cook it until it is tender. Once the rice is cooked, add the chicken to the pot and let it cook for a few minutes. Finally, add the rice to a bowl and pour the chicken broth over it. Garnish with rosemary, pepper, and onions.

106666.question: How To Make Rice and Peas
106666.gt: If you want to make rice and peas, start by draining the liquid from the kidney beans into a measuring cup. Next, combine the coconut milk, water, and liquid from the beans. To begin frying, heat the canola oil in a pan before adding the onions and garlic. After you’ve fried them until they’re translucent, pour the liquid into the pan. Add the beans and thyme to the mixture, bring it to a boil, then add salt and pepper to taste. Finally, add the rice to the pot and cook the mixture on high for 2 minutes. Turn the heat down and cook until the liquid is absorbed.
106666.pred: To make rice and peas, you will need a pot, rice, and peas. First, add the rice and peas to the pot. Then, add water to the pot and bring it to a boil. Once the water is boiling, lower the heat and let the rice and peas cook until they are soft and fluffy. Finally, fluff the rice and peas with a fork and serve.

106699.question: How To Assemble a Horse Grooming Kit
106699.gt: To assemble a horse-grooming kit, get some curry combs made out of different materials, like rubber, plastic, and metal, which you can use to brush loose hair, dirt, and dander out of your horse's coat. You should also add a soft, medium, and stiff bristle brush to your grooming kit so you have brushes for both the sensitive and tough areas on your horse's body. Additionally, you should get a wide-tooth comb and brush, which you can use to detangle your horse's mane and tail. In addition to combs and brushes, you'll want a hoof pick to clean your horse's hooves with, as well as some sponges and rags for bathing your horse.
106699.pred: To assemble a horse grooming kit, you will need a curry comb, a dandy brush, a body brush, a soft brush, a metal curry comb, a spray bottle, a hoof pick, a brush, and a t-shirt. The curry comb is used to remove dirt and debris from the horse's coat, while the dandy brush is used to remove larger particles of dirt. The body brush is used to remove smaller particles of dirt, and the soft brush is used to remove even smaller particles of dirt. The metal curry comb is used to clean the bristles of the soft brush. The spray bottle is used to spray the horse's coat with water, and the hoof pick is used to clean the horse's hooves. The brush is used to clean the horse's mane and tail. The t-shirt is used to clean the horse's coat.

107032.question: How To Build a Hot Tub Platform
107032.gt: The easiest way to construct a hot tub platform is to pound stakes at the corners of an 8 by 8 foot square. Make a smaller square of 9 stakes in the middle. Replace each stake with hole that's 1 foot deep, and fill the holes with a few inches of sand. Place a footing on top and set a short wooden post in each footing. Nail beams across the top going in both directions, and fill in the top of the deck as you go.
107032.pred: To build a hot tub platform, you can start by digging a hole in the ground and placing concrete blocks in it. Then, you can use 2x4s to create a frame around the blocks and screw them in place. You can also add deck boards on top of the frame to create a platform. It's important to make sure the platform is level and sturdy, and to consider factors like settling and potential weight distribution.

108100.question: How To Build Shelves
108100.gt: To build a basic shelf, place 2 bricks at each end of a softwood or plywood board on the floor. Then, place the board on top of the base bricks. If you'd rather attach your shelving to the wall, position a bracket on the wall where you want the shelf to go, mark it with a pencil, and drill holes in the wall. Next, screw in the bracket at one end, then make sure the shelf will sit level by putting your board on top of the bracket and holding it in a straight line. Finally, attach the second bracket to the wall at the other end before screwing your shelf onto both brackets.
108100.pred: To build shelves, you will need one two-inch by eight-inch by eight-foot lumber, a 36-inch oak dowel, a circular saw, a drill, a sander, and a half-inch bit. First, cut the lumber into three equal parts. Then, mark the dowel to four inches and cut it into nine pieces. Mark three locations for the dowels on the shelves and drill holes for them. Sand the shelves and dowels to make sure they fit together properly. Insert the dowels into the holes and hammer them in place. Finally, install a screw through the dowel and into the wood to lock the shelf in place.

109147.question: How To Make Clotted Cream
109147.gt: To make clotted cream in the oven, start by pouring a high-fat, not ultra-pasteurized cream into a heavy-bottomed pot with a lid and place it in an oven preheated to 180 degrees Fahrenheit for 8-12 hours. When the cream develops a thick, yellowish skin on top, remove it from the oven and allow it to cool to room temperature. The, place it in the refrigerator for another 8 hours. Finally, separate the clotted cream on top from the whey-like liquid below with a slotted spoon and store it in the refrigerator for 3-4 days.
109147.pred: To make clotted cream, you need to preheat your oven to 80 degrees centigrade and pour double cream into a clear, long, rectangular baking dish. Place the dish in the oven and let it sit for 12 hours. After 12 hours, take the dish out of the oven and let it cool to room temperature. Place the dish in the fridge covered and let it sit for another 12 hours. When you come back in the morning, you will see a nice, gorgeous crust on top of the clotted cream. Spoon off the crust and you will be left with actual clotted cream that tastes absolutely out of this world.

110275.question: How To Make Colored Fire
110275.gt: If you want to make a colored fire, wait until your campfire has burnt down until there's a layer of embers under it, then sprinkle your chosen chemical into the fire to change the flames' color. Choose copper chloride if you want to create blue flames or lithium chloride for pink flames. Alternatively, melt paraffin wax before adding 2 tablespoons of your chosen chemical to it. Next, pour the mixture into paper cupcake wrappers. Once the cakes have set, remove one from the paper and throw it into a burning fire.
110275.pred: To make colored fire, you can use different chemicals and fuels to create a flame with a specific color. For example, you can use sodium chloride or baking soda to create a yellow flame, boric acid to create a green flame, and copper sulfate crystals to create a blue flame. You can also use different types of fuel, such as methanol or isopropyl alcohol, to create a flame with a specific color. The key is to experiment with different chemicals and fuels to find the combination that produces the desired color.

110855.question: How To Clean an English Leather Saddle
110855.gt: To clean an English leather saddle, first use a dry cloth to remove any loose dirt and dust before wetting it. Next, rub your saddle vigorously in small circular motions with a warm, soapy sponge. Then, rinse your saddle with a clean, damp sponge or towel until all the soap is gone. Now, wipe away an excess water with a dry towel and allow your saddle to dry naturally. Finally, use a soft towel to apply a light layer of leather conditioner or oil over the whole saddle.
110855.pred: To clean an English leather saddle, first, remove the saddle cover and stirrup leathers. Then, wipe down the saddle with a warm water and soap solution using a rag. Clean the stirrup leathers and irons separately. Once the saddle is dry, apply oil in thin coats, focusing on the seat, flaps, and billets. Condition the saddle with leather conditioner and polish any silver parts.

110868.question: How To Put the Bit in a Horse's Mouth
110868.gt: To put the bit in your horse’s mouth, start by inserting your thumb into the area behind its teeth. This will tell your horse to open its mouth, but make sure to keep your fingers away from its tooth to avoid getting bitten. Once your horse’s mouth is open, guide the bit between its teeth. As you move the bit to the back of the mouth, pull the crown of the bridle up over your horse’s head. Next, gently move your horse’s ears out of the way as you pull the crown over them. All that’s left is to fasten the buckles around the neck and the chin. You’ll want to be able to fit 4 fingers underneath the neck buckle and 2 fingers under the neck buckle.
110868.pred: To put the bit in a horse's mouth, unbuckle the halter and flip it over the horse's nose. Then, grab the bridle and slip the reins over the horse's head. Unbuckle the halter and act like you're putting the bit on the horse's nose. Lay your hand flat and stick your thumb in the corner of the horse's mouth. If the horse is being stubborn, move your finger around the horse's mouth to make it open.

111153.question: How To Blow a Bubble with Bubblegum
111153.gt: To blow the best bubbles with bubblegum, start by chewing a piece of gum until it’s soft and smooth, then use your tongue to roll the gum into a ball and flatten it against the roof of your mouth. Next, open your teeth slightly and push your tongue through the flattened gum, moving it vertically in front of your teeth. Gently blow as if you are sighing until you can feel the air begin to fill the gum and turn it into a bubble. Remove your tongue from the gum and keep blowing as long as you can, or until the bubble bursts.
111153.pred: To blow a bubble with bubblegum, you need to follow a series of steps. First, you need to buy some bubblegum. You can buy gum at pretty much every corner store. Chewing gums can be used to make bubbles, but they won't be as big and they'll usually pop too easily. To start off, select a pack of bubblegum like Double Bubble or Bazooka. Generally, if there is a picture of a bubble on the package, it's a good choice. Some gums are also stickier, making them harder to remove from your face when they pop. Usually, if you chew these gums a little longer before blowing a bubble, they won't be quite as sticky. Gums with less sugar often have a stronger gum base for making bubbles. Gum bases contain a long molecule that adds elasticity to the gum. The right amount will make for the best texture for bubbles. Avoid old gums. If your gum is stale, it will be more dry, harder to chew, and bad for making bubbles. Use fresh gum to get the best results. To chew the gum, you need to roll the gum into a ball with your tongue. Use the roof of your mouth to steady the gum in place while you work the ball shape. It doesn't have to be a perfect circular shape, just so that gum is compacted. Move this ball of gum so that it sits right behind your front teeth. Use your tongue to flatten the ball into a small, flat circle. Use the back of your teeth to help flatten it by pushing the ball into them. Open your teeth slightly and extend your tongue until it extends out of your mouth and is covered by a thin, stretched layer of bubblegum. You'll need to be very gentle or you might poke your tongue right through. If that does happen, just form the ball again and start over. Keep practicing as this step can be difficult. Practice in front of a mirror so you can see when the tip of the gum is in the right position. To blow the bubble, you need to breathe air into the pocket of gum around your tongue. Blow gently until you can feel the air begin to fill the gum and start to push the gum out of your mouth in a bubble shape. Many people make the mistake of blowing just out of their lips rather than using breath from deeper within. Lip breath is not strong enough to produce a proper bubble so be sure to put more energy into it. The appropriate way to push air into the gum is like producing a heavy sigh. Use your diaphragm to push the air and exhale. Once the air pressure starts expanding the gum, you can remove your tongue. The edges of your teeth will help to keep the gum in place. Keep blowing slow and steady as you gradually expand the gum. Keep your mouth open. Resist the urge to close your lips after removing your tongue. Keeping your mouth in an open position will give you a larger area to push air through. To keep blowing as long as you can, use slow, even breaths. This will allow your gum time to expand. See how big you can make a bubble before it pops. For the biggest bubbles, blow bubbles inside. Stay away from wind and hot or cold temperatures. Cold air and wind can pop your bubble early, while hot air can make it so pliable it gets limp. To seal off the bubble, press your lips together slightly to close the bubble. This will prevent the bubble from getting more air and becoming bigger than desired or from allowing the air in the bubble to escape. If you want to avoid the mess of a bubble popping in your face, you can draw the bubble back into your mouth and pop it with your tongue. Practice, practice, practice. You may not succeed the first few tries but that's all part of the fun. Just keep trying until it happens for you and you get the hang of what it feels like. Blowing bubbles can take some getting used to for your jaw, mouth, and diaphragm. With practice, you will strengthen the muscles and the process will become easier.

111776.question: How To Dye a Leather Couch
111776.gt: If you want to give your leather couch a fresh dye job, you’ll need to first clean it and remove any glaze or surface treatment. Put the couch in a well-ventilated area and wipe it down with soapy water, then rub the surface with a rag soaked in deglazer or acetone. Protect the legs and any other parts you don’t want to dye with painter’s tape. Once you’re ready to dye the couch, spritz a small section of the leather with water. This will help the leather absorb the dye more easily. Pour 1 or 2 drops of leather dye onto a clean sponge or wool dauber, then spread the dye over the dampened section of leather using long, parallel strokes. Move from one section of the couch to another, and always spray a little water on before applying the dye. Let the couch dry for 1 hour, then repeat the process 2 to 5 times. After the last coat is dry, spray on some finisher to seal in the color and rub it in with a dry rag.
111776.pred: To dye a leather couch, first, clean the leather with a leather cleaner and let it dry. Then, apply rubbing alcohol to a cloth and massage it into the leather to remove any oils or waxes. After that, apply a thin coat of dye to the leather and let it dry. Repeat this process until the desired color is achieved. Finally, apply a sealer to protect the leather and give it a matte finish.

111780.question: How To Make a Sofa Slipcover
111780.gt: To make a sofa slip cover, start by buying 16 yards of the material of your choice for a 2-cushion sofa, or 18 yards for a 3-cushion sofa. Then, measure the dimensions of your sofa and draw them onto the material using chalk. Next, take a pair of scissors and cut out the pieces of your cover, including any patterns. Once you've cut the pieces out, pin them together in the shape you want the cover to be sewn in. Sew the side sections to the arms of the sofa before sewing the back and seating area together. Finally, put the body part of the cover on the sofa and sew it to the arms.
111780.pred: To make a sofa slipcover, you can use a white sheet or a white blanket to cover the sofa. Start by draping the sheet or blanket over the arm of the sofa, allowing the edges to touch the floor. Then, smooth the fabric up and over the arm and down the inside edge to the top of the cushion, tucking the fabric in slightly. Add three to four inches from the edge of the cushion and use scissors to trim the fabric to size. Next, wrap the fabric around the edge of the sofa and use pins to secure the fabric to the sofa. Unbolt the top and bottom edges and smooth the fabric up and over the arm, tucking the edges down between the cushion and the arm until the fabric lays nice and flat. Finally, fold the fabric sort of envelope style towards the cushion and tuck the top section in. The excess fabric at the bottom can be tucked up under the cushion itself.

112351.question: How To Shorten Backpack Straps
112351.gt: If your backpack straps are too long and get in your way, there are several ways to shorten them. Once your straps are properly adjusted, make 1 or 2 folds and tuck the straps under the tightening mechanism. Secure them with a rubber band or piece of twine so they won’t fall back out. You can also cut the remaining material if the straps are too long and you won’t have any future use for them. Just make sure to leave 2 to 4 inches for any minor adjustments. If you cut the material, melt the edges with a lighter so they won’t fray or slip through the tightening mechanism.
112351.pred: To shorten backpack straps, you need to undo the straps and take the bottom d-ring and the little nub and weave it through. Make sure the curved side is where the nub is and then push it through using the leather tap. This will make the straps shorter and more comfortable to wear.

112366.question: How To Clean a Litter Box
112366.gt: To clean a litter box, start by scooping out solid waste from the box every day using a scooper with a grated bottom. Next, use the same scooper to remove clumps of urine from the litter. When you’ve removed all the waste, replace any litter that was lost while cleaning the box. Then, once a week, empty out the entire box of litter into the garbage and scrub the empty box with warm water and mild dish soap. Finally, rinse the soap off and let the box dry completely before adding new litter.
112366.pred: To clean a litter box, you will need a scoop, plastic bags, and non-toxic pre-moistened sheets. First, remove the clumps of cat waste from the litter box using the scoop. Then, place the clumps in a plastic bag. Next, use the pre-moistened sheets to clean the walls of the litter box. Finally, distribute the litter back into the box, making sure to add more on the sides. This process should take no more than a minute and will leave the litter box clean and sanitized for your cat.

112595.question: How To Sharpen Chisels
112595.gt: To sharpen a chisel, you’ll need a sharpening stone with coarse, medium, and fine grits. If you’re using a water stone, soak it in water for several minutes before use. Alternatively, for an oil stone, lubricate with a petroleum-based oil. After lubricating, rub the flat side of the chisel smoothly back and forth over the coarse grit. Once the flat surface shows scratches, move onto the medium grit, then repeat the process before moving onto the fine grit. Once the flat surface of the chisel is shiny, it’s sharp enough.
112595.pred: To sharpen chisels, you need to first initialize the chisel by checking its flatness and then polish the back face of the chisel. Next, you need to work on the bevel by feeling for the angle and pushing it back and forth to create a camber. You can then go to the next level and do the same thing. Finally, you need to remove the burr from the length of the chisel by placing it on the leather side of the strop and pulling it.

113017.question: How To Build and Tune a Wind Chime
113017.gt: To build and tune a wind chime, start by drilling holes in the platform that your chimes will be suspended from. Then, cut the chimes into different lengths so they’ll produce different tones. Next, drill holes in the chimes and the pieces of wood that hang down between the chimes. After that, thread the chimes and the wood pieces, then attach them to the platform by running the threads through the holes you drilled into the platform. Finally, check to make sure the parts hang evenly and securely, and the chimes make the desired sounds.
113017.pred: To build and tune a wind chime, you will need to follow these steps. First, gather the necessary materials, including metal pipes, a striker, and a support disk. Next, cut the pipes into the desired lengths using a measuring tape and a saw. Then, drill holes in the pipes and attach the striker to the support disk. Finally, hang the wind chime from a hook and adjust the pipes to achieve the desired sound.

113228.question: How To Remove Vinyl Decals from a Car Window
113228.gt: To remove vinyl decals from a car window, heat up the decal with a hairdryer or heat gun until the edges fray, which will make it easier to remove. Then, use a credit card or library card to carefully scrape off the decal. To do this, hold the blade parallel to your window so you don't scratch the glass and slowly slide the blade under one corner. Once you have a corner done, use the card to chip away at any remaining residue. If there is still residue after the decal has been removed, use glass cleaner to remove it.
113228.pred: To remove vinyl decals from a car window, first clean the glass with a glass cleaner and a microfiber towel to remove any dust or dirt. Then, use a flat blade to scrape away the decal, being careful not to scratch the glass. If there is any glue left behind, use a product like Goon to dissolve it. Finally, clean the area with a glass cleaner and a microfiber towel to remove any remaining adhesive.

113764.question: How To Grill Kabobs
113764.gt: Before you grill kebobs, soak the skewers in water for 30 minutes and cut all of the ingredients into 1-inch cubes. You can also marinate the meat in vegetable oil, pepper, and spices. Then, skewer the ingredients and grill them over medium heat on a gas grill for 10-15 minutes, or 2.5 minutes each side. When you think they’re done, cut into the meat to make sure it is tender and has no reddish juices.
113764.pred: To grill kabobs, you will need to assemble them with meat and vegetables on skewers, season them with salt, pepper, and steak seasoning, and then brush them with olive oil. After that, you can grill them on a gas or charcoal grill, flipping them every 4 minutes until they are fully cooked. You can also baste them with a butter garlic sauce to add extra flavor.

113841.question: How To Dry Mint
113841.gt: The easiest way to dry mint is to tie together bunches and hanging them upside-down in a warm, dark, well-ventilated area. A bedroom or spare room will work best, as you want a room that gets little light and is at least 68 degrees Fahrenheit. After a week or two, take the dried mint down and strip the leaves from the stems. To dry your mint in the microwave, spread the leaves out onto a microwave-safe plate and cook them in 10-second intervals. Take the leaves out once they get crispy and start to curl, which should take between 15 to 45 seconds. If you want to use a traditional oven, bring the oven to 140 degrees Fahrenheit, then turn it off. Then, spread your mint leaves on a baking sheet and let them sit in the warm oven for 5 to 20 minutes.
113841.pred: To dry mint, you need to cut the leaves off the stems and place them in a paper bag. Then, cut out small triangles from the corners of the bag to allow for ventilation. The bag should be placed in a dark, dry place to prevent mold from forming. Once the mint is dry, it can be stored in a mason jar.

114870.question: How To Cure Salmon
114870.gt: To make cured salmon, also known as gravlax, start by selecting the highest quality salmon to ensure it has the best flavor. Look for sustainably-sourced fish that has bright, shiny skin and firm, orangish-pink flesh. Then, prepare your cure by mixing salt, sugar, pepper, and the herbs of your choice. Once you've made the cure, rinse your salmon and lay it on a piece of plastic wrap before rubbing the cure into both sides of the fish. Wrap it tightly, then place it in the refrigerator to cure for at least 3 days.
114870.pred: To cure salmon, you need to mix coriander seeds, salt, sugar, orange zest, pepper, and grated beetroot. Then, place the salmon on top of the beetroot mixture and cover it with plastic wrap. Place a heavy object on top of the salmon and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight. Finally, slice the salmon into thin strips and serve with a salad, toast, or bread.

116458.question: How To Cut Laminate
116458.gt: To cut laminate, measure the length you need and mark the cut lines on the finished side with a non-permanent pen or wax pencil. Then, make straight cuts with a circular saw or a handsaw. If you’re cutting laminate to width, lay out the sheet and measure the overlap. Next, create a template out of scrap that you can lay on top of the sheet you need to cut, mark your cut line, and use your cutting tool to saw along the marked line.
116458.pred: To cut laminate, you can use a straight edge, clamps, and a router with a straight bit. First, mark the laminate with a straight edge and a bit. Then, clamp the laminate on the marked line and use the router to cut along the line. This method is accurate and fast.

116555.question: How To Make Organic Pesticide
116555.gt: To make organic pesticide, chop up 1/2 cup of hot peppers, like jalapeños or habaneros, and 1/2 cup of onion or garlic. Add these vegetables to your blender or food processor and pulse until you have a thick paste. Once they are blended, add the purée to 2 cups of warm water and let it sit overnight. The next day, strain out any solids and spray the mixture onto your plants. You can also make a natural pesticide by mixing a few teaspoons of mild dish soap with a gallon of warm water.
116555.pred: To make organic pesticide, you need to blend Thai chili peppers, garlic, vinegar, and water in a blender. Then, filter the mixture to remove any solid particles. Finally, spray the mixture on the plants to repel insects.

116663.question: How To Make Snickerdoodles
116663.gt: To make snickerdoodles, stir the butter, shortening, sugar, eggs, and vanilla together until the mixture is light and fluffy. Next, whisk together the flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl. Then, gradually add the dry ingredients to the bowl of wet ingredients, stirring between each addition. Finally, shape the dough into balls and roll each ball in a mixture of cinnamon and sugar before baking the cookies for 6-10 minutes at 400°F.
116663.pred: To make snickerdoodles, you will need to cream together a cup of unsalted butter and a cup and a quarter of sugar. Then, add two eggs, one at a time, and a teaspoon and a half of vanilla extract. In a separate bowl, mix together two and a quarter cups of flour, one teaspoon of baking soda, and two teaspoons of cream of tartar. Add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix well. In another bowl, combine three tablespoons of sugar with two teaspoons of ground cinnamon. Portion out the dough and roll it in the cinnamon sugar. Place the cookies on a cookie sheet lined with parchment paper and bake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit for nine minutes. The cookies will rise and crack, which is a sign that they are done. Once they are cool, you can enjoy them.

117099.question: How To Make a Rainbow Loom Fishtail
117099.gt: To make a rainbow loom fishtail bracelet, choose rubber bands in several different colors. Next, twist the first rubber band into an eight, put one side of the eight on the first peg, and stretch the other side over onto the second peg. Then, stretch two rubber bands onto the pegs without crisscrossing into an eight shape. Use your hook to pull the bottom rubber band over the top and push them down. Continue this pattern until you reach the desired length, then pull the bracelet off the loom and add a C clip for the closure.
117099.pred: To make a rainbow loom fishtail, you will need a loom, rubber bands, and a hook. First, set up the loom by placing six rubber bands on each peg. Then, add a single rubber band around all six pegs. Next, add another rubber band on top of the first one. Repeat this process until you have the desired length of the bracelet. Once the bracelet is long enough, pull the rubber bands off the loom and tie them together. Finally, add a hook to the bracelet and you have a beautiful fishtail bracelet.

117106.question: How To Make Loom Bands
117106.gt: To make a basic loom bands bracelet, start by twisting 1 band into an “8” and folding it in half to make a circle, which you can slide into a C-clip to start your bracelet. Then, slide a new band halfway through the circle and pull the ends together to form a loop. While you’re holding the loop, slide a new band through it. The previous band will become a link in the bracelet and this new band will become the band you pull into a loop to create the next link. Continue adding bands in this way until your bracelet is long enough, then slide the remaining loop into the C-clip to finish your bracelet.
117106.pred: To make loom bands, you will need two colors of rubber bands, a black rubber band, and a pink rubber band. First, take two fingers and put the black rubber band on them. Then, take the pink rubber band and put it on the black rubber band. Next, take the black rubber band and put it on the pink rubber band. Finally, take the pink rubber band and put it on the black rubber band. Repeat this process until you have made a loom band.

118182.question: How To Make Fake Poop for a Prank
118182.gt: If you want to prank someone with fake poop, try using an old toiler paper roll. Just tear the roll open, soak it in the water, then shape it to look like poop. For fake poop that's a little more realistic, mix powdered sugar, peanut butter, cocoa powder, and milk in a bowl. Once you’ve mixed them into a dark brown lump, shape it into poop, and leave it to dry. Then, just leave it around someplace for people to find.
118182.pred: To make fake poop for a prank, you will need peanut butter, chocolate syrup, a bowl, a wooden spoon, a microwave, a sandwich bag, and scissors. First, put two big spoonfuls of peanut butter into the bowl. It's better to have too much fake poop than not enough. Stir the peanut butter and chocolate together until it's all one color, which is the color of poop. Put the bowl in the microwave for about 40 seconds, but do not want to burn your fake poop. Put the mix into a plastic bag and make sure it's sealed tight. Cut off one of the corners of the sandwich bag and then squeeze it wherever you want that's poop tastic right there.

118293.question: How To Crystallize Honey
118293.gt: To crystallize honey, make sure you purchase unfiltered, pure honey, since this is the only kind that will crystallize. If your honey didn't already come in a plastic jar, you can transfer it to one when you get home to speed up the crystallization process. You can also mix 1-2 tablespoons of water into the honey and store it in your refrigerator to encourage crystallization.
118293.pred: To crystallize honey, you need to mix one kilo of newly harvested honey with 100 grams of already crystallized honey from the previous year's harvest. Stir the mixture vigorously for a minute in the morning and afternoon for three days. Keep the mixture in the refrigerator during this time. After a few days, the honey will turn white with small crystals. Mix the crystals with the rest of the honey and pour it directly into jars. Refrigerate the jars for a few weeks to get smooth and creamy honey without big crystals.

118369.question: How To Make Fabric Softener
118369.gt: To make your own fabric softener, try using vinegar for an eco-friendly alternative to commercial softeners. Mix together 1 gallon of vinegar with 25 - 30 drops of any essential oil to give the fabric softener a pleasant scent. When you want to use it, simply pour ¼ cup of the fabric softener directly into your load of washing during the rinse cycle. Then, continue the washing cycle and enjoy your naturally softened clothes. Alternatively, use hair conditioner, vinegar, and hot water to make your own fabric softener. Combine 3 cups of vinegar with 2 cups of hair conditioner and 6 cups of hot water. Then add ¼ - ½ cup of the fabric softener to the machine just before the rinse cycle begins. After you add the fabric softener, let the cycle run as usual.
118369.pred: To make fabric softener, you will need a large empty bottle, six cups of boiling water, two cups of white vinegar, and two cups of any scented conditioner. You can use a cheap one or a more expensive one like the juicy green apple or refreshing waterfall mist. You will also need a wood or plastic spoon to mix the ingredients together. Once you have mixed the ingredients, you will need to pour the mixture into the empty bottle. You can use a wide mouth funnel to make this process easier. After pouring the mixture into the bottle, you can add a tablespoon of borax to thicken the mixture. Finally, you can use the fabric softener in your washing machine.

118772.question: How To Froth Milk for Cappuccino Without Fancy Tools
118772.gt: To froth milk for cappuccino without fancy tools, pour ½ cup of milk into a glass jar with a tight fitting lid. Make sure the milk doesn’t rise above the halfway point to ensure there’s enough room for the froth to expand. Next, tightly replace the lid and shake the jar for about 30 seconds, until the milk becomes frothy and has almost doubled in size. Then, remove the lid and microwave the milk for 30 seconds, or until steam begins to rise from the milk.
118772.pred: To froth milk for cappuccino without fancy tools, you can use a metal pitcher and a spoon. First, pour the milk into the pitcher and then use the spoon to stir the milk in a circular motion. Continue stirring until the milk becomes frothy and doubles in volume. This method is a simple and effective way to froth milk for cappuccino at home.

118776.question: How To Grind Coffee at Home
118776.gt: To grind coffee at home without a coffee grinder, try using the pulse setting on your blender to pulverize the coffee as finely as you can. Alternatively, use a mortar and pestle to grind the coffee the same way you would grind peppercorns and other spices. You can also try placing the beans between 2 sheets of waxed paper and smashing them with a hammer. No matter which method you use, make sure to grind your coffee just before you brew it so that it tastes as fresh as possible.
118776.pred: To grind coffee at home, you can use a manual or electric grinder. First, measure out the beans using a kitchen scale. Then, choose the appropriate grind setting based on your brewing method. For cold brewing, use the extra coarse setting. For French presses, use the coarse setting. For Chemex pour-over systems, use the medium coarse setting. For drip brewing, use the medium setting. For pour-over coffee, use the medium fine setting. For a finer grind, use the fine setting. Finally, for an even finer grind, use the extra fine setting. Experiment with different settings to find the perfect grind for your brewing method.

119128.question: How To Waterproof Fabric
119128.gt: To waterproof fabric, hold a can of waterproof sealer 6-8 inches away from the fabric and spray it in light, even layers. Make sure that the fabric is clean and dry before waterproofing, and only apply the spray in a well-ventilated area to avoid inhaling fumes. Once you’ve applied the sealer, wait for it to dry, then apply a second coat. Don’t forget to apply seam sealer to all the seams for extra water protection.
119128.pred: To waterproof fabric, you will need mineral spirits, 100% clear silicone caulking, and a container with a lid. First, pour the entire can of mineral spirits into the container. Then, add the silicone caulking to the container. Stir the mixture with a paint stick or dowel until the silicone is fully incorporated. Next, place the lid on the container and shake it to mix the solution. Finally, use a paintbrush to apply the waterproofing solution to the fabric. Allow the solution to cure for 24 hours in a cool, dry place before using the fabric.

119131.question: How To Apply a Cold Compress
119131.gt: To apply a cold compress, start by elevating the part of your body that's swollen or in pain, which will help reduce the swelling. Then, wrap a compress in a towel so it doesn't come into direct contact with your skin, which can cause further injury. When you apply the compress, press it down over the whole area to make sure the injury gets sufficient icing. After 15 minutes, remove the compress, since keeping it on any longer can damage your skin. Once you’ve waited 2 hours, apply another compress in the same way. Make sure to assess your injury to determine whether you need medical attention, like if you’ve fractured a bone or dislocated something.
119131.pred: To apply a cold compress, you will need a bowl, some ice cold water, a clean washcloth, and optionally, some ice cubes or an ice pack. First, fill a bowl with ice cold water and add ice cubes if available. Then, dip a folded washcloth into the bowl for about 10 seconds and ring out the excess water. Press the chilled washcloth to the inflamed area and keep it there until the compress loses its chill. An ice pack will stay colder longer than a washcloth, but wrap it in a clean cloth or towel first. It should never come in direct contact with the skin. Refresh your cold water supply if it loses its chill and continue dipping, ringing, and applying as needed. For acute injuries, that is sudden trauma, ice helps constrict the blood vessels, decreasing swelling in the area.

119416.question: How To Make a Ninja Star from Square Paper
119416.gt: To make a ninja star from square paper, cut a square piece of paper in half to make 2 rectangles, and fold each rectangle in half vertically. Then, crease the rectangles horizontally, taking the bottom and top pieces to make cross-folds in a “Z” shape. Flip the paper over, and fold the squares of each paper to make triangles. Fold the triangles into the center, making two parallelograms, and unfold the outer flaps of the papers before placing them on top of each other in an cross shape. Tuck the triangle flaps into the pockets of the papers and enjoy.
